data.name: ੴ ਸਤਿ ਨਾਮੁ ਕਰਤਾ ਪੁਰਖੁ ਨਿਰਭਉ ਨਿਰਵੈਰੁ ਅਕਾਲ ਮੂਰਤਿ ਅਜੂਨੀ ਸੈਭੰ ਗੁਰ ਪ੍ਰਸਾਦਿ ॥
data.english: There is only one God whose Name is ‘of Eternal Existence’. He is the creator of the universe, all-pervading, without fear, without enmity, independent of time, beyond the cycle of birth and death, self revealed and is realized by the Guru’s grace.

data.name: ॥ ਜਪੁ ॥
data.english: Name of the composition (means Chant)

data.name: ਆਦਿ ਸਚੁ ਜੁਗਾਦਿ ਸਚੁ ॥
data.english: God has existed from the beginning and existed throughout the ages.

data.name: ਹੈ ਭੀ ਸਚੁ ਨਾਨਕ ਹੋਸੀ ਭੀ ਸਚੁ ॥੧॥
data.english: O’ Nanak, He is true (exists) now and He will be true (exist) forever.

data.name: ਸੋਚੈ ਸੋਚਿ ਨ ਹੋਵਈ ਜੇ ਸੋਚੀ ਲਖ ਵਾਰ ॥
data.english: Cleaning the body by taking thousands of baths does not clean the mind from the filth of evil thoughts.

data.name: ਚੁਪੈ ਚੁਪ ਨ ਹੋਵਈ ਜੇ ਲਾਇ ਰਹਾ ਲਿਵ ਤਾਰ ॥
data.english: Mind does not stop wandering by remaining silent, even by constant ritualistic meditation.

data.name: ਭੁਖਿਆ ਭੁਖ ਨ ਉਤਰੀ ਜੇ ਬੰਨਾ ਪੁਰੀਆ ਭਾਰ ॥
data.english: Hunger or desire for material wealth is not appeased, even by collecting the material wealth of the entire world.

data.name: ਸਹਸ ਸਿਆਣਪਾ ਲਖ ਹੋਹਿ ਤ ਇਕ ਨ ਚਲੈ ਨਾਲਿ ॥
data.english: One may have millions of clever ideas, but not even one of those will help at the end.

data.name: ਕਿਵ ਸਚਿਆਰਾ ਹੋਈਐ ਕਿਵ ਕੂੜੈ ਤੁਟੈ ਪਾਲਿ ॥
data.english: So how can we become truthful? how can the wall of illusion, which separates us from God, be torn away?

data.name: ਹੁਕਮਿ ਰਜਾਈ ਚਲਣਾ ਨਾਨਕ ਲਿਖਿਆ ਨਾਲਿ ॥੧॥
data.english: (The answer is that) we should live according to God’s command, which, O’ Nanak, has been written in our destiny from the very beginning.

data.name: ਹੁਕਮੀ ਹੋਵਨਿ ਆਕਾਰ ਹੁਕਮੁ ਨ ਕਹਿਆ ਜਾਈ ॥
data.english: Everything is created by His command; His command cannot be descibed.

data.name: ਹੁਕਮੀ ਹੋਵਨਿ ਜੀਅ ਹੁਕਮਿ ਮਿਲੈ ਵਡਿਆਈ ॥
data.english: All creatures are created by God’s command; honor is also received by His command.

data.name: ਹੁਕਮੀ ਉਤਮੁ ਨੀਚੁ ਹੁਕਮਿ ਲਿਖਿ ਦੁਖ ਸੁਖ ਪਾਈਅਹਿ ॥
data.english: Some are virtuous and some are wicked by His Will; it is by God’s Will, based on their past deeds, some suffer pain while others enjoy bliss.

data.name: ਇਕਨਾ ਹੁਕਮੀ ਬਖਸੀਸ ਇਕਿ ਹੁਕਮੀ ਸਦਾ ਭਵਾਈਅਹਿ ॥
data.english: By His Command, some are blessed and forgiven while others, by His Command wander aimlessly forever in cycle of birth and death.

data.name: ਹੁਕਮੈ ਅੰਦਰਿ ਸਭੁ ਕੋ ਬਾਹਰਿ ਹੁਕਮ ਨ ਕੋਇ ॥
data.english: Everyone is subject to His Command; no one is beyond His Command.

data.name: ਨਾਨਕ ਹੁਕਮੈ ਜੇ ਬੁਝੈ ਤ ਹਉਮੈ ਕਹੈ ਨ ਕੋਇ ॥੨॥
data.english: O’ Nanak, if people understand His Command, then no one will behave egotistically.

data.name: ਗਾਵੈ ਕੋ ਤਾਣੁ ਹੋਵੈ ਕਿਸੈ ਤਾਣੁ ॥
data.english: According to their ability, some sing praises of His might.

data.name: ਗਾਵੈ ਕੋ ਦਾਤਿ ਜਾਣੈ ਨੀਸਾਣੁ ॥
data.english: Some sing about His gifts to us (everything we consume) and consider those gifts as proof of His existence.

data.name: ਗਾਵੈ ਕੋ ਗੁਣ ਵਡਿਆਈਆ ਚਾਰ ॥
data.english: Some sing of His noble virtues and His greatness.

data.name: ਗਾਵੈ ਕੋ ਵਿਦਿਆ ਵਿਖਮੁ ਵੀਚਾਰੁ ॥
data.english: Some sing God’s praises by reflecting on the difficult divine knowledge through the power of their education.

data.name: ਗਾਵੈ ਕੋ ਸਾਜਿ ਕਰੇ ਤਨੁ ਖੇਹ ॥
data.english: Some sing of God’s power to create the body and then to reduce it to dust.

data.name: ਗਾਵੈ ਕੋ ਜੀਅ ਲੈ ਫਿਰਿ ਦੇਹ ॥
data.english: Some sing that He takes away life and then gives it again in another form.

data.name: ਗਾਵੈ ਕੋ ਜਾਪੈ ਦਿਸੈ ਦੂਰਿ ॥
data.english: Some sing that God seems so very far away.

data.name: ਗਾਵੈ ਕੋ ਵੇਖੈ ਹਾਦਰਾ ਹਦੂਰਿ ॥
data.english: Some sing God’s praises visualizing Him everywhere.

data.name: ਕਥਨਾ ਕਥੀ ਨ ਆਵੈ ਤੋਟਿ ॥
data.english: Many try to describe God’s virtues, but there is no end to His virtues.

data.name: ਕਥਿ ਕਥਿ ਕਥੀ ਕੋਟੀ ਕੋਟਿ ਕੋਟਿ ॥
data.english: Even though millions have tried to describe His virtues millions of times.

data.name: ਦੇਦਾ ਦੇ ਲੈਦੇ ਥਕਿ ਪਾਹਿ ॥
data.english: The benefactor God keeps on giving, while those who receive grow weary of receiving.

data.name: ਜੁਗਾ ਜੁਗੰਤਰਿ ਖਾਹੀ ਖਾਹਿ ॥
data.english: All creatures have been consuming His gifts throughout the ages.

data.name: ਹੁਕਮੀ ਹੁਕਮੁ ਚਲਾਏ ਰਾਹੁ ॥
data.english: By His command, God, the great commander, is running the universe on a specific path.

data.name: ਨਾਨਕ ਵਿਗਸੈ ਵੇਪਰਵਾਹੁ ॥੩॥
data.english: O’ Nanak, God is always carefree and blissful.

data.name: ਸਾਚਾ ਸਾਹਿਬੁ ਸਾਚੁ ਨਾਇ ਭਾਖਿਆ ਭਾਉ ਅਪਾਰੁ ॥
data.english: God is eternal and so is His justice, His language is that of love and He is infinite.

data.name: ਆਖਹਿ ਮੰਗਹਿ ਦੇਹਿ ਦੇਹਿ ਦਾਤਿ ਕਰੇ ਦਾਤਾਰੁ ॥
data.english: We beg of Him for more and more and the benelovent God keeps on giving.

data.name: ਫੇਰਿ ਕਿ ਅਗੈ ਰਖੀਐ ਜਿਤੁ ਦਿਸੈ ਦਰਬਾਰੁ ॥
data.english: Then what should we offer Him so we can visualize His presence

data.name: ਮੁਹੌ ਕਿ ਬੋਲਣੁ ਬੋਲੀਐ ਜਿਤੁ ਸੁਣਿ ਧਰੇ ਪਿਆਰੁ ॥
data.english: What words can we speak to evoke His love?

data.name: ਅੰਮ੍ਰਿਤ ਵੇਲਾ ਸਚੁ ਨਾਉ ਵਡਿਆਈ ਵੀਚਾਰੁ ॥
data.english: In the ambrosial hours before dawn, recite the True Name, and contemplate His glorious virtues.

data.name: ਕਰਮੀ ਆਵੈ ਕਪੜਾ ਨਦਰੀ ਮੋਖੁ ਦੁਆਰੁ ॥
data.english: The human body is obtained through good deeds but the liberation from vices is attained through His grace.

data.name: ਨਾਨਕ ਏਵੈ ਜਾਣੀਐ ਸਭੁ ਆਪੇ ਸਚਿਆਰੁ ॥੪॥
data.english: O’ Nanak, this way we realize that God is eternal, all pervading and is everything  by Himself.

data.name: ਥਾਪਿਆ ਨ ਜਾਇ ਕੀਤਾ ਨ ਹੋਇ ॥
data.english: He cannot be established (confined), He cannot be created.

data.name: ਆਪੇ ਆਪਿ ਨਿਰੰਜਨੁ ਸੋਇ ॥
data.english: The immaculate God came into existence by Himself.

data.name: ਜਿਨਿ ਸੇਵਿਆ ਤਿਨਿ ਪਾਇਆ ਮਾਨੁ ॥
data.english: One who remembered Him with loving devotion, received honor.

data.name: ਨਾਨਕ ਗਾਵੀਐ ਗੁਣੀ ਨਿਧਾਨੁ ॥
data.english: O’ Nanak, let us sing the praises of God, the treasure of virtues.

data.name: ਗਾਵੀਐ ਸੁਣੀਐ ਮਨਿ ਰਖੀਐ ਭਾਉ ॥
data.english: Let us sing and listen to His prasises, and ensherine His love in our heart.

data.name: ਦੁਖੁ ਪਰਹਰਿ ਸੁਖੁ ਘਰਿ ਲੈ ਜਾਇ ॥
data.english: One who does this, dispels his sorrow and finds inner peace in his heart.

data.name: ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਨਾਦੰ ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਵੇਦੰ ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਰਹਿਆ ਸਮਾਈ ॥
data.english: Through the Guru’s we experience the divine word, through the Guru’s we obtain divine knowledge and through the Guru’s we realize that God is all pervading.

data.name: ਗੁਰੁ ਈਸਰੁ ਗੁਰੁ ਗੋਰਖੁ ਬਰਮਾ ਗੁਰੁ ਪਾਰਬਤੀ ਮਾਈ ॥
data.english: For us, the Guru himself is Lord Shiva, Vishnu, Brahma and Parbati.

data.name: ਜੇ ਹਉ ਜਾਣਾ ਆਖਾ ਨਾਹੀ ਕਹਣਾ ਕਥਨੁ ਨ ਜਾਈ ॥
data.english: Even if I realize God, I will not be able to describe Him because He cannot be described in words.

data.name: ਗੁਰਾ ਇਕ ਦੇਹਿ ਬੁਝਾਈ ॥
data.english: O’ my Guru, please bless me with this understanding that:

data.name: ਸਭਨਾ ਜੀਆ ਕਾ ਇਕੁ ਦਾਤਾ ਸੋ ਮੈ ਵਿਸਰਿ ਨ ਜਾਈ ॥੫॥
data.english: I may never forget  God, the only provider to all living beings.

data.name: ਤੀਰਥਿ ਨਾਵਾ ਜੇ ਤਿਸੁ ਭਾਵਾ ਵਿਣੁ ਭਾਣੇ ਕਿ ਨਾਇ ਕਰੀ ॥
data.english: I will bathe at pilgrimage sites only if it pleases God; without pleasing God, what is the use of such ritualistic bathing?

data.name: ਜੇਤੀ ਸਿਰਠਿ ਉਪਾਈ ਵੇਖਾ ਵਿਣੁ ਕਰਮਾ ਕਿ ਮਿਲੈ ਲਈ ॥
data.english: When I look at the entire world created by Him, (I realize that) nothing can be obtained without His blessing.

data.name: ਮਤਿ ਵਿਚਿ ਰਤਨ ਜਵਾਹਰ ਮਾਣਿਕ ਜੇ ਇਕ ਗੁਰ ਕੀ ਸਿਖ ਸੁਣੀ ॥
data.english: The mind becomes rich with precious divine knowledge when one listens to Guru’s teachings even once.

data.name: ਗੁਰਾ ਇਕ ਦੇਹਿ ਬੁਝਾਈ ॥
data.english: O’ my Guru, please bless me with this understanding that;

data.name: ਸਭਨਾ ਜੀਆ ਕਾ ਇਕੁ ਦਾਤਾ ਸੋ ਮੈ ਵਿਸਰਿ ਨ ਜਾਈ ॥੬॥
data.english: I may never forget God, the only provider to all living beings.

data.name: ਜੇ ਜੁਗ ਚਾਰੇ ਆਰਜਾ ਹੋਰ ਦਸੂਣੀ ਹੋਇ ॥
data.english: even if a person lives throughout the four ages, or even ten times more,

data.name: ਨਵਾ ਖੰਡਾ ਵਿਚਿ ਜਾਣੀਐ ਨਾਲਿ ਚਲੈ ਸਭੁ ਕੋਇ ॥
data.english: and even if he is known throughout the world and is obeyed by everyone,

data.name: ਚੰਗਾ ਨਾਉ ਰਖਾਇ ਕੈ ਜਸੁ ਕੀਰਤਿ ਜਗਿ ਲੇਇ ॥
data.english: has a good reputation with praise and fame throughout the world,

data.name: ਜੇ ਤਿਸੁ ਨਦਰਿ ਨ ਆਵਈ ਤ ਵਾਤ ਨ ਪੁਛੈ ਕੇ ॥
data.english: still no-one would care about that person without the grace of God.

data.name: ਕੀਟਾ ਅੰਦਰਿ ਕੀਟੁ ਕਰਿ ਦੋਸੀ ਦੋਸੁ ਧਰੇ ॥
data.english: Such a person is considered very low, (like a lowly worm), and even the sinners will hold him in contempt.

data.name: ਨਾਨਕ ਨਿਰਗੁਣਿ ਗੁਣੁ ਕਰੇ ਗੁਣਵੰਤਿਆ ਗੁਣੁ ਦੇ ॥
data.english: O’ Nanak, God can bless even the unvirtuous persons with virtues, and can bestow more virtues on the virtuous.

data.name: ਤੇਹਾ ਕੋਇ ਨ ਸੁਝਈ ਜਿ ਤਿਸੁ ਗੁਣੁ ਕੋਇ ਕਰੇ ॥੭॥
data.english: I cannot even imagine anyone other than God who can bestow virtues upon virtueless.

data.name: ਸੁਣਿਐ ਸਿਧ ਪੀਰ ਸੁਰਿ ਨਾਥ ॥
data.english: By listening to God’s praises even ordinary persons obtain the status of Sidhas (yogis), Peers (Muslim religious guides), gods, and Naaths (the leaders of yogis).

data.name: ਸੁਣਿਐ ਧਰਤਿ ਧਵਲ ਆਕਾਸ ॥
data.english: By listening to Naam (one understands the mystery of) the earth, and the real bull (or force), which supports earth and the sky.

data.name: ਸੁਣਿਐ ਦੀਪ ਲੋਅ ਪਾਤਾਲ ॥
data.english: By listening to Naam, one understands that God is pervading in all the continents, worlds, and nether regions.

data.name: ਸੁਣਿਐ ਪੋਹਿ ਨ ਸਕੈ ਕਾਲੁ ॥
data.english: By listening to God’s praises, one is not afraid of death.

data.name: ਨਾਨਕ ਭਗਤਾ ਸਦਾ ਵਿਗਾਸੁ ॥
data.english: O’ Nanak, His devotees are forever in joy and bliss.

data.name: ਸੁਣਿਐ ਦੂਖ ਪਾਪ ਕਾ ਨਾਸੁ ॥੮॥
data.english: Listening to God’s praises, all sorrows and sins are erased. ||8||

data.name: ਸੁਣਿਐ ਈਸਰੁ ਬਰਮਾ ਇੰਦੁ ॥
data.english: Listening to Naam, one obtains the godly qualities like that of Shiva, Brahma and Indra.

data.name: ਸੁਣਿਐ ਮੁਖਿ ਸਾਲਾਹਣ ਮੰਦੁ ॥
data.english: By listening to Naam, even the sinners get enlightened and start singing the praises of God.

data.name: ਸੁਣਿਐ ਜੋਗ ਜੁਗਤਿ ਤਨਿ ਭੇਦ ॥
data.english: By listening to Naam, one starts understanding the secrets of uniting with God, and the secrets of the human body.

data.name: ਸੁਣਿਐ ਸਾਸਤ ਸਿਮ੍ਰਿਤਿ ਵੇਦ ॥
data.english: By listening to the God’s Name, one attains spiritual knowledge described in the holy scriptures.

data.name: ਨਾਨਕ ਭਗਤਾ ਸਦਾ ਵਿਗਾਸੁ ॥
data.english: O’ Nanak, the devotees of God are forever in bliss.

data.name: ਸੁਣਿਐ ਦੂਖ ਪਾਪ ਕਾ ਨਾਸੁ ॥੯॥
data.english: By listening to God’s praises, all sorrows and sins vanish.

data.name: ਸੁਣਿਐ ਸਤੁ ਸੰਤੋਖੁ ਗਿਆਨੁ ॥
data.english: By listening to Naam, one acquires truthfulness, contentment and spiritual knowledge.

data.name: ਸੁਣਿਐ ਅਠਸਠਿ ਕਾ ਇਸਨਾਨੁ ॥
data.english: By listening to God’s praises with adoration, one becomes pious, as if one has bathed at all the holy places.

data.name: ਸੁਣਿਐ ਪੜਿ ਪੜਿ ਪਾਵਹਿ ਮਾਨੁ ॥
data.english: By listening to God’s praises, the devotees earn the same true honor as one receives by reading holy books (scriptures).

data.name: ਸੁਣਿਐ ਲਾਗੈ ਸਹਜਿ ਧਿਆਨੁ ॥
data.english: By listening to Naam, one intuitively concentrates on Naam.

data.name: ਨਾਨਕ ਭਗਤਾ ਸਦਾ ਵਿਗਾਸੁ ॥
data.english: O’ Nanak, the devotees of God are forever in the state of joy and bliss.

data.name: ਸੁਣਿਐ ਦੂਖ ਪਾਪ ਕਾ ਨਾਸੁ ॥੧੦॥
data.english: Listening to God’s praises with adoration, all sorrows and sins vanish.

data.name: ਸੁਣਿਐ ਸਰਾ ਗੁਣਾ ਕੇ ਗਾਹ ॥
data.english: By listening to God’s praises, one becomes immensely virtues.

data.name: ਸੁਣਿਐ ਸੇਖ ਪੀਰ ਪਾਤਿਸਾਹ ॥
data.english: By listening to God’s praises with loving devotion one attains honor like that of social and religious leaders and the emperors.

data.name: ਸੁਣਿਐ ਅੰਧੇ ਪਾਵਹਿ ਰਾਹੁ ॥
data.english: By listening to Naam, even spiritually ignorant persons find a way to freedom from the vices.

data.name: ਸੁਣਿਐ ਹਾਥ ਹੋਵੈ ਅਸਗਾਹੁ ॥
data.english: By listening to Naam, one understands the profoundness of the world-ocean.

data.name: ਨਾਨਕ ਭਗਤਾ ਸਦਾ ਵਿਗਾਸੁ ॥
data.english: O’ Nanak, the devotees of God are forever in the state of joy and bliss.

data.name: ਸੁਣਿਐ ਦੂਖ ਪਾਪ ਕਾ ਨਾਸੁ ॥੧੧॥
data.english: All sorrows and sins vanish by lovingly listening to God’s praises.

data.name: ਮੰਨੇ ਕੀ ਗਤਿ ਕਹੀ ਨ ਜਾਇ ॥
data.english: The state of mind of a true believer in God cannot be described,

data.name: ਜੇ ਕੋ ਕਹੈ ਪਿਛੈ ਪਛੁਤਾਇ ॥
data.english: and if one tries to describe this state, he would afterwards regret.

data.name: ਕਾਗਦਿ ਕਲਮ ਨ ਲਿਖਣਹਾਰੁ ॥
data.english: There is not enough paper or pen and writer to write the spiritual state of the mind of a true believer in God,

data.name: ਮੰਨੇ ਕਾ ਬਹਿ ਕਰਨਿ ਵੀਚਾਰੁ ॥
data.english: even though some people do reflect over it anyway.

data.name: ਐਸਾ ਨਾਮੁ ਨਿਰੰਜਨੁ ਹੋਇ ॥
data.english: Such a blissful is the Name of the Immaculate God,

data.name: ਜੇ ਕੋ ਮੰਨਿ ਜਾਣੈ ਮਨਿ ਕੋਇ ॥੧੨॥
data.english: but it is understood only if one truly believes in it from the core of his heart.

data.name: ਮੰਨੈ ਸੁਰਤਿ ਹੋਵੈ ਮਨਿ ਬੁਧਿ ॥
data.english: By believing in Naam, one’s mind and intellect becomes spiritually enlightened.

data.name: ਮੰਨੈ ਸਗਲ ਭਵਣ ਕੀ ਸੁਧਿ ॥
data.english: By having complete faith in God, one becomes knowledgeable about all the worlds (that God pervades everywhere).

data.name: ਮੰਨੈ ਮੁਹਿ ਚੋਟਾ ਨਾ ਖਾਇ ॥
data.english: By having complete faith in God, one is not afflicted by worldly evils.

data.name: ਮੰਨੈ ਜਮ ਕੈ ਸਾਥਿ ਨ ਜਾਇ ॥
data.english: By having complete faith in God, one does not have to face the demon of death.

data.name: ਐਸਾ ਨਾਮੁ ਨਿਰੰਜਨੁ ਹੋਇ ॥
data.english: Such a blissful is the Name of the Immaculate God,

data.name: ਜੇ ਕੋ ਮੰਨਿ ਜਾਣੈ ਮਨਿ ਕੋਇ ॥੧੩॥
data.english: but it is understood only if one truly believes in it from the core of his heart.

data.name: ਮੰਨੈ ਮਾਰਗਿ ਠਾਕ ਨ ਪਾਇ ॥
data.english: A true believer in God never faces any obstacles in his spiritual journey.

data.name: ਮੰਨੈ ਪਤਿ ਸਿਉ ਪਰਗਟੁ ਜਾਇ ॥
data.english: A true believer in Naam departs from the world with honor and fame.

data.name: ਮੰਨੈ ਮਗੁ ਨ ਚਲੈ ਪੰਥੁ ॥
data.english: A true believer in Naam is not misled into sects or ritualistic religious paths.

data.name: ਮੰਨੈ ਧਰਮ ਸੇਤੀ ਸਨਬੰਧੁ ॥
data.english: A true believer in Naam is bound to the truth and righteousness.

data.name: ਐਸਾ ਨਾਮੁ ਨਿਰੰਜਨੁ ਹੋਇ ॥
data.english: Such a blissful is the Name of the Immaculate God,

data.name: ਜੇ ਕੋ ਮੰਨਿ ਜਾਣੈ ਮਨਿ ਕੋਇ ॥੧੪॥
data.english: but it is understood only if one truly believes in it from the core of his heart.

data.name: ਮੰਨੈ ਪਾਵਹਿ ਮੋਖੁ ਦੁਆਰੁ ॥
data.english: The true believers in God, find the path to freedom from the false worldly attachments.

data.name: ਮੰਨੈ ਪਰਵਾਰੈ ਸਾਧਾਰੁ ॥
data.english: A true believer in God, makes his family believe in God’s support.

data.name: ਮੰਨੈ ਤਰੈ ਤਾਰੇ ਗੁਰੁ ਸਿਖ ॥
data.english: Such a believer not only saves himself but also saves other disciples of the Guru.

data.name: ਮੰਨੈ ਨਾਨਕ ਭਵਹਿ ਨ ਭਿਖ ॥
data.english: O’ Nanak, such believers in Naam do not beg for favors from others.

data.name: ਐਸਾ ਨਾਮੁ ਨਿਰੰਜਨੁ ਹੋਇ ॥
data.english: Such a blissful is the Name of the Immaculate God,

data.name: ਜੇ ਕੋ ਮੰਨਿ ਜਾਣੈ ਮਨਿ ਕੋਇ ॥੧੫॥
data.english: but it is understood only if one truly believes in it from the core of his heart.

data.name: ਪੰਚ ਪਰਵਾਣ ਪੰਚ ਪਰਧਾਨੁ ॥
data.english: Those who truly understand and obey God’s command become Panch (approved by God) and they lead others.

data.name: ਪੰਚੇ ਪਾਵਹਿ ਦਰਗਹਿ ਮਾਨੁ ॥
data.english: These approved ones are honored in God’s presence.

data.name: ਪੰਚੇ ਸੋਹਹਿ ਦਰਿ ਰਾਜਾਨੁ ॥
data.english: These approved ones grace the court of God, the king of all the kings.

data.name: ਪੰਚਾ ਕਾ ਗੁਰੁ ਏਕੁ ਧਿਆਨੁ ॥
data.english: Their minds always remain attuned to the Divine-Guru.

data.name: ਜੇ ਕੋ ਕਹੈ ਕਰੈ ਵੀਚਾਰੁ ॥
data.english: No matter how much anyone tries to explain and describe,

data.name: ਕਰਤੇ ਕੈ ਕਰਣੈ ਨਾਹੀ ਸੁਮਾਰੁ ॥
data.english: the creation of the Creator cannot be comprehended.

data.name: ਧੌਲੁ ਧਰਮੁ ਦਇਆ ਕਾ ਪੂਤੁ ॥
data.english: Dharma (righteousness) is the force supporting the universe and not dhaul, the mythical bull; righteousness comes from compassion.

data.name: ਸੰਤੋਖੁ ਥਾਪਿ ਰਖਿਆ ਜਿਨਿ ਸੂਤਿ ॥
data.english: Dharma (righteousness) based on compassion and patience supports this earth.

data.name: ਜੇ ਕੋ ਬੁਝੈ ਹੋਵੈ ਸਚਿਆਰੁ ॥
data.english: If one understands this concept, then he comes to know the real truth,

data.name: ਧਵਲੈ ਉਪਰਿ ਕੇਤਾ ਭਾਰੁ ॥
data.english: that it is the Law of God that supports the universe; how can a bull bear the tremendous weight of the earth?.

data.name: ਧਰਤੀ ਹੋਰੁ ਪਰੈ ਹੋਰੁ ਹੋਰੁ ॥
data.english: There are innumerable earths beyond this planet-earth.

data.name: ਤਿਸ ਤੇ ਭਾਰੁ ਤਲੈ ਕਵਣੁ ਜੋਰੁ ॥
data.english: What power holds them, and supports their weight?

data.name: ਜੀਅ ਜਾਤਿ ਰੰਗਾ ਕੇ ਨਾਵ ॥
data.english: There are countless species of creatures with various colors and names,

data.name: ਸਭਨਾ ਲਿਖਿਆ ਵੁੜੀ ਕਲਾਮ ॥
data.english: The ever-flowing pen of God has written the account of all.

data.name: ਏਹੁ ਲੇਖਾ ਲਿਖਿ ਜਾਣੈ ਕੋਇ ॥
data.english: If anyone knows how to write this kind of account,

data.name: ਲੇਖਾ ਲਿਖਿਆ ਕੇਤਾ ਹੋਇ ॥
data.english: even if this account is written, just imagine how big that account will be?

data.name: ਕੇਤਾ ਤਾਣੁ ਸੁਆਲਿਹੁ ਰੂਪੁ ॥
data.english: What is the extent of God’s power and the vastness of His beautiful creation?

data.name: ਕੇਤੀ ਦਾਤਿ ਜਾਣੈ ਕੌਣੁ ਕੂਤੁ ॥
data.english: And who can estimate the extent of His bounties?

data.name: ਕੀਤਾ ਪਸਾਉ ਏਕੋ ਕਵਾਉ ॥
data.english: God is so powerful that He created the vast expanse of the Universe just with one word of His command,

data.name: ਤਿਸ ਤੇ ਹੋਏ ਲਖ ਦਰੀਆਉ ॥
data.english: And from that emerged millions of lives and systems of the universe.

data.name: ਕੁਦਰਤਿ ਕਵਣ ਕਹਾ ਵੀਚਾਰੁ ॥
data.english: Who am I to express my thoughts about the extent of God’s creation?

data.name: ਵਾਰਿਆ ਨ ਜਾਵਾ ਏਕ ਵਾਰ ॥
data.english: I am so powerless, that I am not even worthy of dedicating myself once for You.

data.name: ਜੋ ਤੁਧੁ ਭਾਵੈ ਸਾਈ ਭਲੀ ਕਾਰ ॥
data.english: O’ God, whatever pleases You, is best for us.

data.name: ਤੂ ਸਦਾ ਸਲਾਮਤਿ ਨਿਰੰਕਾਰ ॥੧੬॥
data.english: O’ the formless God, only You are the eternal one.

data.name: ਅਸੰਖ ਜਪ ਅਸੰਖ ਭਾਉ ॥
data.english: O’ God, countless people meditate on Your Name and remember You with Love.

data.name: ਅਸੰਖ ਪੂਜਾ ਅਸੰਖ ਤਪ ਤਾਉ ॥
data.english: Countless people are engaged in Your devotional worship, and countless are doing penance sitting in front of smoldering fires.

data.name: ਅਸੰਖ ਗਰੰਥ ਮੁਖਿ ਵੇਦ ਪਾਠ ॥
data.english: Countless people are reciting the vedas and the holy books.

data.name: ਅਸੰਖ ਜੋਗ ਮਨਿ ਰਹਹਿ ਉਦਾਸ ॥
data.english: Limitless are those who practice yoga, and in their minds they remain detached from the world.

data.name: ਅਸੰਖ ਭਗਤ ਗੁਣ ਗਿਆਨ ਵੀਚਾਰ ॥
data.english: Countless devotees contemplate the virtues and wisdom of the Almighty.

data.name: ਅਸੰਖ ਸਤੀ ਅਸੰਖ ਦਾਤਾਰ ॥
data.english: There are countless holy persons and countless philanthropists.

data.name: ਅਸੰਖ ਸੂਰ ਮੁਹ ਭਖ ਸਾਰ ॥
data.english: There are countless heros who face the brunt of steel weapons in battle.

data.name: ਅਸੰਖ ਮੋਨਿ ਲਿਵ ਲਾਇ ਤਾਰ ॥
data.english: Countless are the sages who are attuned to God in single-minded devotion.

data.name: ਕੁਦਰਤਿ ਕਵਣ ਕਹਾ ਵੀਚਾਰੁ ॥
data.english: Who am I to assess the extent of God’s creation?

data.name: ਵਾਰਿਆ ਨ ਜਾਵਾ ਏਕ ਵਾਰ ॥
data.english: I am not worthy to dedicate myself to You even once.

data.name: ਜੋ ਤੁਧੁ ਭਾਵੈ ਸਾਈ ਭਲੀ ਕਾਰ ॥
data.english: O’ God, whatever pleases You, is best for all.

data.name: ਤੂ ਸਦਾ ਸਲਾਮਤਿ ਨਿਰੰਕਾਰ ॥੧੭॥
data.english: O’ the formless God, only You are the eternal one.

data.name: ਅਸੰਖ ਮੂਰਖ ਅੰਧ ਘੋਰ ॥
data.english: In the world, there are countless fools who are blinded by complete ignorance.

data.name: ਅਸੰਖ ਚੋਰ ਹਰਾਮਖੋਰ ॥
data.english: Countless are thieves and embezzlers.

data.name: ਅਸੰਖ ਅਮਰ ਕਰਿ ਜਾਹਿ ਜੋਰ ॥
data.english: Countless impose their will on others by force.

data.name: ਅਸੰਖ ਗਲਵਢ ਹਤਿਆ ਕਮਾਹਿ ॥
data.english: Countless are cut-throats and ruthless killers.

data.name: ਅਸੰਖ ਪਾਪੀ ਪਾਪੁ ਕਰਿ ਜਾਹਿ ॥
data.english: Countless are sinners who keep on committing sins.

data.name: ਅਸੰਖ ਕੂੜਿਆਰ ਕੂੜੇ ਫਿਰਾਹਿ ॥
data.english: Countless are liars, wandering lost in their lies.

data.name: ਅਸੰਖ ਮਲੇਛ ਮਲੁ ਭਖਿ ਖਾਹਿ ॥
data.english: Countless are wicked who thrive on immoral behavior.

data.name: ਅਸੰਖ ਨਿੰਦਕ ਸਿਰਿ ਕਰਹਿ ਭਾਰੁ ॥
data.english: Innumerable are the ones who speak ill of others and by doing so, carry the load of slander on their heads.

data.name: ਨਾਨਕੁ ਨੀਚੁ ਕਹੈ ਵੀਚਾਰੁ ॥
data.english: Lowly Nanak, only expresses this thought,

data.name: ਵਾਰਿਆ ਨ ਜਾਵਾ ਏਕ ਵਾਰ ॥
data.english: I am not worthy to dedicate myself to You even once.

data.name: ਜੋ ਤੁਧੁ ਭਾਵੈ ਸਾਈ ਭਲੀ ਕਾਰ ॥
data.english: O’ God, whatever pleases You, that alone is the best deed for all.

data.name: ਤੂ ਸਦਾ ਸਲਾਮਤਿ ਨਿਰੰਕਾਰ ॥੧੮॥
data.english: O’ the formless God, only You are the eternal one.

data.name: ਅਸੰਖ ਨਾਵ ਅਸੰਖ ਥਾਵ ॥
data.english: Countless are the names of Your creations and countless their places.

data.name: ਅਗੰਮ ਅਗੰਮ ਅਸੰਖ ਲੋਅ ॥
data.english: There are countless worlds that are inaccessible and beyond imagination.

data.name: ਅਸੰਖ ਕਹਹਿ ਸਿਰਿ ਭਾਰੁ ਹੋਇ ॥
data.english: Even to call them countless amounts to carrying loads of sin on the head.

data.name: ਅਖਰੀ ਨਾਮੁ ਅਖਰੀ ਸਾਲਾਹ ॥
data.english: It is by the use of the words that God’s Name can be recited; it is by the use of the words that His praises can be sung.

data.name: ਅਖਰੀ ਗਿਆਨੁ ਗੀਤ ਗੁਣ ਗਾਹ ॥
data.english: It is through the medium of words that divine knowledge can be acquired, His praises be sung and virtues be known.

data.name: ਅਖਰੀ ਲਿਖਣੁ ਬੋਲਣੁ ਬਾਣਿ ॥
data.english: The written and spoken language can only be expressed using words.

data.name: ਅਖਰਾ ਸਿਰਿ ਸੰਜੋਗੁ ਵਖਾਣਿ ॥
data.english: Only through words one’s destiny can be explained.

data.name: ਜਿਨਿ ਏਹਿ ਲਿਖੇ ਤਿਸੁ ਸਿਰਿ ਨਾਹਿ ॥
data.english: But God who has written everybody’s destiny, is beyond destiny.

data.name: ਜਿਵ ਫੁਰਮਾਏ ਤਿਵ ਤਿਵ ਪਾਹਿ ॥
data.english: As God ordains, so do we receive.

data.name: ਜੇਤਾ ਕੀਤਾ ਤੇਤਾ ਨਾਉ ॥
data.english: Whatever God has created is His manifestation (His Naam),

data.name: ਵਿਣੁ ਨਾਵੈ ਨਾਹੀ ਕੋ ਥਾਉ ॥
data.english: Without His Name, there is no place at all.

data.name: ਕੁਦਰਤਿ ਕਵਣ ਕਹਾ ਵੀਚਾਰੁ ॥
data.english: How can I comprehend and describe Your creation?

data.name: ਵਾਰਿਆ ਨ ਜਾਵਾ ਏਕ ਵਾਰ ॥
data.english: I am not worthy to dedicate myself to You even once.

data.name: ਜੋ ਤੁਧੁ ਭਾਵੈ ਸਾਈ ਭਲੀ ਕਾਰ ॥
data.english: O’ God, whatever pleases You, that alone is the best deed for all.

data.name: ਤੂ ਸਦਾ ਸਲਾਮਤਿ ਨਿਰੰਕਾਰ ॥੧੯॥
data.english: O’ the formless God! You alone are the eternal one.

data.name: ਭਰੀਐ ਹਥੁ ਪੈਰੁ ਤਨੁ ਦੇਹ ॥
data.english: If the hands, the feet and the body get soiled,

data.name: ਪਾਣੀ ਧੋਤੈ ਉਤਰਸੁ ਖੇਹ ॥
data.english: then by washing with water the dirt goes away.

data.name: ਮੂਤ ਪਲੀਤੀ ਕਪੜੁ ਹੋਇ ॥
data.english: If the clothes are soiled and stained by urine,

data.name: ਦੇ ਸਾਬੂਣੁ ਲਈਐ ਓਹੁ ਧੋਇ ॥
data.english: The it is washed by soap.

data.name: ਭਰੀਐ ਮਤਿ ਪਾਪਾ ਕੈ ਸੰਗਿ ॥
data.english: But when the intellect is polluted by sins,

data.name: ਓਹੁ ਧੋਪੈ ਨਾਵੈ ਕੈ ਰੰਗਿ ॥
data.english: it can only be cleansed by lovingly remembering God’s Name.

data.name: ਪੁੰਨੀ ਪਾਪੀ ਆਖਣੁ ਨਾਹਿ ॥
data.english: Virtuous and sinner are not just names or words for saying,

data.name: ਕਰਿ ਕਰਿ ਕਰਣਾ ਲਿਖਿ ਲੈ ਜਾਹੁ ॥
data.english: Whatever deeds you do in this world, you will take those attributes with you to the next life.

data.name: ਆਪੇ ਬੀਜਿ ਆਪੇ ਹੀ ਖਾਹੁ ॥
data.english: You would eat what you sow (you will endure the consequences of your deeds)

data.name: ਨਾਨਕ ਹੁਕਮੀ ਆਵਹੁ ਜਾਹੁ ॥੨੦॥
data.english: O’ Nanak, by God’s divine law, (based on your deeds) you will remain in the cycle of birth and death.

data.name: ਤੀਰਥੁ ਤਪੁ ਦਇਆ ਦਤੁ ਦਾਨੁ ॥
data.english: Pilgrimages, austere discipline, compassion and charity.

data.name: ਜੇ ਕੋ ਪਾਵੈ ਤਿਲ ਕਾ ਮਾਨੁ ॥
data.english: these, by themselves, bring only an iota of merit.

data.name: ਸੁਣਿਆ ਮੰਨਿਆ ਮਨਿ ਕੀਤਾ ਭਾਉ ॥
data.english: One who has listened and believed in God’s Name with love in mind,

data.name: ਅੰਤਰਗਤਿ ਤੀਰਥਿ ਮਲਿ ਨਾਉ ॥
data.english: he has purified himself by bathing in the holy place of his inner self (where God resides), and has truly removed the filth of sins.

data.name: ਸਭਿ ਗੁਣ ਤੇਰੇ ਮੈ ਨਾਹੀ ਕੋਇ ॥
data.english: O’ God, all the virtues in me are Your gifts; on my own, I have none.

data.name: ਵਿਣੁ ਗੁਣ ਕੀਤੇ ਭਗਤਿ ਨ ਹੋਇ ॥
data.english: Without You bestowing these virtues, I cannot perform Your devotional worship.

data.name: ਸੁਅਸਤਿ ਆਥਿ ਬਾਣੀ ਬਰਮਾਉ ॥
data.english: O’ God! You Yourself are Maya, Yourself the divine Word, and Yourself Brahma, I bow to You.

data.name: ਸਤਿ ਸੁਹਾਣੁ ਸਦਾ ਮਨਿ ਚਾਉ ॥
data.english: You are eternal, immaculate and Your mind always remains delighted.

data.name: ਕਵਣੁ ਸੁ ਵੇਲਾ ਵਖਤੁ ਕਵਣੁ ਕਵਣ ਥਿਤਿ ਕਵਣੁ ਵਾਰੁ ॥
data.english: What was that time and what was that moment? What was that day and what was that date?

data.name: ਕਵਣਿ ਸਿ ਰੁਤੀ ਮਾਹੁ ਕਵਣੁ ਜਿਤੁ ਹੋਆ ਆਕਾਰੁ ॥
data.english: What was that season and what was that month, when the Universe was created?

data.name: ਵੇਲ ਨ ਪਾਈਆ ਪੰਡਤੀ ਜਿ ਹੋਵੈ ਲੇਖੁ ਪੁਰਾਣੁ ॥
data.english: The pandits did not know that time when the universe was created, otherwise they would have recorded in the holy books.

data.name: ਵਖਤੁ ਨ ਪਾਇਓ ਕਾਦੀਆ ਜਿ ਲਿਖਨਿ ਲੇਖੁ ਕੁਰਾਣੁ ॥
data.english: That time is not known to the Qazis, otherwise it would have been written in the Koran.

data.name: ਥਿਤਿ ਵਾਰੁ ਨਾ ਜੋਗੀ ਜਾਣੈ ਰੁਤਿ ਮਾਹੁ ਨਾ ਕੋਈ ॥
data.english: Neither any yogi nor any other person knows the lunar or solar day, season, or month in which this universe was created.

data.name: ਜਾ ਕਰਤਾ ਸਿਰਠੀ ਕਉ ਸਾਜੇ ਆਪੇ ਜਾਣੈ ਸੋਈ ॥
data.english: Only the Creator who created this creation knows about it.

data.name: ਕਿਵ ਕਰਿ ਆਖਾ ਕਿਵ ਸਾਲਾਹੀ ਕਿਉ ਵਰਨੀ ਕਿਵ ਜਾਣਾ ॥
data.english: How can I describe God’s greatness, how can I praise Him? How can I describe His virtues? How can I relize Him?

data.name: ਨਾਨਕ ਆਖਣਿ ਸਭੁ ਕੋ ਆਖੈ ਇਕ ਦੂ ਇਕੁ ਸਿਆਣਾ ॥
data.english: O’ Nanak, everyone tries to describe the glory of God, while each thinking himself wiser than the others.

data.name: ਵਡਾ ਸਾਹਿਬੁ ਵਡੀ ਨਾਈ ਕੀਤਾ ਜਾ ਕਾ ਹੋਵੈ ॥
data.english: God is the supreme Master, and great is His glory; whatever happens is according to His will.

data.name: ਨਾਨਕ ਜੇ ਕੋ ਆਪੌ ਜਾਣੈ ਅਗੈ ਗਇਆ ਨ ਸੋਹੈ ॥੨੧॥
data.english: O’ Nanak, if anyone claims to know all about God and His creation, would not be honored in God’s presence.

data.name: ਪਾਤਾਲਾ ਪਾਤਾਲ ਲਖ ਆਗਾਸਾ ਆਗਾਸ ॥
data.english: There are nether regions beneath nether regions of this world, and hundreds of thousands of heavenly worlds above.

data.name: ਓੜਕ ਓੜਕ ਭਾਲਿ ਥਕੇ ਵੇਦ ਕਹਨਿ ਇਕ ਵਾਤ ॥
data.english: The vedas say that scholars have exhausted themselves trying to find the limits of God’s creation.

data.name: ਸਹਸ ਅਠਾਰਹ ਕਹਨਿ ਕਤੇਬਾ ਅਸੁਲੂ ਇਕੁ ਧਾਤੁ ॥
data.english: The scriptures say that there are eighteen thousand worlds, which originated from a single source, the Creator-God.

data.name: ਲੇਖਾ ਹੋਇ ਤ ਲਿਖੀਐ ਲੇਖੈ ਹੋਇ ਵਿਣਾਸੁ ॥
data.english: Accounting for the limitless and infinite creation of God is just not possible due to lack of digits because while counting, the digits would end.

data.name: ਨਾਨਕ ਵਡਾ ਆਖੀਐ ਆਪੇ ਜਾਣੈ ਆਪੁ ॥੨੨॥
data.english: O’ Nanak, God is great, He alone knows how great He is.

data.name: ਸਾਲਾਹੀ ਸਾਲਾਹਿ ਏਤੀ ਸੁਰਤਿ ਨ ਪਾਈਆ ॥
data.english: Even those who praise God cannot comprehend how great He is?.

data.name: ਨਦੀਆ ਅਤੈ ਵਾਹ ਪਵਹਿ ਸਮੁੰਦਿ ਨ ਜਾਣੀਅਹਿ ॥
data.english: They are like those streams and rivers flowing into the ocean, but do not know  the vastness of the ocean.

data.name: ਸਮੁੰਦ ਸਾਹ ਸੁਲਤਾਨ ਗਿਰਹਾ ਸੇਤੀ ਮਾਲੁ ਧਨੁ ॥
data.english: Even kings and emperors, with mountains of property and oceans of wealth,

data.name: ਕੀੜੀ ਤੁਲਿ ਨ ਹੋਵਨੀ ਜੇ ਤਿਸੁ ਮਨਹੁ ਨ ਵੀਸਰਹਿ ॥੨੩॥
data.english: they are no match to the poorest of the poor who does not forget God.

data.name: ਅੰਤੁ ਨ ਸਿਫਤੀ ਕਹਣਿ ਨ ਅੰਤੁ ॥
data.english: There is no end to God’s virtues, there is no end to their descriptions.

data.name: ਅੰਤੁ ਨ ਕਰਣੈ ਦੇਣਿ ਨ ਅੰਤੁ ॥
data.english: There is no end to His creation, there is no end to His gifts to us.

data.name: ਅੰਤੁ ਨ ਵੇਖਣਿ ਸੁਣਣਿ ਨ ਅੰਤੁ ॥
data.english: The limits of His virtues cannot be perceived by looking at or hearing about His creation.

data.name: ਅੰਤੁ ਨ ਜਾਪੈ ਕਿਆ ਮਨਿ ਮੰਤੁ ॥
data.english: It is impossible to know what is God’s motive?

data.name: ਅੰਤੁ ਨ ਜਾਪੈ ਕੀਤਾ ਆਕਾਰੁ ॥
data.english: The limits of the created universe cannot be perceived.

data.name: ਅੰਤੁ ਨ ਜਾਪੈ ਪਾਰਾਵਾਰੁ ॥
data.english: It is impossible to know where His creation starts and where it ends.

data.name: ਅੰਤ ਕਾਰਣਿ ਕੇਤੇ ਬਿਲਲਾਹਿ ॥
data.english: Many struggle to know His limits,

data.name: ਤਾ ਕੇ ਅੰਤ ਨ ਪਾਏ ਜਾਹਿ ॥
data.english: but His limits cannot be found.

data.name: ਏਹੁ ਅੰਤੁ ਨ ਜਾਣੈ ਕੋਇ ॥
data.english: No one can know these limits.

data.name: ਬਹੁਤਾ ਕਹੀਐ ਬਹੁਤਾ ਹੋਇ ॥
data.english: The more you say about them, the more there still remains to be said.

data.name: ਵਡਾ ਸਾਹਿਬੁ ਊਚਾ ਥਾਉ ॥
data.english: He is the supreme Master and His abode is the Highest.

data.name: ਊਚੇ ਉਪਰਿ ਊਚਾ ਨਾਉ ॥
data.english: Highest of the High, is His glory.

data.name: ਏਵਡੁ ਊਚਾ ਹੋਵੈ ਕੋਇ ॥
data.english: Only someone as great as Him,

data.name: ਤਿਸੁ ਊਚੇ ਕਉ ਜਾਣੈ ਸੋਇ ॥
data.english: can know His supreme and Exalted State.

data.name: ਜੇਵਡੁ ਆਪਿ ਜਾਣੈ ਆਪਿ ਆਪਿ ॥
data.english: Only He Himself knows how Great He Is.

data.name: ਨਾਨਕ ਨਦਰੀ ਕਰਮੀ ਦਾਤਿ ॥੨੪॥
data.english: O’ Nanak, His blessing is received only by His gracious glance.

data.name: ਬਹੁਤਾ ਕਰਮੁ ਲਿਖਿਆ ਨਾ ਜਾਇ ॥
data.english: His Blessings are so abundant that there can be no written account of them.

data.name: ਵਡਾ ਦਾਤਾ ਤਿਲੁ ਨ ਤਮਾਇ ॥
data.english: The Great Giver has no greed or expectation of anything in return.

data.name: ਕੇਤੇ ਮੰਗਹਿ ਜੋਧ ਅਪਾਰ ॥
data.english: There are so many great, heroic warriors begging at the door of the infinite God.

data.name: ਕੇਤਿਆ ਗਣਤ ਨਹੀ ਵੀਚਾਰੁ ॥
data.english: Many more, who cannot be counted, are begging for His bounties.

data.name: ਕੇਤੇ ਖਪਿ ਤੁਟਹਿ ਵੇਕਾਰ ॥
data.english: Many remain consumed in vices and die in anxiety.

data.name: ਕੇਤੇ ਲੈ ਲੈ ਮੁਕਰੁ ਪਾਹਿ ॥
data.english: Many keep on receiving His gifts, but deny receiving them.

data.name: ਕੇਤੇ ਮੂਰਖ ਖਾਹੀ ਖਾਹਿ ॥
data.english: So many fools keep on consuming, but forget the Giver.

data.name: ਕੇਤਿਆ ਦੂਖ ਭੂਖ ਸਦ ਮਾਰ ॥
data.english: So many are destined to endure distress, deprivation and constant abuse.

data.name: ਏਹਿ ਭਿ ਦਾਤਿ ਤੇਰੀ ਦਾਤਾਰ ॥
data.english: O’ great giver, even these sufferings are Your blessings,  because many times people remembers You only in distress.

data.name: ਬੰਦਿ ਖਲਾਸੀ ਭਾਣੈ ਹੋਇ ॥
data.english: Freedom from attachment to worldly things comes only by accepting Your Will.

data.name: ਹੋਰੁ ਆਖਿ ਨ ਸਕੈ ਕੋਇ ॥
data.english: No one else has any say in this.

data.name: ਜੇ ਕੋ ਖਾਇਕੁ ਆਖਣਿ ਪਾਇ ॥
data.english: If some fool presume that he does have a say in it,

data.name: ਓਹੁ ਜਾਣੈ ਜੇਤੀਆ ਮੁਹਿ ਖਾਇ ॥
data.english: only he would know how much suffering he will have to endure for this folly.

data.name: ਆਪੇ ਜਾਣੈ ਆਪੇ ਦੇਇ ॥
data.english: God Himself knows our needs, and He on His own, keeps on giving.’

data.name: ਆਖਹਿ ਸਿ ਭਿ ਕੇਈ ਕੇਇ ॥
data.english: Yet only a few acknowledge this (fact).

data.name: ਜਿਸ ਨੋ ਬਖਸੇ ਸਿਫਤਿ ਸਾਲਾਹ ॥
data.english: One who is blessed to sing the praises of God,

data.name: ਨਾਨਕ ਪਾਤਿਸਾਹੀ ਪਾਤਿਸਾਹੁ ॥੨੫॥
data.english: O’ Nanak, he is the spiritually richest person in the world.

data.name: ਅਮੁਲ ਗੁਣ ਅਮੁਲ ਵਾਪਾਰ ॥
data.english: Priceless are God’s virtues, priceless is the effort to acquire those virtues.

data.name: ਅਮੁਲ ਵਾਪਾਰੀਏ ਅਮੁਲ ਭੰਡਾਰ ॥
data.english: Priceless are those who acquire and priceless are Your treasures.

data.name: ਅਮੁਲ ਆਵਹਿ ਅਮੁਲ ਲੈ ਜਾਹਿ ॥
data.english: Priceless are those who come to this world and depart after acquiring His virtues.

data.name: ਅਮੁਲ ਭਾਇ ਅਮੁਲਾ ਸਮਾਹਿ ॥
data.english: Priceless are those who are imbued in His love and are absorbed in Him.

data.name: ਅਮੁਲੁ ਧਰਮੁ ਅਮੁਲੁ ਦੀਬਾਣੁ ॥
data.english: Priceless is the Divine Law and Priceless is Divine Justice.

data.name: ਅਮੁਲੁ ਤੁਲੁ ਅਮੁਲੁ ਪਰਵਾਣੁ ॥
data.english: Priceless is His system of justice and Priceless are the laws of Divine justice.

data.name: ਅਮੁਲੁ ਬਖਸੀਸ ਅਮੁਲੁ ਨੀਸਾਣੁ ॥
data.english: Priceless are His blessings and priceless are His bounties (mark of His grace)

data.name: ਅਮੁਲੁ ਕਰਮੁ ਅਮੁਲੁ ਫੁਰਮਾਣੁ ॥
data.english: Priceless is His Mercy, Priceless is His Command.

data.name: ਅਮੁਲੋ ਅਮੁਲੁ ਆਖਿਆ ਨ ਜਾਇ ॥
data.english: He is priceless, priceless beyond any expression.

data.name: ਆਖਿ ਆਖਿ ਰਹੇ ਲਿਵ ਲਾਇ ॥
data.english: Many continuously describe His virtues and go into deep meditation, but still cannot fully describe them.

data.name: ਆਖਹਿ ਵੇਦ ਪਾਠ ਪੁਰਾਣ ॥
data.english: The writings in the holy scriptures (Vedas and Puranas) try to describe Him.

data.name: ਆਖਹਿ ਪੜੇ ਕਰਹਿ ਵਖਿਆਣ ॥
data.english: The scholars speak of Him and give discourses to describe Him.

data.name: ਆਖਹਿ ਬਰਮੇ ਆਖਹਿ ਇੰਦ ॥
data.english: Countless brahma and Indra speak of God’s glory.

data.name: ਆਖਹਿ ਗੋਪੀ ਤੈ ਗੋਵਿੰਦ ॥
data.english: Countless Krishna and his Gopis sing God’s praises

data.name: ਆਖਹਿ ਈਸਰ ਆਖਹਿ ਸਿਧ ॥
data.english: Countless shiva and siddhas (men of miracles) sing praises of God.

data.name: ਆਖਹਿ ਕੇਤੇ ਕੀਤੇ ਬੁਧ ॥
data.english: Many intellectuals created by God describe His virtues.

data.name: ਆਖਹਿ ਦਾਨਵ ਆਖਹਿ ਦੇਵ ॥
data.english: The demons and the angels also sing God’s praises.

data.name: ਆਖਹਿ ਸੁਰਿ ਨਰ ਮੁਨਿ ਜਨ ਸੇਵ ॥
data.english: Many pious men, sages and their followers sing God’s praises.

data.name: ਕੇਤੇ ਆਖਹਿ ਆਖਣਿ ਪਾਹਿ ॥
data.english: Many are describing and many are getting ready to describe God’s virtues according to their capabilities.

data.name: ਕੇਤੇ ਕਹਿ ਕਹਿ ਉਠਿ ਉਠਿ ਜਾਹਿ ॥
data.english: Many depart from this world after repeatedly speaking about God’s virtues.

data.name: ਏਤੇ ਕੀਤੇ ਹੋਰਿ ਕਰੇਹਿ ॥
data.english: O’ God, if You were to create as many people again as there already are,

data.name: ਤਾ ਆਖਿ ਨ ਸਕਹਿ ਕੇਈ ਕੇਇ ॥
data.english: even then, they would not be able to fully describe Your virtues.

data.name: ਜੇਵਡੁ ਭਾਵੈ ਤੇਵਡੁ ਹੋਇ ॥
data.english: God becomes as Great as He wishes to be.

data.name: ਨਾਨਕ ਜਾਣੈ ਸਾਚਾ ਸੋਇ ॥
data.english: O’ Nanak, only He, the eternal God knows how great He is?

data.name: ਜੇ ਕੋ ਆਖੈ ਬੋਲੁਵਿਗਾੜੁ ॥
data.english: If anyone inappropiately claims to be able to describe God,

data.name: ਤਾ ਲਿਖੀਐ ਸਿਰਿ ਗਾਵਾਰਾ ਗਾਵਾਰੁ ॥੨੬॥
data.english: then his Name should be written at the top of the list of greatest fools.

data.name: ਸੋ ਦਰੁ ਕੇਹਾ ਸੋ ਘਰੁ ਕੇਹਾ ਜਿਤੁ ਬਹਿ ਸਰਬ ਸਮਾਲੇ ॥
data.english: O’ God,  how magnificent is Your abode and how amazing is that door, from where You are taking care of all Your creation.

data.name: ਵਾਜੇ ਨਾਦ ਅਨੇਕ ਅਸੰਖਾ ਕੇਤੇ ਵਾਵਣਹਾਰੇ ॥
data.english: In this wonderful creation of Yours, countless musicians playing innumerable musical instruments, producing infinite numbers of melodies.

data.name: ਕੇਤੇ ਰਾਗ ਪਰੀ ਸਿਉ ਕਹੀਅਨਿ ਕੇਤੇ ਗਾਵਣਹਾਰੇ ॥
data.english: Countless singers are singing many musical measures along with their consorts.

data.name: ਗਾਵਹਿ ਤੁਹਨੋ ਪਉਣੁ ਪਾਣੀ ਬੈਸੰਤਰੁ ਗਾਵੈ ਰਾਜਾ ਧਰਮੁ ਦੁਆਰੇ ॥
data.english: The wind, the water and the fire in their own way are singing of You; even the Dharamraj, the judge of our deeds, is singing Your praises at Your doorstep.

data.name: ਗਾਵਹਿ ਚਿਤੁ ਗੁਪਤੁ ਲਿਖਿ ਜਾਣਹਿ ਲਿਖਿ ਲਿਖਿ ਧਰਮੁ ਵੀਚਾਰੇ ॥
data.english: Chitra and Gupta (angels), who write the account of people’s deeds and on whose records dharamraj makes judgement, are also singing Your Praises.

data.name: ਗਾਵਹਿ ਈਸਰੁ ਬਰਮਾ ਦੇਵੀ ਸੋਹਨਿ ਸਦਾ ਸਵਾਰੇ ॥
data.english: The god Shiva, Brahma and the goddess who are embellished by You, are also singing Your praises

data.name: ਗਾਵਹਿ ਇੰਦ ਇਦਾਸਣਿ ਬੈਠੇ ਦੇਵਤਿਆ ਦਰਿ ਨਾਲੇ ॥
data.english: The god Indra seated on his throne with many other angels standing at Your doorstep are singing Your praises.

data.name: ਗਾਵਹਿ ਸਿਧ ਸਮਾਧੀ ਅੰਦਰਿ ਗਾਵਨਿ ਸਾਧ ਵਿਚਾਰੇ ॥
data.english: The siddhas (men with miraculous powers) are praising You in deep meditation, the saints are contemplating and are singing Your praises.

data.name: ਗਾਵਨਿ ਜਤੀ ਸਤੀ ਸੰਤੋਖੀ ਗਾਵਹਿ ਵੀਰ ਕਰਾਰੇ ॥
data.english: The men of discipline, charity, contentment, and brave warriors are all singing Your praises.

data.name: ਗਾਵਨਿ ਪੰਡਿਤ ਪੜਨਿ ਰਖੀਸਰ ਜੁਗੁ ਜੁਗੁ ਵੇਦਾ ਨਾਲੇ ॥
data.english: The pandits and the great sages who have been reading Vedas since ages are singing Your praises.

data.name: ਗਾਵਹਿ ਮੋਹਣੀਆ ਮਨੁ ਮੋਹਨਿ ਸੁਰਗਾ ਮਛ ਪਇਆਲੇ ॥
data.english: The beautiful fascinating maids in heaven, on earth and in the nether regions  are singing Your praises.

data.name: ਗਾਵਨਿ ਰਤਨ ਉਪਾਏ ਤੇਰੇ ਅਠਸਠਿ ਤੀਰਥ ਨਾਲੇ ॥
data.english: The precious jewels created by You, along with all the sixty eight places of pilgrimage are singing Your praises.

data.name: ਗਾਵਹਿ ਜੋਧ ਮਹਾਬਲ ਸੂਰਾ ਗਾਵਹਿ ਖਾਣੀ ਚਾਰੇ ॥
data.english: The brave and mighty warriors and creatures from all four sources of life are singing your praises.

data.name: ਗਾਵਹਿ ਖੰਡ ਮੰਡਲ ਵਰਭੰਡਾ ਕਰਿ ਕਰਿ ਰਖੇ ਧਾਰੇ ॥
data.english: All the continents, galaxies and solar systems in the entire universe created and supported by You, are singing of You.

data.name: ਸੇਈ ਤੁਧੁਨੋ ਗਾਵਹਿ ਜੋ ਤੁਧੁ ਭਾਵਨਿ ਰਤੇ ਤੇਰੇ ਭਗਤ ਰਸਾਲੇ ॥
data.english: Only those sing your praises who are pleasing to You and are truly devoted and imbued with Your love.

data.name: ਹੋਰਿ ਕੇਤੇ ਗਾਵਨਿ ਸੇ ਮੈ ਚਿਤਿ ਨ ਆਵਨਿ ਨਾਨਕੁ ਕਿਆ ਵੀਚਾਰੇ ॥
data.english: Many more are singing of You, which are not coming into my mind; how can   Nanak think about all those who sing Your praises?

data.name: ਸੋਈ ਸੋਈ ਸਦਾ ਸਚੁ ਸਾਹਿਬੁ ਸਾਚਾ ਸਾਚੀ ਨਾਈ ॥
data.english: Only God is ever existing, the Master-God and His glory is eternal.

data.name: ਹੈ ਭੀ ਹੋਸੀ ਜਾਇ ਨ ਜਾਸੀ ਰਚਨਾ ਜਿਨਿ ਰਚਾਈ ॥
data.english: He who has created this universe is present now, will always be present in the future; neither He was born nor He shall die.

data.name: ਰੰਗੀ ਰੰਗੀ ਭਾਤੀ ਕਰਿ ਕਰਿ ਜਿਨਸੀ ਮਾਇਆ ਜਿਨਿ ਉਪਾਈ ॥
data.english: God who has created Maya, in many colors, varieties and species.

data.name: ਕਰਿ ਕਰਿ ਵੇਖੈ ਕੀਤਾ ਆਪਣਾ ਜਿਵ ਤਿਸ ਦੀ ਵਡਿਆਈ ॥
data.english: He creates and then takes care of His creation as per His will.

data.name: ਜੋ ਤਿਸੁ ਭਾਵੈ ਸੋਈ ਕਰਸੀ ਹੁਕਮੁ ਨ ਕਰਣਾ ਜਾਈ ॥
data.english: He does whatever pleases Him and no one can issue order to Him.

data.name: ਸੋ ਪਾਤਿਸਾਹੁ ਸਾਹਾ ਪਾਤਿਸਾਹਿਬੁ ਨਾਨਕ ਰਹਣੁ ਰਜਾਈ ॥੨੭॥
data.english: O’ Nanak, God is the emperor of the emperors and to live according to His will is best for all.

data.name: ਮੁੰਦਾ ਸੰਤੋਖੁ ਸਰਮੁ ਪਤੁ ਝੋਲੀ ਧਿਆਨ ਕੀ ਕਰਹਿ ਬਿਭੂਤਿ ॥
data.english: O’ yogi, make contentment as your earrings, hard work your begging bowl and meditation on God’ Name as the ashes that cover your body.

data.name: ਖਿੰਥਾ ਕਾਲੁ ਕੁਆਰੀ ਕਾਇਆ ਜੁਗਤਿ ਡੰਡਾ ਪਰਤੀਤਿ ॥
data.english: Let the awareness of death be your patched coat, a high moral character as your way of life and faith in God as your walking stick.

data.name: ਆਈ ਪੰਥੀ ਸਗਲ ਜਮਾਤੀ ਮਨਿ ਜੀਤੈ ਜਗੁ ਜੀਤੁ ॥
data.english: Let universal brotherhood be your sect; by controlling your mind you can win over the worldly temptations.

data.name: ਆਦੇਸੁ ਤਿਸੈ ਆਦੇਸੁ ॥
data.english: Humbly bow to God,

data.name: ਆਦਿ ਅਨੀਲੁ ਅਨਾਦਿ ਅਨਾਹਤਿ ਜੁਗੁ ਜੁਗੁ ਏਕੋ ਵੇਸੁ ॥੨੮॥
data.english: who is primal, immaculate, without beginning, without end and unchanging through the ages.

data.name: ਭੁਗਤਿ ਗਿਆਨੁ ਦਇਆ ਭੰਡਾਰਣਿ ਘਟਿ ਘਟਿ ਵਾਜਹਿ ਨਾਦ ॥
data.english: O’ Yogi, let divine knowledge be your food, kindness your serving lady and the sound of each and every heartbeat be the holy sound of the horn.

data.name: ਆਪਿ ਨਾਥੁ ਨਾਥੀ ਸਭ ਜਾ ਕੀ ਰਿਧਿ ਸਿਧਿ ਅਵਰਾ ਸਾਦ ॥
data.english: God Himself is the Master of all, who controls the entire universe; miracles and other spiritual powers are the diversions that take one away from God.

data.name: ਸੰਜੋਗੁ ਵਿਜੋਗੁ ਦੁਇ ਕਾਰ ਚਲਾਵਹਿ ਲੇਖੇ ਆਵਹਿ ਭਾਗ ॥
data.english: God’s law of union and separation of individuals regulates the play of the world  and one receives what one is predestined for.

data.name: ਆਦੇਸੁ ਤਿਸੈ ਆਦੇਸੁ ॥
data.english: Humbly bow to God,

data.name: ਆਦਿ ਅਨੀਲੁ ਅਨਾਦਿ ਅਨਾਹਤਿ ਜੁਗੁ ਜੁਗੁ ਏਕੋ ਵੇਸੁ ॥੨੯॥
data.english: who is the primal, immaculate, without beginning, indestructible and unchanging through the ages.

data.name: ਏਕਾ ਮਾਈ ਜੁਗਤਿ ਵਿਆਈ ਤਿਨਿ ਚੇਲੇ ਪਰਵਾਣੁ ॥
data.english: According to Hindu beliefs, Maya (worldly illusion) mysteriously conceived and gave birth to three sons (deities).

data.name: ਇਕੁ ਸੰਸਾਰੀ ਇਕੁ ਭੰਡਾਰੀ ਇਕੁ ਲਾਏ ਦੀਬਾਣੁ ॥
data.english: One is believed to be the creator of the world, one the sustainer and another one the destroyer.

data.name: ਜਿਵ ਤਿਸੁ ਭਾਵੈ ਤਿਵੈ ਚਲਾਵੈ ਜਿਵ ਹੋਵੈ ਫੁਰਮਾਣੁ ॥
data.english: (But the fact is that), God Himself is directing these actions as He pleases and everything happens as He commands.

data.name: ਓਹੁ ਵੇਖੈ ਓਨਾ ਨਦਰਿ ਨ ਆਵੈ ਬਹੁਤਾ ਏਹੁ ਵਿਡਾਣੁ ॥
data.english: The greatest wonder is that God watches over all, but none can see Him.

data.name: ਆਦੇਸੁ ਤਿਸੈ ਆਦੇਸੁ ॥
data.english: Humbly bow to that God,

data.name: ਆਦਿ ਅਨੀਲੁ ਅਨਾਦਿ ਅਨਾਹਤਿ ਜੁਗੁ ਜੁਗੁ ਏਕੋ ਵੇਸੁ ॥੩੦॥
data.english: who is primal, immaculate, without beginning, indestructible and unchanging through the ages.

data.name: ਆਸਣੁ ਲੋਇ ਲੋਇ ਭੰਡਾਰ ॥
data.english: God is present in the entire universe and the universe is full of His bounties.

data.name: ਜੋ ਕਿਛੁ ਪਾਇਆ ਸੁ ਏਕਾ ਵਾਰ ॥
data.english: Whatever bounties He has put in the universe, He has put these once for all.

data.name: ਕਰਿ ਕਰਿ ਵੇਖੈ ਸਿਰਜਣਹਾਰੁ ॥
data.english: Having created the universe, God is looking after His creation.

data.name: ਨਾਨਕ ਸਚੇ ਕੀ ਸਾਚੀ ਕਾਰ ॥
data.english: O’ Nanak, God’s system of sustaining His creation is perfect (flawless).

data.name: ਆਦੇਸੁ ਤਿਸੈ ਆਦੇਸੁ ॥
data.english: Humbly bow to that Almighty God.

data.name: ਆਦਿ ਅਨੀਲੁ ਅਨਾਦਿ ਅਨਾਹਤਿ ਜੁਗੁ ਜੁਗੁ ਏਕੋ ਵੇਸੁ ॥੩੧॥
data.english: who is the source of everything, immaculate, without beginning, indestructible and unchanging through the ages.

data.name: ਇਕ ਦੂ ਜੀਭੌ ਲਖ ਹੋਹਿ ਲਖ ਹੋਵਹਿ ਲਖ ਵੀਸ ॥
data.english: If instead of one tongue, one had hundred thousand tongues and even twenty times more,

data.name: ਲਖੁ ਲਖੁ ਗੇੜਾ ਆਖੀਅਹਿ ਏਕੁ ਨਾਮੁ ਜਗਦੀਸ ॥
data.english: and if God’s Name is recited millions of times with each tongue.

data.name: ਏਤੁ ਰਾਹਿ ਪਤਿ ਪਵੜੀਆ ਚੜੀਐ ਹੋਇ ਇਕੀਸ ॥
data.english: Then this remembrance of God with adoration are the steps on the way to realize God, ascending these steps one can become one with Him.

data.name: ਸੁਣਿ ਗਲਾ ਆਕਾਸ ਕੀ ਕੀਟਾ ਆਈ ਰੀਸ ॥
data.english: After listening about the spiritually awakened people, the lowly persons wish to emulate them as if the worms wish to fly like birds.

data.name: ਨਾਨਕ ਨਦਰੀ ਪਾਈਐ ਕੂੜੀ ਕੂੜੈ ਠੀਸ ॥੩੨॥
data.english: O’ Nanak, God is realized only by His grace, all else is false bragging of liars.

data.name: ਆਖਣਿ ਜੋਰੁ ਚੁਪੈ ਨਹ ਜੋਰੁ ॥
data.english: We do not have any power by ourselves to speak or to remain silent

data.name: ਜੋਰੁ ਨ ਮੰਗਣਿ ਦੇਣਿ ਨ ਜੋਰੁ ॥
data.english: We have neither the power to ask nor to give (we get what is destined for us and the spirit of giving comes by God’s blessings)

data.name: ਜੋਰੁ ਨ ਜੀਵਣਿ ਮਰਣਿ ਨਹ ਜੋਰੁ ॥
data.english: Life and death too are not in our control.

data.name: ਜੋਰੁ ਨ ਰਾਜਿ ਮਾਲਿ ਮਨਿ ਸੋਰੁ ॥
data.english: Acquiring power and worldly wealth, which cause ego in our mind, is beyond our control.

data.name: ਜੋਰੁ ਨ ਸੁਰਤੀ ਗਿਆਨਿ ਵੀਚਾਰਿ ॥
data.english: We have no power to achieve spiritual awakening, knowledge or thinking.

data.name: ਜੋਰੁ ਨ ਜੁਗਤੀ ਛੁਟੈ ਸੰਸਾਰੁ ॥
data.english: We have no power to escape from worldly temptations.

data.name: ਜਿਸੁ ਹਥਿ ਜੋਰੁ ਕਰਿ ਵੇਖੈ ਸੋਇ ॥
data.english: God alone who has the Power to create and take care of creation.

data.name: ਨਾਨਕ ਉਤਮੁ ਨੀਚੁ ਨ ਕੋਇ ॥੩੩॥
data.english: O’ Nanak, on one’s own, no one becomes superior or inferior (one becomes what God makes him).

data.name: ਰਾਤੀ ਰੁਤੀ ਥਿਤੀ ਵਾਰ ॥
data.english: The nights, seasons, lunar days, week days,

data.name: ਪਵਣ ਪਾਣੀ ਅਗਨੀ ਪਾਤਾਲ ॥
data.english: wind, water, fire and the nether regions,

data.name: ਤਿਸੁ ਵਿਚਿ ਧਰਤੀ ਥਾਪਿ ਰਖੀ ਧਰਮ ਸਾਲ ॥
data.english: in the midst of all these, God established the earth as a stage for humans to perform righteous deeds for their spiritual growth.

data.name: ਤਿਸੁ ਵਿਚਿ ਜੀਅ ਜੁਗਤਿ ਕੇ ਰੰਗ ॥
data.english: On this stage reside beings of various species and forms.

data.name: ਤਿਨ ਕੇ ਨਾਮ ਅਨੇਕ ਅਨੰਤ ॥
data.english: whose names are countless and endless.

data.name: ਕਰਮੀ ਕਰਮੀ ਹੋਇ ਵੀਚਾਰੁ ॥
data.english: Human beings are judged based on their deeds.

data.name: ਸਚਾ ਆਪਿ ਸਚਾ ਦਰਬਾਰੁ ॥
data.english: God Himself is true, and true is His justice.

data.name: ਤਿਥੈ ਸੋਹਨਿ ਪੰਚ ਪਰਵਾਣੁ ॥
data.english: The chosen and the accepted ones look graceful in that system of justice.

data.name: ਨਦਰੀ ਕਰਮਿ ਪਵੈ ਨੀਸਾਣੁ ॥
data.english: They receive the mark of grace from the Merciful God.

data.name: ਕਚ ਪਕਾਈ ਓਥੈ ਪਾਇ ॥
data.english: Success or failure in terms of spiritual growth is judged in God’s presence.

data.name: ਨਾਨਕ ਗਇਆ ਜਾਪੈ ਜਾਇ ॥੩੪॥
data.english: O’ Nanak, it is only upon reaching God’s Presence that one discovers if one succeeded or failed.

data.name: ਧਰਮ ਖੰਡ ਕਾ ਏਹੋ ਧਰਮੁ ॥
data.english: This is the account of the moral duty of a person in Dharam khand (first stage of spiritual development as described in the above stanza).

data.name: ਗਿਆਨ ਖੰਡ ਕਾ ਆਖਹੁ ਕਰਮੁ ॥
data.english: Now I (Nanak) am describing the working of Gyan Khand, the stage of acquiring divine knowledge.

data.name: ਕੇਤੇ ਪਵਣ ਪਾਣੀ ਵੈਸੰਤਰ ਕੇਤੇ ਕਾਨ ਮਹੇਸ ॥
data.english: In God’s creation, there are so many forms of winds, waters and fires; so many gods Krishnas and Shivas.

data.name: ਕੇਤੇ ਬਰਮੇ ਘਾੜਤਿ ਘੜੀਅਹਿ ਰੂਪ ਰੰਗ ਕੇ ਵੇਸ ॥
data.english: So many gods-like Brahmas are being created in countless forms and colors.

data.name: ਕੇਤੀਆ ਕਰਮ ਭੂਮੀ ਮੇਰ ਕੇਤੇ ਕੇਤੇ ਧੂ ਉਪਦੇਸ ॥
data.english: There are many earths and many mountains where people perform their duties, and there are many saints like Dhru and many are their teachings.

data.name: ਕੇਤੇ ਇੰਦ ਚੰਦ ਸੂਰ ਕੇਤੇ ਕੇਤੇ ਮੰਡਲ ਦੇਸ ॥
data.english: There are many Indras, moons, suns and many planetary systems.

data.name: ਕੇਤੇ ਸਿਧ ਬੁਧ ਨਾਥ ਕੇਤੇ ਕੇਤੇ ਦੇਵੀ ਵੇਸ ॥
data.english: There are many sidhas with miraculous powers, many wise people, many yogis and many goddesses in different forms.

data.name: ਕੇਤੇ ਦੇਵ ਦਾਨਵ ਮੁਨਿ ਕੇਤੇ ਕੇਤੇ ਰਤਨ ਸਮੁੰਦ ॥
data.english: There are so many pious people, so many demons, so many sages and so many oceans of jewels.

data.name: ਕੇਤੀਆ ਖਾਣੀ ਕੇਤੀਆ ਬਾਣੀ ਕੇਤੇ ਪਾਤ ਨਰਿੰਦ ॥
data.english: There are so many sources of life, languages, and so many kings and emperors.

data.name: ਕੇਤੀਆ ਸੁਰਤੀ ਸੇਵਕ ਕੇਤੇ ਨਾਨਕ ਅੰਤੁ ਨ ਅੰਤੁ ॥੩੫॥
data.english: There are so many people who meditate, so many selfless servants: O ‘ Nanak, there is no end to the creation of God.

data.name: ਗਿਆਨ ਖੰਡ ਮਹਿ ਗਿਆਨੁ ਪਰਚੰਡੁ ॥
data.english: In the stage of Giaan Khand (as described above), the effect of divine knowledge is extremely powerful.

data.name: ਤਿਥੈ ਨਾਦ ਬਿਨੋਦ ਕੋਡ ਅਨੰਦੁ ॥
data.english: In this stage, one feels as if one is listening to the music of millions of melodies from which flow joy, amusement and bliss.

data.name: ਸਰਮ ਖੰਡ ਕੀ ਬਾਣੀ ਰੂਪੁ ॥
data.english: Saram Khand (stage of spiritual effort) is the stage of spiritual beautification.

data.name: ਤਿਥੈ ਘਾੜਤਿ ਘੜੀਐ ਬਹੁਤੁ ਅਨੂਪੁ ॥
data.english: In this stage, the enlightened mind is beautifully refashioned.

data.name: ਤਾ ਕੀਆ ਗਲਾ ਕਥੀਆ ਨਾ ਜਾਹਿ ॥ ਜੇ ਕੋ ਕਹੈ ਪਿਛੈ ਪਛੁਤਾਇ ॥
data.english: It is not possible to describe the elevated thought processes of such a mind and if one tries, he repents in the end.

data.name: ਤਿਥੈ ਘੜੀਐ ਸੁਰਤਿ ਮਤਿ ਮਨਿ ਬੁਧਿ ॥
data.english: The consciousness, intellect, mind and understanding are reshaped.

data.name: ਤਿਥੈ ਘੜੀਐ ਸੁਰਾ ਸਿਧਾ ਕੀ ਸੁਧਿ ॥੩੬॥
data.english: The consciousness of the human beings becomes like those of angels and the Siddhas.

data.name: ਕਰਮ ਖੰਡ ਕੀ ਬਾਣੀ ਜੋਰੁ ॥
data.english: Spiritual power is the attribute of the stage of karam khand (the Divine Grace)

data.name: ਤਿਥੈ ਹੋਰੁ ਨ ਕੋਈ ਹੋਰੁ ॥
data.english: No one else dwells there (except those who have reached there by becoming worthy of His Grace).

data.name: ਤਿਥੈ ਜੋਧ ਮਹਾਬਲ ਸੂਰ ॥
data.english: Only the brave and powerful spiritual warriors reach this stage, who have conquered the worldly temptations.

data.name: ਤਿਨ ਮਹਿ ਰਾਮੁ ਰਹਿਆ ਭਰਪੂਰ ॥
data.english: They are totally imbued with the all pervading God.

data.name: ਤਿਥੈ ਸੀਤੋ ਸੀਤਾ ਮਹਿਮਾ ਮਾਹਿ ॥
data.english: They remain completely absorbed in God’s praises.

data.name: ਤਾ ਕੇ ਰੂਪ ਨ ਕਥਨੇ ਜਾਹਿ ॥
data.english: Their radiating beauty due to spiritual enlightenment cannot be described.

data.name: ਨਾ ਓਹਿ ਮਰਹਿ ਨ ਠਾਗੇ ਜਾਹਿ ॥ ਜਿਨ ਕੈ ਰਾਮੁ ਵਸੈ ਮਨ ਮਾਹਿ ॥
data.english: Those within whose minds God dwells, do not face spiritual deterioration and worldly evils cannot overpower them.

data.name: ਤਿਥੈ ਭਗਤ ਵਸਹਿ ਕੇ ਲੋਅ ॥
data.english: The devotees of many worlds dwell there.

data.name: ਕਰਹਿ ਅਨੰਦੁ ਸਚਾ ਮਨਿ ਸੋਇ ॥
data.english: They experience the eternal joy because God always dwells in their minds.

data.name: ਸਚ ਖੰਡਿ ਵਸੈ ਨਿਰੰਕਾਰੁ ॥
data.english: Sach Khand is the stage of union with God, in this stage the formless God dwells in the heart of the devotee.

data.name: ਸੱਚ ਖੰਡ ਵਿਚ ਮਨੁੱਖ ਦੇ ਅੰਦਰ ਉਹ ਅਕਾਲ ਪੁਰਖ ਆਪ ਹੀ ਵੱਸਦਾ ਹੈ,
data.english: Having created, the merciful God bestows gracious glance and takes care of His creation.

data.name: ਤਿਥੈ ਖੰਡ ਮੰਡਲ ਵਰਭੰਡ ॥
data.english: In this stage one is enlightened with the knowledge about the endless planets, solar systems and galaxies.

data.name: ਜੇ ਕੋ ਕਥੈ ਤ ਅੰਤ ਨ ਅੰਤ ॥
data.english: If someone tries to describe these, he will find out that there is no end to it.

data.name: ਤਿਥੈ ਲੋਅ ਲੋਅ ਆਕਾਰ ॥
data.english: In this stage one realizes that there are many worlds and many forms of creation in the universe.

data.name: ਜਿਵ ਜਿਵ ਹੁਕਮੁ ਤਿਵੈ ਤਿਵ ਕਾਰ ॥
data.english: One realizes that everything functions as He commands.

data.name: ਵੇਖੈ ਵਿਗਸੈ ਕਰਿ ਵੀਚਾਰੁ ॥
data.english: One realizes that God takes care of His creation and derives pleasure out of it.

data.name: ਨਾਨਕ ਕਥਨਾ ਕਰੜਾ ਸਾਰੁ ॥੩੭॥
data.english: O’ Nanak, to fully describe the stage of Sach-khand is as difficult as biting through steel.

data.name: ਜਤੁ ਪਾਹਾਰਾ ਧੀਰਜੁ ਸੁਨਿਆਰੁ ॥
data.english: Taking the example of a goldsmith to describe how one can embark upon the task of spiritual enlightenment; let chastity be the shop, patience the goldsmith,

data.name: ਅਹਰਣਿ ਮਤਿ ਵੇਦੁ ਹਥੀਆਰੁ ॥
data.english: intellect, the anvil and spiritual wisdom, the hammer.

data.name: ਭਉ ਖਲਾ ਅਗਨਿ ਤਪ ਤਾਉ ॥
data.english: The fear of God as the bellows and disciplined hard work as the fire.

data.name: ਭਾਂਡਾ ਭਾਉ ਅੰਮ੍ਰਿਤੁ ਤਿਤੁ ਢਾਲਿ ॥
data.english: let love be the crucible and melt the nectar of God’s Name like melting the gold in the crucible.

data.name: ਘੜੀਐ ਸਬਦੁ ਸਚੀ ਟਕਸਾਲ ॥
data.english: This is the true mint where God’s Name is minted (this is the way a person can mold himself to become spiritually enlightened).

data.name: ਜਿਨ ਕਉ ਨਦਰਿ ਕਰਮੁ ਤਿਨ ਕਾਰ ॥
data.english: This task is accomplished by those on whom God casts His gracious glance.

data.name: ਨਾਨਕ ਨਦਰੀ ਨਦਰਿ ਨਿਹਾਲ ॥੩੮॥
data.english: O’ Nanak, they become blissfully delighted by the gracious glance of the merciful God.

data.name: ਸਲੋਕੁ ॥
data.english: Shalok:

data.name: ਪਵਣੁ ਗੁਰੂ ਪਾਣੀ ਪਿਤਾ ਮਾਤਾ ਧਰਤਿ ਮਹਤੁ ॥
data.english: Air is as essential for the body as is the Guru for the soul, water is like the father and earth is like the great mother of the entire world.

data.name: ਦਿਵਸੁ ਰਾਤਿ ਦੁਇ ਦਾਈ ਦਾਇਆ ਖੇਲੈ ਸਗਲ ਜਗਤੁ ॥
data.english: Days and nights are like male and female nurses in whose lap the entire world is playing the role assigned to each one in the worldly play.

data.name: ਚੰਗਿਆਈਆ ਬੁਰਿਆਈਆ ਵਾਚੈ ਧਰਮੁ ਹਦੂਰਿ ॥
data.english: The Righteous Judge, in the presence of God, watches human beings’ good and bad deeds.

data.name: ਕਰਮੀ ਆਪੋ ਆਪਣੀ ਕੇ ਨੇੜੈ ਕੇ ਦੂਰਿ ॥
data.english: According to their own deeds, some are drawn closer and some are driven farther away from God.

data.name: ਜਿਨੀ ਨਾਮੁ ਧਿਆਇਆ ਗਏ ਮਸਕਤਿ ਘਾਲਿ ॥
data.english: Those who remembered God with adoration, departed from this world after achieving the fruit of their hard work.

data.name: ਨਾਨਕ ਤੇ ਮੁਖ ਉਜਲੇ ਕੇਤੀ ਛੁਟੀ ਨਾਲਿ ॥੧॥
data.english: O’ Nanak, their faces are radiant with honor in God’s presence; many others, influenced by their company, achieved freedom from the worldly bonds.

data.name: ਸੋ ਦਰੁ ਰਾਗੁ ਆਸਾ ਮਹਲਾ ੧
data.english: So Dar~ that door, Raag Aasaa. First Guru:

data.name: ੴ ਸਤਿਗੁਰ ਪ੍ਰਸਾਦਿ ॥
data.english: One eternal God, realized by the grace of the true Guru:

data.name: ਸੋ ਦਰੁ ਤੇਰਾ ਕੇਹਾ ਸੋ ਘਰੁ ਕੇਹਾ ਜਿਤੁ ਬਹਿ ਸਰਬ ਸਮਾਲੇ ॥
data.english: O’ God, how magnificent is Your abode and how amazing is that door, from where You are taking care of all Your creation.

data.name: ਵਾਜੇ ਤੇਰੇ ਨਾਦ ਅਨੇਕ ਅਸੰਖਾ ਕੇਤੇ ਤੇਰੇ ਵਾਵਣਹਾਰੇ ॥
data.english: In this wonderful creation of Yours, countless musicians playing innumerable musical instruments, producing infinite numbers of melodies.

data.name: ਕੇਤੇ ਤੇਰੇ ਰਾਗ ਪਰੀ ਸਿਉ ਕਹੀਅਹਿ ਕੇਤੇ ਤੇਰੇ ਗਾਵਣਹਾਰੇ ॥
data.english: Countless singers are singing many musical measures along with their consorts.

data.name: ਗਾਵਨਿ ਤੁਧਨੋ ਪਵਣੁ ਪਾਣੀ ਬੈਸੰਤਰੁ ਗਾਵੈ ਰਾਜਾ ਧਰਮੁ ਦੁਆਰੇ ॥
data.english: The wind, the water and the fire in their own way are singing of You; even the Dharamraj, the judge of our deeds, is singing Your praises at Your doorstep.

data.name: ਗਾਵਨਿ ਤੁਧਨੋ ਚਿਤੁ ਗੁਪਤੁ ਲਿਖਿ ਜਾਣਨਿ ਲਿਖਿ ਲਿਖਿ ਧਰਮੁ ਬੀਚਾਰੇ ॥
data.english: Chitra and Gupta (angels), who write the account of people’s deeds and on whose records dharamraj makes judgement, are also singing Your Praises.

data.name: ਗਾਵਨਿ ਤੁਧਨੋ ਈਸਰੁ ਬ੍ਰਹਮਾ ਦੇਵੀ ਸੋਹਨਿ ਤੇਰੇ ਸਦਾ ਸਵਾਰੇ ॥
data.english: The god Shiva, Brahma and the goddessess who are embellished by You, are also singing Your praises.

data.name: ਗਾਵਨਿ ਤੁਧਨੋ ਇੰਦ੍ਰ ਇੰਦ੍ਰਾਸਣਿ ਬੈਠੇ ਦੇਵਤਿਆ ਦਰਿ ਨਾਲੇ ॥
data.english: The god Indra seated on his throne with many other angels standing at Your doorstep are singing Your praises.

data.name: ਗਾਵਨਿ ਤੁਧਨੋ ਸਿਧ ਸਮਾਧੀ ਅੰਦਰਿ ਗਾਵਨਿ ਤੁਧਨੋ ਸਾਧ ਬੀਚਾਰੇ ॥
data.english: Countless holy men are praising You in deep meditation, countless saints admire You as they become absorbed in Your thoughts.

data.name: ਗਾਵਨਿ ਤੁਧਨੋ ਜਤੀ ਸਤੀ ਸੰਤੋਖੀ ਗਾਵਨਿ ਤੁਧਨੋ ਵੀਰ ਕਰਾਰੇ ॥
data.english: O’ God, the men of discipline, charity, contentment, and brave warriors are all singing Your praises.

data.name: ਗਾਵਨਿ ਤੁਧਨੋ ਪੰਡਿਤ ਪੜਨਿ ਰਖੀਸੁਰ ਜੁਗੁ ਜੁਗੁ ਵੇਦਾ ਨਾਲੇ ॥
data.english: The pandits and the great sages who have been reading Vedas since ages are singing Your praises.

data.name: ਗਾਵਨਿ ਤੁਧਨੋ ਮੋਹਣੀਆ ਮਨੁ ਮੋਹਨਿ ਸੁਰਗੁ ਮਛੁ ਪਇਆਲੇ ॥
data.english: The beautiful fascinating maids in heaven, on earth and in the nether regions  are singing Your praises.

data.name: ਗਾਵਨਿ ਤੁਧਨੋ ਰਤਨ ਉਪਾਏ ਤੇਰੇ ਅਠਸਠਿ ਤੀਰਥ ਨਾਲੇ ॥
data.english: The precious jewels created by You, along with all the sixty eight places of pilgrimage are singing Your praises.

data.name: ਗਾਵਨਿ ਤੁਧਨੋ ਜੋਧ ਮਹਾਬਲ ਸੂਰਾ ਗਾਵਨਿ ਤੁਧਨੋ ਖਾਣੀ ਚਾਰੇ ॥
data.english: The brave and mighty warriors and creatures from all four sources of life are singing your praises.

data.name: ਗਾਵਨਿ ਤੁਧਨੋ ਖੰਡ ਮੰਡਲ ਬ੍ਰਹਮੰਡਾ ਕਰਿ ਕਰਿ ਰਖੇ ਤੇਰੇ ਧਾਰੇ ॥
data.english: All the continents, galaxies and solar systems in the entire universe created and supported by You, are singing of You.

data.name: ਸੇਈ ਤੁਧਨੋ ਗਾਵਨਿ ਜੋ ਤੁਧੁ ਭਾਵਨਿ ਰਤੇ ਤੇਰੇ ਭਗਤ ਰਸਾਲੇ ॥
data.english: Only those sing your praises who are pleasing to You and are truly devoted and imbued with Your love.

data.name: ਹੋਰਿ ਕੇਤੇ ਤੁਧਨੋ ਗਾਵਨਿ ਸੇ ਮੈ ਚਿਤਿ ਨ ਆਵਨਿ ਨਾਨਕੁ ਕਿਆ ਬੀਚਾਰੇ ॥
data.english: Many more are singing of Your greatness, which are not coming into my mind; how can Nanak think about all those who sing Your praises?

data.name: ਸੋਈ ਸੋਈ ਸਦਾ ਸਚੁ ਸਾਹਿਬੁ ਸਾਚਾ ਸਾਚੀ ਨਾਈ ॥
data.english: Only God is ever existing, the Master-God and His glory is eternal.

data.name: ਹੈ ਭੀ ਹੋਸੀ ਜਾਇ ਨ ਜਾਸੀ ਰਚਨਾ ਜਿਨਿ ਰਚਾਈ ॥
data.english: God who has created this universe, is present now, will also be present in the future; neither He was born nor He shall die.

data.name: ਰੰਗੀ ਰੰਗੀ ਭਾਤੀ ਕਰਿ ਕਰਿ ਜਿਨਸੀ ਮਾਇਆ ਜਿਨਿ ਉਪਾਈ ॥
data.english: God who has created Maya, in many colors, varieties and species.

data.name: ਕਰਿ ਕਰਿ ਦੇਖੈ ਕੀਤਾ ਆਪਣਾ ਜਿਉ ਤਿਸ ਦੀ ਵਡਿਆਈ ॥
data.english: He creates and then takes care of His creation as per His will.

data.name: ਜੋ ਤਿਸੁ ਭਾਵੈ ਸੋਈ ਕਰਸੀ ਫਿਰਿ ਹੁਕਮੁ ਨ ਕਰਣਾ ਜਾਈ ॥
data.english: He does whatever pleases Him and no one can issue order to Him.

data.name: ਸੋ ਪਾਤਿਸਾਹੁ ਸਾਹਾ ਪਤਿਸਾਹਿਬੁ ਨਾਨਕ ਰਹਣੁ ਰਜਾਈ ॥੧॥
data.english: O’ Nanak, God is the emperor of the emperors and to live according to His will is best for all.

data.name: ਆਸਾ ਮਹਲਾ ੧ ॥
data.english: Raag Aasaa, First Guru:

data.name: ਸੁਣਿ ਵਡਾ ਆਖੈ ਸਭੁ ਕੋਇ ॥
data.english: O’ God, upon hearing from others everyone says You are great.

data.name: ਕੇਵਡੁ ਵਡਾ ਡੀਠਾ ਹੋਇ ॥
data.english: But how great really You are, one can only say after visualizing You.

data.name: ਕੀਮਤਿ ਪਾਇ ਨ ਕਹਿਆ ਜਾਇ ॥
data.english: Your creation cannot be estimated or fully described.

data.name: ਕਹਣੈ ਵਾਲੇ ਤੇਰੇ ਰਹੇ ਸਮਾਇ ॥੧॥
data.english: Those who try to describe, lost their own identity and merged in You.

data.name: ਵਡੇ ਮੇਰੇ ਸਾਹਿਬਾ ਗਹਿਰ ਗੰਭੀਰਾ ਗੁਣੀ ਗਹੀਰਾ ॥
data.english: vaday mayray saahibaa gahir gambheeraa gunee gaheeraa.O’ my great Master, You are immensely generous and ocean of virtues.

data.name: ਕੋਇ ਨ ਜਾਣੈ ਤੇਰਾ ਕੇਤਾ ਕੇਵਡੁ ਚੀਰਾ ॥੧॥ ਰਹਾਉ ॥
data.english: No one knows the greatness of Your expanse. ||1||Pause||

data.name: ਸਭਿ ਸੁਰਤੀ ਮਿਲਿ ਸੁਰਤਿ ਕਮਾਈ ॥
data.english: In order to estimate your greatness, many contemplated upon You in unison with many others,

data.name: ਸਭ ਕੀਮਤਿ ਮਿਲਿ ਕੀਮਤਿ ਪਾਈ ॥
data.english: and many (philosophers) tried to estimate Your worth with help of many others.

data.name: ਗਿਆਨੀ ਧਿਆਨੀ ਗੁਰ ਗੁਰਹਾਈ ॥
data.english: The learned ones, the experts in meditation, the wise ones and their elders, all tried to describe Your greatness,

data.name: ਕਹਣੁ ਨ ਜਾਈ ਤੇਰੀ ਤਿਲੁ ਵਡਿਆਈ ॥੨॥
data.english: but could not describe even an iota of Your Greatness.

data.name: ਸਭਿ ਸਤ ਸਭਿ ਤਪ ਸਭਿ ਚੰਗਿਆਈਆ ॥
data.english: All charitable deeds, all austerities, all virtues,

data.name: ਸਿਧਾ ਪੁਰਖਾ ਕੀਆ ਵਡਿਆਈਆ ॥
data.english: and all the greatness of the siddhas with miraculous powers,

data.name: ਤੁਧੁ ਵਿਣੁ ਸਿਧੀ ਕਿਨੈ ਨ ਪਾਈਆ ॥
data.english: without Your grace, no one could achieve any of these powers.

data.name: ਕਰਮਿ ਮਿਲੈ ਨਾਹੀ ਠਾਕਿ ਰਹਾਈਆ ॥੩॥
data.english: They attain these powers only by Your grace, no one can stop it. ||3||

data.name: ਆਖਣ ਵਾਲਾ ਕਿਆ ਵੇਚਾਰਾ ॥
data.english: O’ God, how a helpless human being can describe Your virtues?

data.name: ਸਿਫਤੀ ਭਰੇ ਤੇਰੇ ਭੰਡਾਰਾ ॥
data.english: Your treasures are full of Your virtues.

data.name: ਜਿਸੁ ਤੂ ਦੇਹਿ ਤਿਸੈ ਕਿਆ ਚਾਰਾ ॥
data.english: Whom you bless with these virtues, nobody has the power to obstruct his path.

data.name: ਨਾਨਕ ਸਚੁ ਸਵਾਰਣਹਾਰਾ ॥੪॥੨॥
data.english: O’ Nanak, God Himself is the embellisher of that fortunate one.

data.name: ਆਸਾ ਮਹਲਾ ੧ ॥
data.english: Raag Aasaa, First Guru:

data.name: ਆਖਾ ਜੀਵਾ ਵਿਸਰੈ ਮਰਿ ਜਾਉ ॥
data.english: When I utter His Name, I feel spiritually alive but if I forget Him, I feel spiritually dead.

data.name: ਆਖਣਿ ਅਉਖਾ ਸਾਚਾ ਨਾਉ ॥
data.english: aakhan a-ukhaa saachaa naa-o.(In spite of knowing that), to utter His Name seems so difficult.

data.name: ਸਾਚੇ ਨਾਮ ਕੀ ਲਾਗੈ ਭੂਖ ॥
data.english: When one feels a strong yearning to remember Him with adoration,

data.name: ਉਤੁ ਭੂਖੈ ਖਾਇ ਚਲੀਅਹਿ ਦੂਖ ॥੧॥
data.english: then by satisfying that yearning, all one’s sufferings end.

data.name: ਸੋ ਕਿਉ ਵਿਸਰੈ ਮੇਰੀ ਮਾਇ ॥
data.english: O’ my mother, why should one forsake that God?

data.name: ਸਾਚਾ ਸਾਹਿਬੁ ਸਾਚੈ ਨਾਇ ॥੧॥ ਰਹਾਉ ॥
data.english: who is the true Master and whose glory is everlasting.

data.name: ਸਾਚੇ ਨਾਮ ਕੀ ਤਿਲੁ ਵਡਿਆਈ ॥
data.english: Trying  to describe even an iota of the Greatness of the eternal God,

data.name: ਆਖਿ ਥਕੇ ਕੀਮਤਿ ਨਹੀ ਪਾਈ ॥
data.english: people have grown weary, but they have not been able to describe it.

data.name: ਜੇ ਸਭਿ ਮਿਲਿ ਕੈ ਆਖਣ ਪਾਹਿ ॥
data.english: Even if everyone were to get together and speak of His greatness.

data.name: ਵਡਾ ਨ ਹੋਵੈ ਘਾਟਿ ਨ ਜਾਇ ॥੨॥
data.english: He would not become any greater or any lesser. ||2||

data.name: ਨਾ ਓਹੁ ਮਰੈ ਨ ਹੋਵੈ ਸੋਗੁ ॥
data.english: God does not die; there is no reason to mourn.

data.name: ਦੇਦਾ ਰਹੈ ਨ ਚੂਕੈ ਭੋਗੁ ॥
data.english: He continues to give, and His bounties never run short.

data.name: ਗੁਣੁ ਏਹੋ ਹੋਰੁ ਨਾਹੀ ਕੋਇ ॥
data.english: The great Virtue is that there is no other like Him.

data.name: ਨਾ ਕੋ ਹੋਆ ਨਾ ਕੋ ਹੋਇ ॥੩॥
data.english: There never has been, and there never will be (anyone like Him). ||3||

data.name: ਜੇਵਡੁ ਆਪਿ ਤੇਵਡ ਤੇਰੀ ਦਾਤਿ ॥
data.english: (O’ God), Your gifts are as great as you are.

data.name: ਜਿਨਿ ਦਿਨੁ ਕਰਿ ਕੈ ਕੀਤੀ ਰਾਤਿ ॥
data.english: (O’ God), it is You who have created day and night as well.

data.name: ਖਸਮੁ ਵਿਸਾਰਹਿ ਤੇ ਕਮਜਾਤਿ ॥
data.english: Those who forget such a Master-God are miserable and despicable.

data.name: ਨਾਨਕ ਨਾਵੈ ਬਾਝੁ ਸਨਾਤਿ ॥੪॥੩॥
data.english: O’ Nanak, a person without Naam (God’s remembrance) are wretched outcasts.

data.name: ਰਾਗੁ ਗੂਜਰੀ ਮਹਲਾ ੪ ॥
data.english: Raag Gujari, Fourth Guru:

data.name: ਹਰਿ ਕੇ ਜਨ ਸਤਿਗੁਰ ਸਤ ਪੁਰਖਾ ਹਉ ਬਿਨਉ ਕਰਉ ਗੁਰ ਪਾਸਿ ॥
data.english: O’ the devotee of God, the true Guru, O True Primal Being, I offer my prayers to You, my Guru.

data.name: ਹਮ ਕੀਰੇ ਕਿਰਮ ਸਤਿਗੁਰ ਸਰਣਾਈ ਕਰਿ ਦਇਆ ਨਾਮੁ ਪਰਗਾਸਿ ॥੧॥
data.english: O’ true Guru, I am humble and like a lowly worm, I have come to seek your refuge, please show mercy and enlighten me with Naam. ||1||

data.name: ਮੇਰੇ ਮੀਤ ਗੁਰਦੇਵ ਮੋ ਕਉ ਰਾਮ ਨਾਮੁ ਪਰਗਾਸਿ ॥
data.english: O’ my friend, the divine Guru, enlighten me with God’s Name.

data.name: ਗੁਰਮਤਿ ਨਾਮੁ ਮੇਰਾ ਪ੍ਰਾਨ ਸਖਾਈ ਹਰਿ ਕੀਰਤਿ ਹਮਰੀ ਰਹਰਾਸਿ ॥੧॥ ਰਹਾਉ ॥
data.english: Naam received through the Guru’s teachings may remain my breath of life and singing God’s praises may become the way of my life. ||1||Pause||

data.name: ਹਰਿ ਜਨ ਕੇ ਵਡਭਾਗ ਵਡੇਰੇ ਜਿਨ ਹਰਿ ਹਰਿ ਸਰਧਾ ਹਰਿ ਪਿਆਸ ॥
data.english: Very fortunate are those devotees of God who always have the yearning for meditating on God’s Name.

data.name: ਹਰਿ ਹਰਿ ਨਾਮੁ ਮਿਲੈ ਤ੍ਰਿਪਤਾਸਹਿ ਮਿਲਿ ਸੰਗਤਿ ਗੁਣ ਪਰਗਾਸਿ ॥੨॥
data.english: By realizing God’s Name, their longing for worldly desires is satiated and by joining the company of saintly persons, divine virtues manifest in them. ||2||

data.name: ਜਿਨ੍ਹ੍ ਹਰਿ ਹਰਿ ਹਰਿ ਰਸੁ ਨਾਮੁ ਨ ਪਾਇਆ ਤੇ ਭਾਗਹੀਣ ਜਮ ਪਾਸਿ ॥
data.english: Those, who have not received the elixir of God’s Name, are unfortunate and remain spiritually dead.

data.name: ਜੋ ਸਤਿਗੁਰ ਸਰਣਿ ਸੰਗਤਿ ਨਹੀ ਆਏ ਧ੍ਰਿਗੁ ਜੀਵੇ ਧ੍ਰਿਗੁ ਜੀਵਾਸਿ ॥੩॥
data.english: Those who have not come to the shelter and congregation of the true Guru, accursed is their life and accursed is their hope of living. ||3||

data.name: ਜਿਨ ਹਰਿ ਜਨ ਸਤਿਗੁਰ ਸੰਗਤਿ ਪਾਈ ਤਿਨ ਧੁਰਿ ਮਸਤਕਿ ਲਿਖਿਆ ਲਿਖਾਸਿ ॥
data.english: Those devotees of God, who have attained the company of the true Guru, have such preordained destiny.

data.name: ਧੰਨੁ ਧੰਨੁ ਸਤਸੰਗਤਿ ਜਿਤੁ ਹਰਿ ਰਸੁ ਪਾਇਆ ਮਿਲਿ ਜਨ ਨਾਨਕ ਨਾਮੁ ਪਰਗਾਸਿ ॥੪॥੧॥
data.english: O’ Nanak, blessed is that holy congregation, where one attains the elixir of God’s Name and one’s mind is enlightened with Naam. ||4||1||

data.name: ਰਾਗੁ ਗੂਜਰੀ ਮਹਲਾ ੫ ॥
data.english: Raag Gujari, Fifth Guru:

data.name: ਕਾਹੇ ਰੇ ਮਨ ਚਿਤਵਹਿ ਉਦਮੁ ਜਾ ਆਹਰਿ ਹਰਿ ਜੀਉ ਪਰਿਆ ॥
data.english: O’ mind, why do you keep worrying about the efforts for sustenance, for which God is already taking care of ?

data.name: ਸੈਲ ਪਥਰ ਮਹਿ ਜੰਤ ਉਪਾਏ ਤਾ ਕਾ ਰਿਜਕੁ ਆਗੈ ਕਰਿ ਧਰਿਆ ॥੧॥
data.english: Even in desolate rocks and stones, He created the living beings, and He has already placed their nourishment there. ||1||

data.name: ਮੇਰੇ ਮਾਧਉ ਜੀ ਸਤਸੰਗਤਿ ਮਿਲੇ ਸੁ ਤਰਿਆ ॥
data.english: O’ my dear God, whosoever joins the congregation of saintly persons is able to cross the worldly ocean of vices.

data.name: ਗੁਰ ਪਰਸਾਦਿ ਪਰਮ ਪਦੁ ਪਾਇਆ ਸੂਕੇ ਕਾਸਟ ਹਰਿਆ ॥੧॥ ਰਹਾਉ ॥
data.english: By Guru’s grace, he attains the highest spiritual state and regains such new spiritual energy, like a dry tree becoming green again.||1||Pause||

data.name: ਜਨਨਿ ਪਿਤਾ ਲੋਕ ਸੁਤ ਬਨਿਤਾ ਕੋਇ ਨ ਕਿਸ ਕੀ ਧਰਿਆ ॥
data.english: O’ my mind, the mother, father, friends, children, and spouse, no one is the support you can depend upon.

data.name: ਸਿਰਿ ਸਿਰਿ ਰਿਜਕੁ ਸੰਬਾਹੇ ਠਾਕੁਰੁ ਕਾਹੇ ਮਨ ਭਉ ਕਰਿਆ ॥੨॥
data.english: O’ my mind, God provides sustenance for each and every individual, why do you fear about it? ||2||

data.name: ਊਡੈ ਊਡਿ ਆਵੈ ਸੈ ਕੋਸਾ ਤਿਸੁ ਪਾਛੈ ਬਚਰੇ ਛਰਿਆ ॥
data.english: The flamingos fly hundreds of miles leaving their young ones behind.

data.name: ਤਿਨ ਕਵਨੁ ਖਲਾਵੈ ਕਵਨੁ ਚੁਗਾਵੈ ਮਨ ਮਹਿ ਸਿਮਰਨੁ ਕਰਿਆ ॥੩॥
data.english: Tell me, who feeds them and who teaches them to feed themselves? The flamingo only keeps remembering them (and flies back to feed them).

data.name: ਸਭ ਨਿਧਾਨ ਦਸ ਅਸਟ ਸਿਧਾਨ ਠਾਕੁਰ ਕਰ ਤਲ ਧਰਿਆ ॥
data.english: All treasures and the eighteen miraculous powers of the Siddhas are in God’s control as if these are in the palm of His hand.

data.name: ਜਨ ਨਾਨਕ ਬਲਿ ਬਲਿ ਸਦ ਬਲਿ ਜਾਈਐ ਤੇਰਾ ਅੰਤੁ ਨ ਪਾਰਾਵਰਿਆ ॥੪॥੧॥
data.english: O’ Nanak, we should always dedicate ourselves to such a wonderful Master and say: O’ God, there is no end to Your creation. ||4||1||

data.name: ਆਸਾ ਮਹਲਾ ੪ ਸੋ ਪੁਰਖੁ
data.english: Raag Aasaa, Fourth Guru, So Purakh:

data.name: ੴ ਸਤਿਗੁਰ ਪ੍ਰਸਾਦਿ ॥
data.english: One eternal God, realized by the grace of the true Guru:

data.name: ਸੋ ਪੁਰਖੁ ਨਿਰੰਜਨੁ ਹਰਿ ਪੁਰਖੁ ਨਿਰੰਜਨੁ ਹਰਿ ਅਗਮਾ ਅਗਮ ਅਪਾਰਾ ॥
data.english: That all pervading God is immaculate (free from the influence of worldly attachments), is incomprehensible, inaccessible and limitless.

data.name: ਸਭਿ ਧਿਆਵਹਿ ਸਭਿ ਧਿਆਵਹਿ ਤੁਧੁ ਜੀ ਹਰਿ ਸਚੇ ਸਿਰਜਣਹਾਰਾ ॥
data.english: O’ the eternal Creator, everyone remembers You with loving devotion.

data.name: ਸਭਿ ਜੀਅ ਤੁਮਾਰੇ ਜੀ ਤੂੰ ਜੀਆ ਕਾ ਦਾਤਾਰਾ ॥
data.english: O’ God, all the living beings belong to You and You are their benefactor.

data.name: ਹਰਿ ਧਿਆਵਹੁ ਸੰਤਹੁ ਜੀ ਸਭਿ ਦੂਖ ਵਿਸਾਰਣਹਾਰਾ ॥
data.english: O’ dear Saints, always lovingly remember God, the destroyer of all sorrows.

data.name: ਹਰਿ ਆਪੇ ਠਾਕੁਰੁ ਹਰਿ ਆਪੇ ਸੇਵਕੁ ਜੀ ਕਿਆ ਨਾਨਕ ਜੰਤ ਵਿਚਾਰਾ ॥੧॥
data.english: O’ Nanak, God Himself is the Master and Himself the servant; (without Him) what existence the poor living beings can have ?

data.name: ਤੂੰ ਘਟ ਘਟ ਅੰਤਰਿ ਸਰਬ ਨਿਰੰਤਰਿ ਜੀ ਹਰਿ ਏਕੋ ਪੁਰਖੁ ਸਮਾਣਾ ॥
data.english: O’ God, You pervade in all hearts and You alone are present everywhere.

data.name: ਇਕਿ ਦਾਤੇ ਇਕਿ ਭੇਖਾਰੀ ਜੀ ਸਭਿ ਤੇਰੇ ਚੋਜ ਵਿਡਾਣਾ ॥
data.english: Some are givers, some are beggars, all this is Your wondrous play!

data.name: ਤੂੰ ਆਪੇ ਦਾਤਾ ਆਪੇ ਭੁਗਤਾ ਜੀ ਹਉ ਤੁਧੁ ਬਿਨੁ ਅਵਰੁ ਨ ਜਾਣਾ ॥
data.english: You Yourself are the Giver, and You Yourself are the enjoyer; besides You, I know no one else like You.

data.name: ਤੂੰ ਪਾਰਬ੍ਰਹਮੁ ਬੇਅੰਤੁ ਬੇਅੰਤੁ ਜੀ ਤੇਰੇ ਕਿਆ ਗੁਣ ਆਖਿ ਵਖਾਣਾ ॥
data.english: You are the Supreme God, Limitless and Infinite; what virtues of Yours may I speak of and describe?

data.name: ਜੋ ਸੇਵਹਿ ਜੋ ਸੇਵਹਿ ਤੁਧੁ ਜੀ ਜਨੁ ਨਾਨਕੁ ਤਿਨ ਕੁਰਬਾਣਾ ॥੨॥
data.english: O’ God, Nanak is dedicated to those who remember You and lovingly meditate on You.

data.name: ਹਰਿ ਧਿਆਵਹਿ ਹਰਿ ਧਿਆਵਹਿ ਤੁਧੁ ਜੀ ਸੇ ਜਨ ਜੁਗ ਮਹਿ ਸੁਖਵਾਸੀ ॥
data.english: O’ God, those who always remember You with love and devotion, live in peace.

data.name: ਸੇ ਮੁਕਤੁ ਸੇ ਮੁਕਤੁ ਭਏ ਜਿਨ ਹਰਿ ਧਿਆਇਆ ਜੀ ਤਿਨ ਤੂਟੀ ਜਮ ਕੀ ਫਾਸੀ ॥
data.english: Those who lovingly remembered God became liberated from the bonds of materialism and the fear of death.

data.name: ਜਿਨ ਨਿਰਭਉ ਜਿਨ ਹਰਿ ਨਿਰਭਉ ਧਿਆਇਆ ਜੀ ਤਿਨ ਕਾ ਭਉ ਸਭੁ ਗਵਾਸੀ ॥
data.english: Those who always remember the Fearless God with adoration, He eradicates all their fears.

data.name: ਜਿਨ ਸੇਵਿਆ ਜਿਨ ਸੇਵਿਆ ਮੇਰਾ ਹਰਿ ਜੀ ਤੇ ਹਰਿ ਹਰਿ ਰੂਪਿ ਸਮਾਸੀ ॥
data.english: Those who always remember God with loving devotion, ultimately merge in Him.

data.name: ਸੇ ਧੰਨੁ ਸੇ ਧੰਨੁ ਜਿਨ ਹਰਿ ਧਿਆਇਆ ਜੀ ਜਨੁ ਨਾਨਕੁ ਤਿਨ ਬਲਿ ਜਾਸੀ ॥੩॥
data.english: Truly blessed and fortunate are those who remembered God with loving devotion; Nanak is dedicated to them.

data.name: ਤੇਰੀ ਭਗਤਿ ਤੇਰੀ ਭਗਤਿ ਭੰਡਾਰ ਜੀ ਭਰੇ ਬਿਅੰਤ ਬੇਅੰਤਾ ॥
data.english: O’ God, infinite treasures of Your devotional worship are overflowing.

data.name: ਤੇਰੇ ਭਗਤ ਤੇਰੇ ਭਗਤ ਸਲਾਹਨਿ ਤੁਧੁ ਜੀ ਹਰਿ ਅਨਿਕ ਅਨੇਕ ਅਨੰਤਾ ॥
data.english: O’ God, countless are Your devotees who praise You in myriads of ways.

data.name: ਤੇਰੀ ਅਨਿਕ ਤੇਰੀ ਅਨਿਕ ਕਰਹਿ ਹਰਿ ਪੂਜਾ ਜੀ ਤਪੁ ਤਾਪਹਿ ਜਪਹਿ ਬੇਅੰਤਾ ॥
data.english: O’ God! countless people perform worship, recite Your Name and practice penances.

data.name: ਤੇਰੇ ਅਨੇਕ ਤੇਰੇ ਅਨੇਕ ਪੜਹਿ ਬਹੁ ਸਿਮ੍ਰਿਤਿ ਸਾਸਤ ਜੀ ਕਰਿ ਕਿਰਿਆ ਖਟੁ ਕਰਮ ਕਰੰਤਾ ॥
data.english: Your countless devotees read various Smritis and Shastras (religious books) and perform the prescribed six kinds of rituals and religious ceremonies.

data.name: ਸੇ ਭਗਤ ਸੇ ਭਗਤ ਭਲੇ ਜਨ ਨਾਨਕ ਜੀ ਜੋ ਭਾਵਹਿ ਮੇਰੇ ਹਰਿ ਭਗਵੰਤਾ ॥੪॥
data.english: O’ Nanak, blessed are only those devotees who are pleasing to my God.

data.name: ਤੂੰ ਆਦਿ ਪੁਰਖੁ ਅਪਰੰਪਰੁ ਕਰਤਾ ਜੀ ਤੁਧੁ ਜੇਵਡੁ ਅਵਰੁ ਨ ਕੋਈ ॥
data.english: O’ God, You are the primal Supreme being, all pervading, limitless creator of the universe; no one is as great as You.

data.name: ਤੂੰ ਜੁਗੁ ਜੁਗੁ ਏਕੋ ਸਦਾ ਸਦਾ ਤੂੰ ਏਕੋ ਜੀ ਤੂੰ ਨਿਹਚਲੁ ਕਰਤਾ ਸੋਈ ॥
data.english: Age after age You are the same one, forever and ever You Yourself are the same one eternal Creator.

data.name: ਤੁਧੁ ਆਪੇ ਭਾਵੈ ਸੋਈ ਵਰਤੈ ਜੀ ਤੂੰ ਆਪੇ ਕਰਹਿ ਸੁ ਹੋਈ ॥
data.english: O’ God! whatever pleases You comes to pass and that alone happens which You do Yourself.

data.name: ਤੁਧੁ ਆਪੇ ਸ੍ਰਿਸਟਿ ਸਭ ਉਪਾਈ ਜੀ ਤੁਧੁ ਆਪੇ ਸਿਰਜਿ ਸਭ ਗੋਈ ॥
data.english: O’ God! You Yourself created the entire Universe and having done so, it is You who destroys it.

data.name: ਜਨੁ ਨਾਨਕੁ ਗੁਣ ਗਾਵੈ ਕਰਤੇ ਕੇ ਜੀ ਜੋ ਸਭਸੈ ਕਾ ਜਾਣੋਈ ॥੫॥੧॥
data.english: Devotee Nanak sings the praises of the dear Creator, who is the knower of all.

data.name: ਆਸਾ ਮਹਲਾ ੪ ॥
data.english: Raag Aasaa, Fourth Guru:

data.name: ਤੂੰ ਕਰਤਾ ਸਚਿਆਰੁ ਮੈਡਾ ਸਾਂਈ ॥
data.english: O’ God, You are the eternal Creator and my Master.

data.name: ਜੋ ਤਉ ਭਾਵੈ ਸੋਈ ਥੀਸੀ ਜੋ ਤੂੰ ਦੇਹਿ ਸੋਈ ਹਉ ਪਾਈ ॥੧॥ ਰਹਾਉ ॥
data.english: Only that which pleases You happens, and I receive what You give me.

data.name: ਸਭ ਤੇਰੀ ਤੂੰ ਸਭਨੀ ਧਿਆਇਆ ॥
data.english: O’ God, the entire universe is Your creation, and everyone meditates on You (everyone lives under Your command).

data.name: ਜਿਸ ਨੋ ਕ੍ਰਿਪਾ ਕਰਹਿ ਤਿਨਿ ਨਾਮ ਰਤਨੁ ਪਾਇਆ ॥
data.english: One upon whom You bestow mercy, realizes precious Naam.

data.name: ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਲਾਧਾ ਮਨਮੁਖਿ ਗਵਾਇਆ ॥
data.english: The Guru’s follower realized God and the self-willed lost the opportunity to realize Him.

data.name: ਤੁਧੁ ਆਪਿ ਵਿਛੋੜਿਆ ਆਪਿ ਮਿਲਾਇਆ ॥੧॥
data.english: O’ God, You Yourself separate some from Yourself and You Yourself unite some with You according to their deeds.

data.name: ਤੂੰ ਦਰੀਆਉ ਸਭ ਤੁਝ ਹੀ ਮਾਹਿ ॥
data.english: O’ God, You are the river of life and all creatures are mere waves in that river.

data.name: ਤੁਝ ਬਿਨੁ ਦੂਜਾ ਕੋਈ ਨਾਹਿ ॥
data.english: O’ God, besides You, there is no one like You.

data.name: ਜੀਅ ਜੰਤ ਸਭਿ ਤੇਰਾ ਖੇਲੁ ॥
data.english: All living beings are part of Your wondrous play,

data.name: ਵਿਜੋਗਿ ਮਿਲਿ ਵਿਛੁੜਿਆ ਸੰਜੋਗੀ ਮੇਲੁ ॥੨॥
data.english: whosoever has been destined to be separated remains separated (from You), and others are united according to Your will.

data.name: ਜਿਸ ਨੋ ਤੂ ਜਾਣਾਇਹਿ ਸੋਈ ਜਨੁ ਜਾਣੈ ॥
data.english: O’ God,  one whom You inspire to understand, he alone understands the righteous way of life,

data.name: ਹਰਿ ਗੁਣ ਸਦ ਹੀ ਆਖਿ ਵਖਾਣੈ ॥
data.english: and he always sings Your praises and describes Your virtues to others.

data.name: ਜਿਨਿ ਹਰਿ ਸੇਵਿਆ ਤਿਨਿ ਸੁਖੁ ਪਾਇਆ ॥
data.english: He who has remembered God with loving devotion has obtained inner peace

data.name: ਸਹਜੇ ਹੀ ਹਰਿ ਨਾਮਿ ਸਮਾਇਆ ॥੩॥
data.english: and he merges in Your Name in a state of spiritual poise.

data.name: ਤੂ ਆਪੇ ਕਰਤਾ ਤੇਰਾ ਕੀਆ ਸਭੁ ਹੋਇ ॥
data.english: O’ God! You Yourself are the Creator and everything happens by Your doing.

data.name: ਤੁਧੁ ਬਿਨੁ ਦੂਜਾ ਅਵਰੁ ਨ ਕੋਇ ॥
data.english: Besides You, there is no one like You.

data.name: ਤੂ ਕਰਿ ਕਰਿ ਵੇਖਹਿ ਜਾਣਹਿ ਸੋਇ ॥
data.english: You create the entire universe, watch over it and are aware of everyone’s needs.

data.name: ਜਨ ਨਾਨਕ ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਪਰਗਟੁ ਹੋਇ ॥੪॥੨॥
data.english: O’ Nanak, one who follows the Guru’s teachings, God manifests within him.

data.name: ਆਸਾ ਮਹਲਾ ੧ ॥
data.english: Raag Aasaa, First Guru:

data.name: ਤਿਤੁ ਸਰਵਰੜੈ ਭਈਲੇ ਨਿਵਾਸਾ ਪਾਣੀ ਪਾਵਕੁ ਤਿਨਹਿ ਕੀਆ ॥
data.english: We dwell in this world which is like a terrible pool, where God has put the fire of worldly desires instead of water,

data.name: ਪੰਕਜੁ ਮੋਹ ਪਗੁ ਨਹੀ ਚਾਲੈ ਹਮ ਦੇਖਾ ਤਹ ਡੂਬੀਅਲੇ ॥੧॥
data.english: and stuck in this thick mud of worldly desires, people cannot move (towards spiritual growth); I see many people being drowned in it.

data.name: ਮਨ ਏਕੁ ਨ ਚੇਤਸਿ ਮੂੜ ਮਨਾ ॥
data.english: O’ my foolish mind, you do not remember God.

data.name: ਹਰਿ ਬਿਸਰਤ ਤੇਰੇ ਗੁਣ ਗਲਿਆ ॥੧॥ ਰਹਾਉ ॥
data.english: As you keep forgetting God, your virtues are withering away.

data.name: ਨਾ ਹਉ ਜਤੀ ਸਤੀ ਨਹੀ ਪੜਿਆ ਮੂਰਖ ਮੁਗਧਾ ਜਨਮੁ ਭਇਆ ॥
data.english: O’ God, neither am I a celibate, nor compassionate, nor a scholar; in fact, throughout my entire life I have been a pure ignorant fool.

data.name: ਪ੍ਰਣਵਤਿ ਨਾਨਕ ਤਿਨ ਕੀ ਸਰਣਾ ਜਿਨ ਤੂ ਨਾਹੀ ਵੀਸਰਿਆ ॥੨॥੩॥
data.english: O’ God keep me in the shelter of those who have not forgotten You, prays Nanak.

data.name: ਆਸਾ ਮਹਲਾ ੫ ॥
data.english: Raag Aasaa, Fifth Guru:

data.name: ਭਈ ਪਰਾਪਤਿ ਮਾਨੁਖ ਦੇਹੁਰੀਆ ॥
data.english: You have been blessed with a beautiful human body.

data.name: ਗੋਬਿੰਦ ਮਿਲਣ ਕੀ ਇਹ ਤੇਰੀ ਬਰੀਆ ॥
data.english: This is your only opportunity to unite with God.

data.name: ਅਵਰਿ ਕਾਜ ਤੇਰੈ ਕਿਤੈ ਨ ਕਾਮ ॥
data.english: Other worldly deeds are of no use to you in realizing God,

data.name: ਮਿਲੁ ਸਾਧਸੰਗਤਿ ਭਜੁ ਕੇਵਲ ਨਾਮ ॥੧॥
data.english: therefore, join the holy congregation and lovingly remember God ‘s Name.

data.name: ਸਰੰਜਾਮਿ ਲਾਗੁ ਭਵਜਲ ਤਰਨ ਕੈ ॥
data.english: Make every effort to cross over this terrifying world-ocean of vices,

data.name: ਜਨਮੁ ਬ੍ਰਿਥਾ ਜਾਤ ਰੰਗਿ ਮਾਇਆ ਕੈ ॥੧॥ ਰਹਾਉ ॥
data.english: otherwise your life is passing away in vain in the love for Maya.

data.name: ਜਪੁ ਤਪੁ ਸੰਜਮੁ ਧਰਮੁ ਨ ਕਮਾਇਆ ॥
data.english: I have not practiced meditation, penance, self-restraint or righteous living.

data.name: ਸੇਵਾ ਸਾਧ ਨ ਜਾਨਿਆ ਹਰਿ ਰਾਇਆ ॥
data.english: O’ sovereign God, I have not even learnt to follow the Guru’s teachings.

data.name: ਕਹੁ ਨਾਨਕ ਹਮ ਨੀਚ ਕਰੰਮਾ ॥
data.english: Nanak says, even my actions are despicable;

data.name: ਸਰਣਿ ਪਰੇ ਕੀ ਰਾਖਹੁ ਸਰਮਾ ॥੨॥੪॥
data.english: but I have come to your refuge, please save my honor.

data.name: ਸੋਹਿਲਾ ਰਾਗੁ ਗਉੜੀ ਦੀਪਕੀ ਮਹਲਾ ੧
data.english: Sohilaa, The Song Of Praises of God. Raag Gauree Deepakee, First Guru:

data.name: ੴ ਸਤਿਗੁਰ ਪ੍ਰਸਾਦਿ ॥
data.english: One eternal God, realized by the grace of the True Guru:

data.name: ਜੈ ਘਰਿ ਕੀਰਤਿ ਆਖੀਐ ਕਰਤੇ ਕਾ ਹੋਇ ਬੀਚਾਰੋ ॥
data.english: O’ brothern, that holy congregation where God’s praises are recited and His virtues are contemplated,

data.name: ਤਿਤੁ ਘਰਿ ਗਾਵਹੁ ਸੋਹਿਲਾ ਸਿਵਰਿਹੁ ਸਿਰਜਣਹਾਰੋ ॥੧॥
data.english: you too go in that holy congregation, sing the song of God’s praises and lovingly meditate on the Creator.

data.name: ਤੁਮ ਗਾਵਹੁ ਮੇਰੇ ਨਿਰਭਉ ਕਾ ਸੋਹਿਲਾ ॥
data.english: O’ brother, sing Sohila (song of praises) of my fearless God.

data.name: ਹਉ ਵਾਰੀ ਜਿਤੁ ਸੋਹਿਲੈ ਸਦਾ ਸੁਖੁ ਹੋਇ ॥੧॥ ਰਹਾਉ ॥
data.english: I dedicate myself to that song of God’s praises which brings eternal peace.

data.name: ਨਿਤ ਨਿਤ ਜੀਅੜੇ ਸਮਾਲੀਅਨਿ ਦੇਖੈਗਾ ਦੇਵਣਹਾਰੁ ॥
data.english: The great Benefactor, who has been taking care of His creation day after day, will also look after your needs.

data.name: ਤੇਰੇ ਦਾਨੈ ਕੀਮਤਿ ਨਾ ਪਵੈ ਤਿਸੁ ਦਾਤੇ ਕਵਣੁ ਸੁਮਾਰੁ ॥੨॥
data.english: O mortal, when you cannot even assess the value of His Gifts; then how can you assess the worth of that Benefactor?

data.name: ਸੰਬਤਿ ਸਾਹਾ ਲਿਖਿਆ ਮਿਲਿ ਕਰਿ ਪਾਵਹੁ ਤੇਲੁ ॥
data.english: The time of my departure from this world is predetermined; O my friends, prepare me for my departure to my Master’s home.

data.name: ਦੇਹੁ ਸਜਣ ਅਸੀਸੜੀਆ ਜਿਉ ਹੋਵੈ ਸਾਹਿਬ ਸਿਉ ਮੇਲੁ ॥੩॥
data.english: O’ my friends, bestow blessings, that I may unite with my Master-God.

data.name: ਘਰਿ ਘਰਿ ਏਹੋ ਪਾਹੁਚਾ ਸਦੜੇ ਨਿਤ ਪਵੰਨਿ ॥
data.english: The intimations about the departure from this world are being delivered to home after home, and every day people are being called.

data.name: ਸਦਣਹਾਰਾ ਸਿਮਰੀਐ ਨਾਨਕ ਸੇ ਦਿਹ ਆਵੰਨਿ ॥੪॥੧॥
data.english: O’ Nanak, we should lovingly remember God, the one who summons us all, because day of our departure is also drawing near.

data.name: ਰਾਗੁ ਆਸਾ ਮਹਲਾ ੧ ॥
data.english: Raag Aasaa, First Guru:

data.name: ਛਿਅ ਘਰ ਛਿਅ ਗੁਰ ਛਿਅ ਉਪਦੇਸ ॥
data.english: There are six Shastras, six teachers and six doctrines.

data.name: ਗੁਰੁ ਗੁਰੁ ਏਕੋ ਵੇਸ ਅਨੇਕ ॥੧॥
data.english: But the teacher of all the teachers is God Himself in countless forms.

data.name: ਬਾਬਾ ਜੈ ਘਰਿ ਕਰਤੇ ਕੀਰਤਿ ਹੋਇ ॥
data.english: O’ brother, remain in that place or holy congregation where the Praises of the Creator are sung,

data.name: ਸੋ ਘਰੁ ਰਾਖੁ ਵਡਾਈ ਤੋਇ ॥੧॥ ਰਹਾਉ ॥
data.english: and stay in that holy congregation; in it rests your glory.

data.name: ਵਿਸੁਏ ਚਸਿਆ ਘੜੀਆ ਪਹਰਾ ਥਿਤੀ ਵਾਰੀ ਮਾਹੁ ਹੋਆ ॥
data.english: There are many seconds, minutes, hours, days, weeks and months,

data.name: ਸੂਰਜੁ ਏਕੋ ਰੁਤਿ ਅਨੇਕ ॥
data.english: and there are various seasons in a year, all originate from the same one Sun.

data.name: ਨਾਨਕ ਕਰਤੇ ਕੇ ਕੇਤੇ ਵੇਸ ॥੨॥੨॥
data.english: O’ Nanak, similarly there are countless manifestations of the Creator but He is only One.

data.name: ਰਾਗੁ ਧਨਾਸਰੀ ਮਹਲਾ ੧ ॥
data.english: Raag Dhanasari, First Guru:

data.name: ਗਗਨ ਮੈ ਥਾਲੁ ਰਵਿ ਚੰਦੁ ਦੀਪਕ ਬਨੇ ਤਾਰਿਕਾ ਮੰਡਲ ਜਨਕ ਮੋਤੀ ॥
data.english: O’ God, the whole creation is performing Your Aarti (worship), the sky is like a platter in which the Sun and the Moon are like two lamps and the clusters of stars are like pearls.

data.name: ਧੂਪੁ ਮਲਆਨਲੋ ਪਵਣੁ ਚਵਰੋ ਕਰੇ ਸਗਲ ਬਨਰਾਇ ਫੂਲੰਤ ਜੋਤੀ ॥੧॥
data.english: The fragrant air from the Malay mountain is like incense, the blowing wind is like a cosmic chavar (fan) and the entire vegetation is offering flowers for the Aarti.

data.name: ਕੈਸੀ ਆਰਤੀ ਹੋਇ ॥ ਭਵ ਖੰਡਨਾ ਤੇਰੀ ਆਰਤੀ ॥
data.english: O’ the destroyer of the fear of birth and death, what a wonderful Aarti (worship) of Yours is being performed?

data.name: ਅਨਹਤਾ ਸਬਦ ਵਾਜੰਤ ਭੇਰੀ ॥੧॥ ਰਹਾਉ ॥
data.english: The continuous sound of the heart beats of all living beings is like the sound of drums being played in Your Aartee.

data.name: ਸਹਸ ਤਵ ਨੈਨ ਨਨ ਨੈਨ ਹਹਿ ਤੋਹਿ ਕਉ ਸਹਸ ਮੂਰਤਿ ਨਨਾ ਏਕ ਤੋੁਹੀ ॥
data.english: O’ God, You have thousands of eyes (because You pervade all), but You have no eyes of Your own; You have thousands of forms, yet no specific form of Your own.

data.name: ਸਹਸ ਪਦ ਬਿਮਲ ਨਨ ਏਕ ਪਦ ਗੰਧ ਬਿਨੁ ਸਹਸ ਤਵ ਗੰਧ ਇਵ ਚਲਤ ਮੋਹੀ ॥੨॥
data.english: You have thousands of immaculate feet, but being formless, You have no feet, and You have thousands of noses, yet You have no nose; these wondrous Plays of Yours entrances me.

data.name: ਸਭ ਮਹਿ ਜੋਤਿ ਜੋਤਿ ਹੈ ਸੋਇ ॥
data.english: The light flowing in everyone is the same supreme light of God.

data.name: ਤਿਸ ਦੈ ਚਾਨਣਿ ਸਭ ਮਹਿ ਚਾਨਣੁ ਹੋਇ ॥
data.english: The light enlightening the minds of all, is the same Divine light.

data.name: ਗੁਰ ਸਾਖੀ ਜੋਤਿ ਪਰਗਟੁ ਹੋਇ ॥
data.english: But this Divine-Light pervading in all is revealed only by the Guru’s teachings.

data.name: ਜੋ ਤਿਸੁ ਭਾਵੈ ਸੁ ਆਰਤੀ ਹੋਇ ॥੩॥
data.english: Therefore, accepting what pleases God is His true aarti (worship).

data.name: ਹਰਿ ਚਰਣ ਕਵਲ ਮਕਰੰਦ ਲੋਭਿਤ ਮਨੋ ਅਨਦਿਨੋੁ ਮੋਹਿ ਆਹੀ ਪਿਆਸਾ ॥
data.english: O’ God, my heart longs for Your immaculate Name; I am always thirsty for the nectar of Your Name like a bumble bee for the lotus flower.

data.name: ਕ੍ਰਿਪਾ ਜਲੁ ਦੇਹਿ ਨਾਨਕ ਸਾਰਿੰਗ ਕਉ ਹੋਇ ਜਾ ਤੇ ਤੇਰੈ ਨਾਇ ਵਾਸਾ ॥੪॥੩॥
data.english: O’ God, bestow mercy upon Saarang (songbird) Nanak and bless with the nectar of your Name so that I remain absorbed in Your Name.

data.name: ਰਾਗੁ ਗਉੜੀ ਪੂਰਬੀ ਮਹਲਾ ੪ ॥
data.english: Raag Gauree Poorbee, Fourth Guru:

data.name: ਕਾਮਿ ਕਰੋਧਿ ਨਗਰੁ ਬਹੁ ਭਰਿਆ ਮਿਲਿ ਸਾਧੂ ਖੰਡਲ ਖੰਡਾ ਹੇ ॥
data.english: This human body is filled with lust and anger, these vices can be destroyed only by meeting and following the true Guru’s teachings.

data.name: ਪੂਰਬਿ ਲਿਖਤ ਲਿਖੇ ਗੁਰੁ ਪਾਇਆ ਮਨਿ ਹਰਿ ਲਿਵ ਮੰਡਲ ਮੰਡਾ ਹੇ ॥੧॥
data.english: One who meets with the Guru as per pre-ordained destiny, his mind gets attuned to the love of God.

data.name: ਕਰਿ ਸਾਧੂ ਅੰਜੁਲੀ ਪੁਨੁ ਵਡਾ ਹੇ ॥
data.english: O’ brother, pay obeisance to the Guru with humility, this is an act of great merit,

data.name: ਕਰਿ ਡੰਡਉਤ ਪੁਨੁ ਵਡਾ ਹੇ ॥੧॥ ਰਹਾਉ ॥
data.english: bow down before him; this is a virtuous action indeed.

data.name: ਸਾਕਤ ਹਰਿ ਰਸ ਸਾਦੁ ਨ ਜਾਣਿਆ ਤਿਨ ਅੰਤਰਿ ਹਉਮੈ ਕੰਡਾ ਹੇ ॥
data.english: The faithless cynics do not know the taste of the sublime essence of God’s Name, because egotism is embedded deep within them like a thorn.

data.name: ਜਿਉ ਜਿਉ ਚਲਹਿ ਚੁਭੈ ਦੁਖੁ ਪਾਵਹਿ ਜਮਕਾਲੁ ਸਹਹਿ ਸਿਰਿ ਡੰਡਾ ਹੇ ॥੨॥
data.english: As they lead their life, the thorn of ego hurts them more and more and they  bear on their head the torture of spiritual death.

data.name: ਹਰਿ ਜਨ ਹਰਿ ਹਰਿ ਨਾਮਿ ਸਮਾਣੇ ਦੁਖੁ ਜਨਮ ਮਰਣ ਭਵ ਖੰਡਾ ਹੇ ॥
data.english: But God’s devotees remain immersed in His Name and their sorrow of entire life, from birth to death, is eradicated.
