data.name: ਅਬਿਨਾਸੀ ਪੁਰਖੁ ਪਾਇਆ ਪਰਮੇਸਰੁ ਬਹੁ ਸੋਭ ਖੰਡ ਬ੍ਰਹਮੰਡਾ ਹੇ ॥੩॥
data.english: They realize the all pervading eternal supreme God, and their fame spreads in all the regions of the universe.

data.name: ਹਮ ਗਰੀਬ ਮਸਕੀਨ ਪ੍ਰਭ ਤੇਰੇ ਹਰਿ ਰਾਖੁ ਰਾਖੁ ਵਡ ਵਡਾ ਹੇ ॥
data.english: O’ God, we are helpless and meek, but still Yours and You are the greatest of the great, please protect us from these vices.

data.name: ਜਨ ਨਾਨਕ ਨਾਮੁ ਅਧਾਰੁ ਟੇਕ ਹੈ ਹਰਿ ਨਾਮੇ ਹੀ ਸੁਖੁ ਮੰਡਾ ਹੇ ॥੪॥੪॥
data.english: O’ Nanak, one whose only sustenance and support in life is Naam, he enjoys the spiritual bliss through Naam.

data.name: ਰਾਗੁ ਗਉੜੀ ਪੂਰਬੀ ਮਹਲਾ ੫ ॥
data.english: Raag Gauree Poorbee, Fifth Guru:

data.name: ਕਰਉ ਬੇਨੰਤੀ ਸੁਣਹੁ ਮੇਰੇ ਮੀਤਾ ਸੰਤ ਟਹਲ ਕੀ ਬੇਲਾ ॥
data.english: O’ my friends, listen! I submit to you that this human life is the only opportunity to follow the Guru’s teaching.

data.name: ਈਹਾ ਖਾਟਿ ਚਲਹੁ ਹਰਿ ਲਾਹਾ ਆਗੈ ਬਸਨੁ ਸੁਹੇਲਾ ॥੧॥
data.english: Human life is the opportunity to earn the wealth of God’s Name, so that you will be peaceful in the world hereafter.

data.name: ਅਉਧ ਘਟੈ ਦਿਨਸੁ ਰੈਣਾਰੇ ॥
data.english: Every day and night one’s remaining life is diminishing:

data.name: ਮਨ ਗੁਰ ਮਿਲਿ ਕਾਜ ਸਵਾਰੇ ॥੧॥ ਰਹਾਉ ॥
data.english: O’ my mind, accomplish the objective  of this life by following the Guru’s teaching.

data.name: ਇਹੁ ਸੰਸਾਰੁ ਬਿਕਾਰੁ ਸੰਸੇ ਮਹਿ ਤਰਿਓ ਬ੍ਰਹਮ ਗਿਆਨੀ ॥
data.english: This world is engrossed in vices and cynicism, only a divinely wise person is able to swim across the world-ocean of vices.

data.name: ਜਿਸਹਿ ਜਗਾਇ ਪੀਆਵੈ ਇਹੁ ਰਸੁ ਅਕਥ ਕਥਾ ਤਿਨਿ ਜਾਨੀ ॥੨॥
data.english: One whom God awakens from the slumber of worldly entanglements and helps to drink the elixir of Naam, understands the indescribable virtues of God.

data.name: ਜਾ ਕਉ ਆਏ ਸੋਈ ਬਿਹਾਝਹੁ ਹਰਿ ਗੁਰ ਤੇ ਮਨਹਿ ਬਸੇਰਾ ॥
data.english: O’ my friends, amass only that wealth for which you have come to this world; it is only through the Guru that God manifests in one’s mind.

data.name: ਨਿਜ ਘਰਿ ਮਹਲੁ ਪਾਵਹੁ ਸੁਖ ਸਹਜੇ ਬਹੁਰਿ ਨ ਹੋਇਗੋ ਫੇਰਾ ॥੩॥
data.english: Intuitively realize God’s presence within your inner self, you shall not be consigned again to the cycles of birth and death.

data.name: ਅੰਤਰਜਾਮੀ ਪੁਰਖ ਬਿਧਾਤੇ ਸਰਧਾ ਮਨ ਕੀ ਪੂਰੇ ॥
data.english: O’ the all pervading, omniscient creator-God, please fulfill the yearning of my mind,

data.name: ਨਾਨਕ ਦਾਸੁ ਇਹੈ ਸੁਖੁ ਮਾਗੈ ਮੋ ਕਉ ਕਰਿ ਸੰਤਨ ਕੀ ਧੂਰੇ ॥੪॥੫॥
data.english: and make me the most humble servant of Your saints; Your humble devotee Nanak, begs only for this happiness.

data.name: ੴ ਸਤਿਗੁਰ ਪ੍ਰਸਾਦਿ ॥
data.english: One eternal God. Realized by the grace of the True Guru:

data.name: ਰਾਗੁ ਸਿਰੀਰਾਗੁ ਮਹਲਾ ਪਹਿਲਾ ੧ ਘਰੁ ੧ ॥
data.english: Siree Raag, by the First Guru: beat one

data.name: ਮੋਤੀ ਤ ਮੰਦਰ ਊਸਰਹਿ ਰਤਨੀ ਤ ਹੋਹਿ ਜੜਾਉ ॥
data.english: (O’ God, grant me this understanding that) even if I am living in a magnificent palace, built with pearls, studded with jewels and rubies,

data.name: ਕਸਤੂਰਿ ਕੁੰਗੂ ਅਗਰਿ ਚੰਦਨਿ ਲੀਪਿ ਆਵੈ ਚਾਉ ॥
data.english: and scented with musk, saffron and sandalwood, a sheer delight to behold.

data.name: ਮਤੁ ਦੇਖਿ ਭੂਲਾ ਵੀਸਰੈ ਤੇਰਾ ਚਿਤਿ ਨ ਆਵੈ ਨਾਉ ॥੧॥
data.english: O’ God, I am afraid that, I may go astray and forget You after seeing these palaces .

data.name: ਹਰਿ ਬਿਨੁ ਜੀਉ ਜਲਿ ਬਲਿ ਜਾਉ ॥
data.english: Without God’s remembrance, my soul suffers as if it is being burnt and scorched.

data.name: ਮੈ ਆਪਣਾ ਗੁਰੁ ਪੂਛਿ ਦੇਖਿਆ ਅਵਰੁ ਨਾਹੀ ਥਾਉ ॥੧॥ ਰਹਾਉ ॥
data.english: I have confirmed from my Guru that except God, there is no other place of shelter where one can find joy and peace.

data.name: ਧਰਤੀ ਤ ਹੀਰੇ ਲਾਲ ਜੜਤੀ ਪਲਘਿ ਲਾਲ ਜੜਾਉ ॥
data.english: O’ God, even if I was in a palace where the floor was studded with diamonds and rubies, the bed with jewels,

data.name: ਮੋਹਣੀ ਮੁਖਿ ਮਣੀ ਸੋਹੈ ਕਰੇ ਰੰਗਿ ਪਸਾਉ ॥
data.english: -and if an extremely beautiful and captivating woman adorned with jewelery, trying to entice me.

data.name: ਮਤੁ ਦੇਖਿ ਭੂਲਾ ਵੀਸਰੈ ਤੇਰਾ ਚਿਤਿ ਨ ਆਵੈ ਨਾਉ ॥੨॥
data.english: O’ God, I am afraid that seeing these things,I may go astray and forget You.

data.name: ਸਿਧੁ ਹੋਵਾ ਸਿਧਿ ਲਾਈ ਰਿਧਿ ਆਖਾ ਆਉ ॥
data.english: O’ God, if I were an accomplished yogi capable of performing miracles and summon mystical powers.

data.name: ਗੁਪਤੁ ਪਰਗਟੁ ਹੋਇ ਬੈਸਾ ਲੋਕੁ ਰਾਖੈ ਭਾਉ ॥
data.english: and appear and disappear at will, so that people would hold me in awe.

data.name: ਮਤੁ ਦੇਖਿ ਭੂਲਾ ਵੀਸਰੈ ਤੇਰਾ ਚਿਤਿ ਨ ਆਵੈ ਨਾਉ ॥੩॥
data.english: O’ God, I am afraid that seeing these powers, I may go astray and forget You.

data.name: ਸੁਲਤਾਨੁ ਹੋਵਾ ਮੇਲਿ ਲਸਕਰ ਤਖਤਿ ਰਾਖਾ ਪਾਉ ॥
data.english: O’ God, even if I were to become an emperor and raise a huge army, and sit on a throne,

data.name: ਹੁਕਮੁ ਹਾਸਲੁ ਕਰੀ ਬੈਠਾ ਨਾਨਕਾ ਸਭ ਵਾਉ ॥
data.english: issue commands and collect taxes, O’ Nanak, all of this is useless and could pass away like a puff of wind

data.name: ਮਤੁ ਦੇਖਿ ਭੂਲਾ ਵੀਸਰੈ ਤੇਰਾ ਚਿਤਿ ਨ ਆਵੈ ਨਾਉ ॥੪॥੧॥
data.english: O’ God, I am afraid that seeing this kingdom, I may go astray and forget You.

data.name: ਸਿਰੀਰਾਗੁ ਮਹਲਾ ੧ ॥
data.english: Siree Raag, by the First Guru

data.name: ਕੋਟਿ ਕੋਟੀ ਮੇਰੀ ਆਰਜਾ ਪਵਣੁ ਪੀਅਣੁ ਅਪਿਆਉ ॥
data.english: O’ God, if I could live for millions and millions of years, and if the air was my food and drink,

data.name: ਚੰਦੁ ਸੂਰਜੁ ਦੁਇ ਗੁਫੈ ਨ ਦੇਖਾ ਸੁਪਨੈ ਸਉਣ ਨ ਥਾਉ ॥
data.english: and if I lived in a cave and never saw either the sun or the moon, and if I never slept, even in dreams.

data.name: ਭੀ ਤੇਰੀ ਕੀਮਤਿ ਨਾ ਪਵੈ ਹਉ ਕੇਵਡੁ ਆਖਾ ਨਾਉ ॥੧॥
data.english: Even after doing all this, I will not be capable to describe Your worth. How can I say how great You are?

data.name: ਸਾਚਾ ਨਿਰੰਕਾਰੁ ਨਿਜ ਥਾਇ ॥
data.english: The ever existing, formless God, is manifest within Himself.

data.name: ਸੁਣਿ ਸੁਣਿ ਆਖਣੁ ਆਖਣਾ ਜੇ ਭਾਵੈ ਕਰੇ ਤਮਾਇ ॥੧॥ ਰਹਾਉ ॥
data.english: It is by listening to others that we describe His greatness. As and when it pleases Him, He instills in us the craving (to know Him and sing His praises).

data.name: ਕੁਸਾ ਕਟੀਆ ਵਾਰ ਵਾਰ ਪੀਸਣਿ ਪੀਸਾ ਪਾਇ ॥
data.english: O’ God, If I was slashed and cut into pieces, over and over again, and put into the mill and ground into flour,

data.name: ਅਗੀ ਸੇਤੀ ਜਾਲੀਆ ਭਸਮ ਸੇਤੀ ਰਲਿ ਜਾਉ ॥
data.english: burnt by fire and mixed with ashes.

data.name: ਭੀ ਤੇਰੀ ਕੀਮਤਿ ਨਾ ਪਵੈ ਹਉ ਕੇਵਡੁ ਆਖਾ ਨਾਉ ॥੨॥
data.english: Even after all this, I will not be capable to describe Your worth. How can I say how great You are?

data.name: ਪੰਖੀ ਹੋਇ ਕੈ ਜੇ ਭਵਾ ਸੈ ਅਸਮਾਨੀ ਜਾਉ ॥
data.english: O’ God, if I were a bird, soaring and flying through hundreds of skies,

data.name: ਨਦਰੀ ਕਿਸੈ ਨ ਆਵਊ ਨਾ ਕਿਛੁ ਪੀਆ ਨ ਖਾਉ ॥
data.english: (And flying so high) if I were invisible, neither eating nor drinking anything.

data.name: ਭੀ ਤੇਰੀ ਕੀਮਤਿ ਨਾ ਪਵੈ ਹਉ ਕੇਵਡੁ ਆਖਾ ਨਾਉ ॥੩॥
data.english: Even then I could not estimate Your worth. How can I say how great You are?

data.name: ਨਾਨਕ ਕਾਗਦ ਲਖ ਮਣਾ ਪੜਿ ਪੜਿ ਕੀਚੈ ਭਾਉ ॥
data.english: O’ Nanak, if I had tons of Paper with Your praises written on them and if I were to contemplate on them.

data.name: ਮਸੂ ਤੋਟਿ ਨ ਆਵਈ ਲੇਖਣਿ ਪਉਣੁ ਚਲਾਉ ॥
data.english: And if I were to write your praises with never ending ink and pen moving as fast as the wind,

data.name: ਭੀ ਤੇਰੀ ਕੀਮਤਿ ਨਾ ਪਵੈ ਹਉ ਕੇਵਡੁ ਆਖਾ ਨਾਉ ॥੪॥੨॥
data.english: even then Your worth could not be determined. How could I describe Your greatness?

data.name: ਸਿਰੀਰਾਗੁ ਮਹਲਾ ੧ ॥
data.english: Siree Raag, by the First Guru:

data.name: ਲੇਖੈ ਬੋਲਣੁ ਬੋਲਣਾ ਲੇਖੈ ਖਾਣਾ ਖਾਉ ॥
data.english: O’ mortal, the words you speak and whatever you eat are pre-ordained and you are accountable for these.

data.name: ਲੇਖੈ ਵਾਟ ਚਲਾਈਆ ਲੇਖੈ ਸੁਣਿ ਵੇਖਾਉ ॥
data.english: We are accountable for the path we walk on (choices we make) including what we hear and what we see.

data.name: ਲੇਖੈ ਸਾਹ ਲਵਾਈਅਹਿ ਪੜੇ ਕਿ ਪੁਛਣ ਜਾਉ ॥੧॥
data.english: The breaths you take (life span), are all pre-ordained and you are accountable for them. There is no need to ask any scholar about it.

data.name: ਬਾਬਾ ਮਾਇਆ ਰਚਨਾ ਧੋਹੁ ॥
data.english: Oh my friend, this play of Maya is nothing but an illusion.

data.name: ਅੰਧੈ ਨਾਮੁ ਵਿਸਾਰਿਆ ਨਾ ਤਿਸੁ ਏਹ ਨ ਓਹੁ ॥੧॥ ਰਹਾਉ ॥
data.english: The spiritually blind forsake God’s Name, and don’t attain peace, neither here nor hereafter.

data.name: ਜੀਵਣ ਮਰਣਾ ਜਾਇ ਕੈ ਏਥੈ ਖਾਜੈ ਕਾਲਿ ॥
data.english: In this world, from birth to death, a person wastes valuable time accumulating worldly wealth

data.name: ਜਿਥੈ ਬਹਿ ਸਮਝਾਈਐ ਤਿਥੈ ਕੋਇ ਨ ਚਲਿਓ ਨਾਲਿ ॥
data.english: Upon death, you solely are held accountable for your deeds. No one is going to come to your rescue.

data.name: ਰੋਵਣ ਵਾਲੇ ਜੇਤੜੇ ਸਭਿ ਬੰਨਹਿ ਪੰਡ ਪਰਾਲਿ ॥੨॥
data.english: Even those who cry at a person’s death, do no good to anybody, and their tears are as useless as a bundles of straw.

data.name: ਸਭੁ ਕੋ ਆਖੈ ਬਹੁਤੁ ਬਹੁਤੁ ਘਟਿ ਨ ਆਖੈ ਕੋਇ ॥
data.english: O’ God, everyone asks You for more and more wealth and no one asks for less.

data.name: ਕੀਮਤਿ ਕਿਨੈ ਨ ਪਾਈਆ ਕਹਣਿ ਨ ਵਡਾ ਹੋਇ ॥
data.english: No one has ever put any value on the things one has asked for. No one has become greater by his own saying.

data.name: ਸਾਚਾ ਸਾਹਬੁ ਏਕੁ ਤੂ ਹੋਰਿ ਜੀਆ ਕੇਤੇ ਲੋਅ ॥੩॥
data.english: O’ God, You alone are the eternal One. All other beings and all other worlds are perishable.

data.name: ਨੀਚਾ ਅੰਦਰਿ ਨੀਚ ਜਾਤਿ ਨੀਚੀ ਹੂ ਅਤਿ ਨੀਚੁ ॥
data.english: O’ God), even if a person belongs to the lowliest of the low social status,

data.name: ਨਾਨਕੁ ਤਿਨ ਕੈ ਸੰਗਿ ਸਾਥਿ ਵਡਿਆ ਸਿਉ ਕਿਆ ਰੀਸ ॥
data.english: O’ God, Nanak prefers to remain in their society and company and does not want to compete with those in upper class (who have forgotten You).

data.name: ਜਿਥੈ ਨੀਚ ਸਮਾਲੀਅਨਿ ਤਿਥੈ ਨਦਰਿ ਤੇਰੀ ਬਖਸੀਸ ॥੪॥੩॥
data.english: There is the glance of Your grace, where the humble ones are looked after.

data.name: ਸਿਰੀਰਾਗੁ ਮਹਲਾ ੧ ॥
data.english: Siree Raag, by the First Guru:

data.name: ਲਬੁ ਕੁਤਾ ਕੂੜੁ ਚੂਹੜਾ ਠਗਿ ਖਾਧਾ ਮੁਰਦਾਰੁ ॥
data.english: Being engrossed in greed is acting like a dog, lying is like dealing with filth, and cheating others is like eating a corpse.

data.name: ਪਰ ਨਿੰਦਾ ਪਰ ਮਲੁ ਮੁਖ ਸੁਧੀ ਅਗਨਿ ਕ੍ਰੋਧੁ ਚੰਡਾਲੁ ॥
data.english: Slandering others is like putting their filth in your mouth, acting in anger is like burning your own body.

data.name: ਰਸ ਕਸ ਆਪੁ ਸਲਾਹਣਾ ਏ ਕਰਮ ਮੇਰੇ ਕਰਤਾਰ ॥੧॥
data.english: O’ my Creator, remaining indulged in these vices and self praise is what we do.

data.name: ਬਾਬਾ ਬੋਲੀਐ ਪਤਿ ਹੋਇ ॥
data.english: O Baba, speak only that which will bring you honor in God’s Court.

data.name: ਊਤਮ ਸੇ ਦਰਿ ਊਤਮ ਕਹੀਅਹਿ ਨੀਚ ਕਰਮ ਬਹਿ ਰੋਇ ॥੧॥ ਰਹਾਉ ॥
data.english: They alone are truly superior, who are judged virtuous in God’s court. Those who do evil deeds shall wail.

data.name: ਰਸੁ ਸੁਇਨਾ ਰਸੁ ਰੁਪਾ ਕਾਮਣਿ ਰਸੁ ਪਰਮਲ ਕੀ ਵਾਸੁ ॥
data.english: Being obsessed with amassing wealth, indulgence in lust and fragrances (without the remembrance of God) are addictions.

data.name: ਰਸੁ ਘੋੜੇ ਰਸੁ ਸੇਜਾ ਮੰਦਰ ਰਸੁ ਮੀਠਾ ਰਸੁ ਮਾਸੁ ॥
data.english: and over indulgence in expensive rides, comfortable beds, tasty foods, and eating flesh are also addictions.

data.name: ਏਤੇ ਰਸ ਸਰੀਰ ਕੇ ਕੈ ਘਟਿ ਨਾਮ ਨਿਵਾਸੁ ॥੨॥
data.english: When so many addictions engross the human body, where is room left for God’s love to reside?

data.name: ਜਿਤੁ ਬੋਲਿਐ ਪਤਿ ਪਾਈਐ ਸੋ ਬੋਲਿਆ ਪਰਵਾਣੁ ॥
data.english: Only those words are praise-worthy that bring honor in God’s court.

data.name: ਫਿਕਾ ਬੋਲਿ ਵਿਗੁਚਣਾ ਸੁਣਿ ਮੂਰਖ ਮਨ ਅਜਾਣ ॥
data.english: Listen, O’ foolish ignorant mind, by uttering rude words one ruins oneself.

data.name: ਜੋ ਤਿਸੁ ਭਾਵਹਿ ਸੇ ਭਲੇ ਹੋਰਿ ਕਿ ਕਹਣ ਵਖਾਣ ॥੩॥
data.english: Those who are pleasing to Him are virtuous, what else is there to be said?

data.name: ਤਿਨ ਮਤਿ ਤਿਨ ਪਤਿ ਤਿਨ ਧਨੁ ਪਲੈ ਜਿਨ ਹਿਰਦੈ ਰਹਿਆ ਸਮਾਇ ॥
data.english: Those who always remember Him with love,and in whose hearts God always resides have true wisdom,true honor and true wealth.

data.name: ਤਿਨ ਕਾ ਕਿਆ ਸਾਲਾਹਣਾ ਅਵਰ ਸੁਆਲਿਉ ਕਾਇ ॥
data.english: What praise can be offered for them? What other adornments can be bestowed upon them?

data.name: ਨਾਨਕ ਨਦਰੀ ਬਾਹਰੇ ਰਾਚਹਿ ਦਾਨਿ ਨ ਨਾਇ ॥੪॥੪॥
data.english: O’ Nanak, those who lack God’s Grace, cherish neither charity (seva) nor His Name (His love) and stay engrossed in worldly pleasures.

data.name: ਸਿਰੀਰਾਗੁ ਮਹਲਾ ੧ ॥
data.english: Siree Raag, by the First Guru:

data.name: ਅਮਲੁ ਗਲੋਲਾ ਕੂੜ ਕਾ ਦਿਤਾ ਦੇਵਣਹਾਰਿ ॥
data.english: God Himself has engrossed people who are devoid of His Grace, in emotional attachment to worldly illusions or falsehood.

data.name: ਮਤੀ ਮਰਣੁ ਵਿਸਾਰਿਆ ਖੁਸੀ ਕੀਤੀ ਦਿਨ ਚਾਰਿ ॥
data.english: Engrossed in these emotional attachments, they become oblivious to death and indulge in temporary worldly pleasures.

data.name: ਸਚੁ ਮਿਲਿਆ ਤਿਨ ਸੋਫੀਆ ਰਾਖਣ ਕਉ ਦਰਵਾਰੁ ॥੧॥
data.english: Those who forsake this intoxicating love for worldly attachments have realized the Eternal God.

data.name: ਨਾਨਕ ਸਾਚੇ ਕਉ ਸਚੁ ਜਾਣੁ ॥
data.english: O’ Nanak, know that the true God alone is Eternal,

data.name: ਜਿਤੁ ਸੇਵਿਐ ਸੁਖੁ ਪਾਈਐ ਤੇਰੀ ਦਰਗਹ ਚਲੈ ਮਾਣੁ ॥੧॥ ਰਹਾਉ ॥
data.english: serving Whom (remembering Him with loving devotion) one obtains joy and peace, and goes to God’s’ court with honor.

data.name: ਸਚੁ ਸਰਾ ਗੁੜ ਬਾਹਰਾ ਜਿਸੁ ਵਿਚਿ ਸਚਾ ਨਾਉ ॥
data.english: Truth is the wine, which is distilled not from molasses, but from God’s Name.

data.name: ਸੁਣਹਿ ਵਖਾਣਹਿ ਜੇਤੜੇ ਹਉ ਤਿਨ ਬਲਿਹਾਰੈ ਜਾਉ ॥
data.english: I dedicate my life to those who hear and recite Naam.

data.name: ਤਾ ਮਨੁ ਖੀਵਾ ਜਾਣੀਐ ਜਾ ਮਹਲੀ ਪਾਏ ਥਾਉ ॥੨॥
data.english: One’s mind is considered in bliss only when it remains absorbed in the remembrance of God.

data.name: ਨਾਉ ਨੀਰੁ ਚੰਗਿਆਈਆ ਸਤੁ ਪਰਮਲੁ ਤਨਿ ਵਾਸੁ ॥
data.english: O, mortal, use the name of God and His virtues as water to bathe and apply the perfume of righteousness to the body.

data.name: ਤਾ ਮੁਖੁ ਹੋਵੈ ਉਜਲਾ ਲਖ ਦਾਤੀ ਇਕ ਦਾਤਿ ॥
data.english: Then l your face will become radiant , and this one gift (of God’s Name) is greater than a million gifts.

data.name: ਦੂਖ ਤਿਸੈ ਪਹਿ ਆਖੀਅਹਿ ਸੂਖ ਜਿਸੈ ਹੀ ਪਾਸਿ ॥੩॥
data.english: You should narrate your woes only to Him who is the source of all comforts.

data.name: ਸੋ ਕਿਉ ਮਨਹੁ ਵਿਸਾਰੀਐ ਜਾ ਕੇ ਜੀਅ ਪਰਾਣ ॥
data.english: Why should we become forgetful of Him, to whom belong our life and soul?

data.name: ਤਿਸੁ ਵਿਣੁ ਸਭੁ ਅਪਵਿਤ੍ਰੁ ਹੈ ਜੇਤਾ ਪੈਨਣੁ ਖਾਣੁ ॥
data.english: Without remembering God, all that we wear and eat pollutes our mind.

data.name: ਹੋਰਿ ਗਲਾਂ ਸਭਿ ਕੂੜੀਆ ਤੁਧੁ ਭਾਵੈ ਪਰਵਾਣੁ ॥੪॥੫॥
data.english: O God, whatever pleases You is acceptable, everything else is false.

data.name: ਸਿਰੀਰਾਗੁ ਮਹਲੁ ੧ ॥
data.english: Siree Raag, by the First Guru:

data.name: ਜਾਲਿ ਮੋਹੁ ਘਸਿ ਮਸੁ ਕਰਿ ਮਤਿ ਕਾਗਦੁ ਕਰਿ ਸਾਰੁ ॥
data.english: Burn emotional worldly attachment, and grind it into ink. Transform your intelligence into the purest of paper.

data.name: ਭਾਉ ਕਲਮ ਕਰਿ ਚਿਤੁ ਲੇਖਾਰੀ ਗੁਰ ਪੁਛਿ ਲਿਖੁ ਬੀਚਾਰੁ ॥
data.english: Make the love for God your pen and your mind the writer. After consulting your Guru, write immaculate thoughts about God.

data.name: ਲਿਖੁ ਨਾਮੁ ਸਾਲਾਹ ਲਿਖੁ ਲਿਖੁ ਅੰਤੁ ਨ ਪਾਰਾਵਾਰੁ ॥੧॥
data.english: Yes write down praises of God, over and over again, which has no end or limit.

data.name: ਬਾਬਾ ਏਹੁ ਲੇਖਾ ਲਿਖਿ ਜਾਣੁ ॥
data.english: O Baba, learn to write such an account,

data.name: ਜਿਥੈ ਲੇਖਾ ਮੰਗੀਐ ਤਿਥੈ ਹੋਇ ਸਚਾ ਨੀਸਾਣੁ ॥੧॥ ਰਹਾਉ ॥
data.english: So that when the account of our deeds is called for, it is marked as true.

data.name: ਜਿਥੈ ਮਿਲਹਿ ਵਡਿਆਈਆ ਸਦ ਖੁਸੀਆ ਸਦ ਚਾਉ ॥
data.english: Where greatness, eternal peace and everlasting joy are bestowed,

data.name: ਤਿਨ ਮੁਖਿ ਟਿਕੇ ਨਿਕਲਹਿ ਜਿਨ ਮਨਿ ਸਚਾ ਨਾਉ ॥
data.english: There the faces of those, whose minds are attuned to the true Naam, are anointed with the mark of honor.

data.name: ਕਰਮਿ ਮਿਲੈ ਤਾ ਪਾਈਐ ਨਾਹੀ ਗਲੀ ਵਾਉ ਦੁਆਉ ॥੨॥
data.english: But Naam is obtained by God’s Grace, and not through idle talks.

data.name: ਇਕਿ ਆਵਹਿ ਇਕਿ ਜਾਹਿ ਉਠਿ ਰਖੀਅਹਿ ਨਾਵ ਸਲਾਰ ॥
data.english: Myriads of individuals come into this world and depart. some are called by renowned names.

data.name: ਇਕਿ ਉਪਾਏ ਮੰਗਤੇ ਇਕਨਾ ਵਡੇ ਦਰਵਾਰ ॥
data.english: Some are born beggars, and some hold vast courts.

data.name: ਅਗੈ ਗਇਆ ਜਾਣੀਐ ਵਿਣੁ ਨਾਵੈ ਵੇਕਾਰ ॥੩॥
data.english: Going to the world hereafter, they realize that without Naam, they have wasted their life.

data.name: ਭੈ ਤੇਰੈ ਡਰੁ ਅਗਲਾ ਖਪਿ ਖਪਿ ਛਿਜੈ ਦੇਹ ॥
data.english: O’ God, my body is withering away in dread of Your mighty fear.

data.name: ਨਾਵ ਜਿਨਾ ਸੁਲਤਾਨ ਖਾਨ ਹੋਦੇ ਡਿਠੇ ਖੇਹ ॥
data.english: With my own eyes, I have seen those known as kings and lords reduced to dust.

data.name: ਨਾਨਕ ਉਠੀ ਚਲਿਆ ਸਭਿ ਕੂੜੇ ਤੁਟੇ ਨੇਹ ॥੪॥੬॥
data.english: O’ Nanak, when one departs from the world, all one’s false attachments are broken.

data.name: ਸਿਰੀਰਾਗੁ ਮਹਲਾ ੧ ॥
data.english: Siree Raag, by the First Guru:

data.name: ਸਭਿ ਰਸ ਮਿਠੇ ਮੰਨਿਐ ਸੁਣਿਐ ਸਾਲੋਣੇ ॥
data.english: To believe in God’s Name is to enjoy sweets, to hear His Name is to taste salty dishes.

data.name: ਖਟ ਤੁਰਸੀ ਮੁਖਿ ਬੋਲਣਾ ਮਾਰਣ ਨਾਦ ਕੀਏ ॥
data.english: Reciting God’s Name is like savouring sour delicacies, and singing God’s praises is like enjoying spicy food.

data.name: ਛਤੀਹ ਅੰਮ੍ਰਿਤ ਭਾਉ ਏਕੁ ਜਾ ਕਉ ਨਦਰਿ ਕਰੇਇ ॥੧॥
data.english: To those who are blessed by His Grace, feeling of love for God is like enjoying all the tasty dishes.

data.name: ਬਾਬਾ ਹੋਰੁ ਖਾਣਾ ਖੁਸੀ ਖੁਆਰੁ ॥
data.english: O’ Baba, all those eatables ruin our happiness and make us suffer (in the end),

data.name: ਜਿਤੁ ਖਾਧੈ ਤਨੁ ਪੀੜੀਐ ਮਨ ਮਹਿ ਚਲਹਿ ਵਿਕਾਰ ॥੧॥ ਰਹਾਉ ॥
data.english: Because remaining totally involved in these worldly pleasures takes you away from God causing misery to the body and evil thoughts run through the mind.

data.name: ਰਤਾ ਪੈਨਣੁ ਮਨੁ ਰਤਾ ਸੁਪੇਦੀ ਸਤੁ ਦਾਨੁ ॥
data.english: To dye one’s mind in God’s Name is like wearing red clothes (happiness). To practice charity and truthfulness is to be dressed in white (purity).

data.name: ਨੀਲੀ ਸਿਆਹੀ ਕਦਾ ਕਰਣੀ ਪਹਿਰਣੁ ਪੈਰ ਧਿਆਨੁ ॥
data.english: Let removing vices from mind be your blue dress, and remembering God with love and devotion be your white robe of honor.

data.name: ਕਮਰਬੰਦੁ ਸੰਤੋਖ ਕਾ ਧਨੁ ਜੋਬਨੁ ਤੇਰਾ ਨਾਮੁ ॥੨॥
data.english: Let contentment be my waistband, and God’s Name my wealth and youth.

data.name: ਬਾਬਾ ਹੋਰੁ ਪੈਨਣੁ ਖੁਸੀ ਖੁਆਰੁ ॥
data.english: O Baba, over indulgence in the worldly pleasures of wearing beautiful clothes ruins your inner happiness (that you get by remembering God).

data.name: ਜਿਤੁ ਪੈਧੈ ਤਨੁ ਪੀੜੀਐ ਮਨ ਮਹਿ ਚਲਹਿ ਵਿਕਾਰ ॥੧॥ ਰਹਾਉ ॥
data.english: Because remaining totally involved in these worldly pleasures of wearing beautiful clothes takes you away from God causing misery to the body and evil thoughts run through the mind.

data.name: ਘੋੜੇ ਪਾਖਰ ਸੁਇਨੇ ਸਾਖਤਿ ਬੂਝਣੁ ਤੇਰੀ ਵਾਟ ॥
data.english: O’ God, to understand and follow the way of life filled with your remembrance is like owning horses decorated with gold accessories and protective iron shields.

data.name: ਤਰਕਸ ਤੀਰ ਕਮਾਣ ਸਾਂਗ ਤੇਗਬੰਦ ਗੁਣ ਧਾਤੁ ॥
data.english: The pursuit of Your virtues is like carrying all the weapons, such as bow and arrow, spear and sword.

data.name: ਵਾਜਾ ਨੇਜਾ ਪਤਿ ਸਿਉ ਪਰਗਟੁ ਕਰਮੁ ਤੇਰਾ ਮੇਰੀ ਜਾਤਿ ॥੩॥
data.english: To be honored in Your court is like having drums and lances. Your Grace is the highest social status for me.

data.name: ਬਾਬਾ ਹੋਰੁ ਚੜਣਾ ਖੁਸੀ ਖੁਆਰੁ ॥
data.english: O’ Baba, over indulgence in these worldly pleasures deprives you from inner happiness (that you get by remembering God).

data.name: ਜਿਤੁ ਚੜਿਐ ਤਨੁ ਪੀੜੀਐ ਮਨ ਮਹਿ ਚਲਹਿ ਵਿਕਾਰ ॥੧॥ ਰਹਾਉ ॥
data.english: Because remaining totally involved in these worldly pleasures takes you away from God causing misery to the body and evil thoughts run through the mind.

data.name: ਘਰ ਮੰਦਰ ਖੁਸੀ ਨਾਮ ਕੀ ਨਦਰਿ ਤੇਰੀ ਪਰਵਾਰੁ ॥
data.english: The joy I get by dwelling on Naam is like living in a beautiful mansion. O God, Your Gracious Glance is like the pleasure of having a big family.

data.name: ਹੁਕਮੁ ਸੋਈ ਤੁਧੁ ਭਾਵਸੀ ਹੋਰੁ ਆਖਣੁ ਬਹੁਤੁ ਅਪਾਰੁ ॥
data.english: For me, the only command that matters is what pleases You. To say any thing else is far beyond anyone’s reach

data.name: ਨਾਨਕ ਸਚਾ ਪਾਤਿਸਾਹੁ ਪੂਛਿ ਨ ਕਰੇ ਬੀਚਾਰੁ ॥੪॥
data.english: O Nanak, the True King (God) does not seek advice from anyone else in His decisions.

data.name: ਬਾਬਾ ਹੋਰੁ ਸਉਣਾ ਖੁਸੀ ਖੁਆਰੁ ॥
data.english: O Baba, sleeping more than necessary deprives you from inner happiness (that you get by remembering God).

data.name: ਜਿਤੁ ਸੁਤੈ ਤਨੁ ਪੀੜੀਐ ਮਨ ਮਹਿ ਚਲਹਿ ਵਿਕਾਰ ॥੧॥ ਰਹਾਉ ॥੪॥੭॥
data.english: Because remaining totally involved in these worldly pleasures takes you away from God causing misery to the body and evil thoughts run through the mind.

data.name: ਸਿਰੀਰਾਗੁ ਮਹਲਾ ੧ ॥
data.english: Siree Raag, by the First Guru:

data.name: ਕੁੰਗੂ ਕੀ ਕਾਂਇਆ ਰਤਨਾ ਕੀ ਲਲਿਤਾ ਅਗਰਿ ਵਾਸੁ ਤਨਿ ਸਾਸੁ ॥
data.english: The person, whose body is devoid of vices (pure like saffron ) and the tongue sings only the praises of God (precious like jewels) and every breath fragrant in the memory of God (fragrant like eaglewood ),

data.name: ਅਠਸਠਿ ਤੀਰਥ ਕਾ ਮੁਖਿ ਟਿਕਾ ਤਿਤੁ ਘਟਿ ਮਤਿ ਵਿਗਾਸੁ ॥
data.english: His face bears the mark of piousness (as if bathed in sixty eight holy places of pilgrimage) and mind illuminated with Divine wisdom,

data.name: ਓਤੁ ਮਤੀ ਸਾਲਾਹਣਾ ਸਚੁ ਨਾਮੁ ਗੁਣਤਾਸੁ ॥੧॥
data.english: -with that wisdom, he chants the Praises of God, the Treasure of virtues.

data.name: ਬਾਬਾ ਹੋਰ ਮਤਿ ਹੋਰ ਹੋਰ ॥
data.english: O’ brother, other worldly wisdom that takes us away from God is useless and irrelevant.

data.name: ਜੇ ਸਉ ਵੇਰ ਕਮਾਈਐ ਕੂੜੈ ਕੂੜਾ ਜੋਰੁ ॥੧॥ ਰਹਾਉ ॥
data.english: If falsehood is practiced a hundred times, it is still false in its effects.

data.name: ਪੂਜ ਲਗੈ ਪੀਰੁ ਆਖੀਐ ਸਭੁ ਮਿਲੈ ਸੰਸਾਰੁ ॥
data.english: You may be worshipped and adored as a Pir (a spiritual teacher); you may be welcomed by all the world;

data.name: ਨਾਉ ਸਦਾਏ ਆਪਣਾ ਹੋਵੈ ਸਿਧੁ ਸੁਮਾਰੁ ॥
data.english: If he adopt a lofty name, and be known to have supernatural spiritual powers,

data.name: ਜਾ ਪਤਿ ਲੇਖੈ ਨਾ ਪਵੈ ਸਭਾ ਪੂਜ ਖੁਆਰੁ ॥੨॥
data.english: even so, if he not accepted in the Court of God, then all this adoration is useless.

data.name: ਜਿਨ ਕਉ ਸਤਿਗੁਰਿ ਥਾਪਿਆ ਤਿਨ ਮੇਟਿ ਨ ਸਕੈ ਕੋਇ ॥
data.english: No one can overthrow those who have been established by the True Guru.

data.name: ਓਨਾ ਅੰਦਰਿ ਨਾਮੁ ਨਿਧਾਨੁ ਹੈ ਨਾਮੋ ਪਰਗਟੁ ਹੋਇ ॥
data.english: The Treasure of the Naam, is within them, and through the Naam, they are honorable and famous.

data.name: ਨਾਉ ਪੂਜੀਐ ਨਾਉ ਮੰਨੀਐ ਅਖੰਡੁ ਸਦਾ ਸਚੁ ਸੋਇ ॥੩॥
data.english: They always worship God’s Name with loving devotion, and have full faith in Him Who is complete and everlasting.

data.name: ਖੇਹੂ ਖੇਹ ਰਲਾਈਐ ਤਾ ਜੀਉ ਕੇਹਾ ਹੋਇ ॥
data.english: When the body mingles with dust, what happens to the soul?

data.name: ਜਲੀਆ ਸਭਿ ਸਿਆਣਪਾ ਉਠੀ ਚਲਿਆ ਰੋਇ ॥
data.english: The soul departs crying, and all cleverness is burnt away.

data.name: ਨਾਨਕ ਨਾਮਿ ਵਿਸਾਰਿਐ ਦਰਿ ਗਇਆ ਕਿਆ ਹੋਇ ॥੪॥੮॥
data.english: O Nanak, those who forsake Naam-what will happen when they go to the Court of God?

data.name: ਸਿਰੀਰਾਗੁ ਮਹਲਾ ੧ ॥
data.english: Siree Raag, by the First Guru:

data.name: ਗੁਣਵੰਤੀ ਗੁਣ ਵੀਥਰੈ ਅਉਗੁਣਵੰਤੀ ਝੂਰਿ ॥
data.english: The virtuous soul-bride always contemplate on the virtues of God and the one engrossed with vices, suffer in misery.

data.name: ਜੇ ਲੋੜਹਿ ਵਰੁ ਕਾਮਣੀ ਨਹ ਮਿਲੀਐ ਪਿਰ ਕੂਰਿ ॥
data.english: O’ soul-bride, if you long for your Master God, you must know that He is not realized by falsehood.

data.name: ਨਾ ਬੇੜੀ ਨਾ ਤੁਲਹੜਾ ਨਾ ਪਾਈਐ ਪਿਰੁ ਦੂਰਿ ॥੧॥
data.english: (you are drowning in the world ocean of attachments and if you have you have not remembered God) you have no means to cross this world-ocean of vices.

data.name: ਮੇਰੇ ਠਾਕੁਰ ਪੂਰੈ ਤਖਤਿ ਅਡੋਲੁ ॥
data.english: My perfect God is serenely seated on the eternal throne.

data.name: ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਪੂਰਾ ਜੇ ਕਰੇ ਪਾਈਐ ਸਾਚੁ ਅਤੋਲੁ ॥੧॥ ਰਹਾਉ ॥
data.english: If by Guru’s grace a person becomes perfect (full of merit), that person attains the infinite God.

data.name: ਪ੍ਰਭੁ ਹਰਿਮੰਦਰੁ ਸੋਹਣਾ ਤਿਸੁ ਮਹਿ ਮਾਣਕ ਲਾਲ ॥ ਮੋਤੀ ਹੀਰਾ ਨਿਰਮਲਾ ਕੰਚਨ ਕੋਟ ਰੀਸਾਲ ॥
data.english: God is (like) a beautiful temple studded with rubies and jewels, filled with all kinds of pearls and diamonds, and surrounded by pleasing forts made of gold.

data.name: ਬਿਨੁ ਪਉੜੀ ਗੜਿ ਕਿਉ ਚੜਉ ਗੁਰ ਹਰਿ ਧਿਆਨ ਨਿਹਾਲ ॥੨॥
data.english: How can that soul bride climb up that fort without a ladder? By meditating on God’s Name through the Guru’s word, she can have the bliss of beholding God.

data.name: ਗੁਰੁ ਪਉੜੀ ਬੇੜੀ ਗੁਰੂ ਗੁਰੁ ਤੁਲਹਾ ਹਰਿ ਨਾਉ ॥
data.english: The Guru is the Ladder, the Guru is the Boat, and the Guru is the Raft to take us across this world-ocean of vices which separates us from God.

data.name: ਗੁਰੁ ਸਰੁ ਸਾਗਰੁ ਬੋਹਿਥੋ ਗੁਰੁ ਤੀਰਥੁ ਦਰੀਆਉ ॥
data.english: The Guru is the Boat to carry us across the world-ocean of vices; the Guru is the Sacred Shrine of Pilgrimage, the Guru is the Holy River

data.name: ਜੇ ਤਿਸੁ ਭਾਵੈ ਊਜਲੀ ਸਤ ਸਰਿ ਨਾਵਣ ਜਾਉ ॥੩॥
data.english: If it pleases God, the intellect of the soul-bride becomes pure by bathing in the spiritual pool (joining the holy congregation).

data.name: ਪੂਰੋ ਪੂਰੋ ਆਖੀਐ ਪੂਰੈ ਤਖਤਿ ਨਿਵਾਸ ॥
data.english: He is called the Most Perfect of the Perfect. He sits upon His Perfect Throne.

data.name: ਪੂਰੈ ਥਾਨਿ ਸੁਹਾਵਣੈ ਪੂਰੈ ਆਸ ਨਿਰਾਸ ॥
data.english: He is perfect and His place is beautiful and perfect. He fulfills the hopes of the hopeless.

data.name: ਨਾਨਕ ਪੂਰਾ ਜੇ ਮਿਲੈ ਕਿਉ ਘਾਟੈ ਗੁਣ ਤਾਸ ॥੪॥੯॥
data.english: O’ Nanak, if one realizes the Perfect God how can his virtues decrease?

data.name: ਸਿਰੀਰਾਗੁ ਮਹਲਾ ੧ ॥
data.english: Siree Raag, by the First Guru:

data.name: ਆਵਹੁ ਭੈਣੇ ਗਲਿ ਮਿਲਹ ਅੰਕਿ ਸਹੇਲੜੀਆਹ ॥
data.english: O’ my sisters and spiritual companions; let us meet and embrace one another

data.name: ਮਿਲਿ ਕੈ ਕਰਹ ਕਹਾਣੀਆ ਸੰਮ੍ਰਥ ਕੰਤ ਕੀਆਹ ॥
data.english: Let’s join together, and tell stories of our All-powerful Master-God.

data.name: ਸਾਚੇ ਸਾਹਿਬ ਸਭਿ ਗੁਣ ਅਉਗਣ ਸਭਿ ਅਸਾਹ ॥੧॥
data.english: All Virtues are in our True God and Master; we are utterly without virtue.

data.name: ਕਰਤਾ ਸਭੁ ਕੋ ਤੇਰੈ ਜੋਰਿ ॥
data.english: O Creator everything is within Your Power.

data.name: ਏਕੁ ਸਬਦੁ ਬੀਚਾਰੀਐ ਜਾ ਤੂ ਤਾ ਕਿਆ ਹੋਰਿ ॥੧॥ ਰਹਾਉ ॥
data.english: When one reflects on Your virtues then one understands that if You are on our protector then no one can harm us.

data.name: ਜਾਇ ਪੁਛਹੁ ਸੋਹਾਗਣੀ ਤੁਸੀ ਰਾਵਿਆ ਕਿਨੀ ਗੁਣੀ ॥
data.english: O’ my friends, go ask the happy soul-brides. By what qualities did you please your Master God?

data.name: ਸਹਜਿ ਸੰਤੋਖਿ ਸੀਗਾਰੀਆ ਮਿਠਾ ਬੋਲਣੀ ॥
data.english: They will answer ‘We have embellished ourselves with equipoise, contentment and humility.

data.name: ਪਿਰੁ ਰੀਸਾਲੂ ਤਾ ਮਿਲੈ ਜਾ ਗੁਰ ਕਾ ਸਬਦੁ ਸੁਣੀ ॥੨॥
data.english: We realize our Beloved Master, the Source of true Joy, when we listen to the Word of the Guru.

data.name: ਕੇਤੀਆ ਤੇਰੀਆ ਕੁਦਰਤੀ ਕੇਵਡ ਤੇਰੀ ਦਾਤਿ ॥
data.english: O’ God countless are your Powers and innumerable are your Blessings.

data.name: ਕੇਤੇ ਤੇਰੇ ਜੀਅ ਜੰਤ ਸਿਫਤਿ ਕਰਹਿ ਦਿਨੁ ਰਾਤਿ ॥
data.english: So many of Your beings and creatures praise You day and night.

data.name: ਕੇਤੇ ਤੇਰੇ ਰੂਪ ਰੰਗ ਕੇਤੇ ਜਾਤਿ ਅਜਾਤਿ ॥੩॥
data.english: You have so many forms and colors, so many classes, high and low.

data.name: ਸਚੁ ਮਿਲੈ ਸਚੁ ਊਪਜੈ ਸਚ ਮਹਿ ਸਾਚਿ ਸਮਾਇ ॥
data.english: When one acquires the Truth about God after listening to the Guru, then deep faith arises in one’s mind, and one becomes absorbed in the eternal (God).

data.name: ਸੁਰਤਿ ਹੋਵੈ ਪਤਿ ਊਗਵੈ ਗੁਰਬਚਨੀ ਭਉ ਖਾਇ ॥
data.english: When through the Guru’s word we conquer our worldly fear, and come to possess divine wisdom, we gain respect in God’s court.

data.name: ਨਾਨਕ ਸਚਾ ਪਾਤਿਸਾਹੁ ਆਪੇ ਲਏ ਮਿਲਾਇ ॥੪॥੧੦॥
data.english: O Nanak, God, the true king merges us into Himself.

data.name: ਸਿਰੀਰਾਗੁ ਮਹਲਾ ੧ ॥
data.english: In Siree Raag, by the First Guru:

data.name: ਭਲੀ ਸਰੀ ਜਿ ਉਬਰੀ ਹਉਮੈ ਮੁਈ ਘਰਾਹੁ ॥
data.english: It all worked out well-I was saved from the vices, and the egotism from my heart was subdued.

data.name: ਦੂਤ ਲਗੇ ਫਿਰਿ ਚਾਕਰੀ ਸਤਿਗੁਰ ਕਾ ਵੇਸਾਹੁ ॥
data.english: And the evil energies (vices) have been made to serve me, since I placed my faith in the True Guru.

data.name: ਕਲਪ ਤਿਆਗੀ ਬਾਦਿ ਹੈ ਸਚਾ ਵੇਪਰਵਾਹੁ ॥੧॥
data.english: I have renounced my anxiety, by the Grace of God.

data.name: ਮਨ ਰੇ ਸਚੁ ਮਿਲੈ ਭਉ ਜਾਇ ॥
data.english: O mind, meeting with the True One, worldly fear departs.

data.name: ਭੈ ਬਿਨੁ ਨਿਰਭਉ ਕਿਉ ਥੀਐ ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਸਬਦਿ ਸਮਾਇ ॥੧॥ ਰਹਾਉ ॥
data.english: Unless one has loving fear of God in mind, one cannot escape from the worldly fear.This state of mind is achieved only by getting attuned to the Guru’s word.

data.name: ਕੇਤਾ ਆਖਣੁ ਆਖੀਐ ਆਖਣਿ ਤੋਟਿ ਨ ਹੋਇ ॥
data.english: The mortals keep asking for more and worldly things, this demand never ends.

data.name: ਮੰਗਣ ਵਾਲੇ ਕੇਤੜੇ ਦਾਤਾ ਏਕੋ ਸੋਇ ॥
data.english: There are so many beggars, but He is the only Giver.

data.name: ਜਿਸ ਕੇ ਜੀਅ ਪਰਾਣ ਹੈ ਮਨਿ ਵਸਿਐ ਸੁਖੁ ਹੋਇ ॥੨॥
data.english: One enjoys true peace only when that Master (God), to whom the life and soul belong, comes to dwell in the mind.

data.name: ਜਗੁ ਸੁਪਨਾ ਬਾਜੀ ਬਨੀ ਖਿਨ ਮਹਿ ਖੇਲੁ ਖੇਲਾਇ ॥
data.english: The world is like a dream in which the game of life is played, which is over in an instant.

data.name: ਸੰਜੋਗੀ ਮਿਲਿ ਏਕਸੇ ਵਿਜੋਗੀ ਉਠਿ ਜਾਇ ॥
data.english: Some attain union with God, while others depart in separation.

data.name: ਜੋ ਤਿਸੁ ਭਾਣਾ ਸੋ ਥੀਐ ਅਵਰੁ ਨ ਕਰਣਾ ਜਾਇ ॥੩॥
data.english: Whatever pleases Him comes to pass; nothing else can be done.

data.name: ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਵਸਤੁ ਵੇਸਾਹੀਐ ਸਚੁ ਵਖਰੁ ਸਚੁ ਰਾਸਿ ॥
data.english: Through the Guru’s teachings one should collect the treasure of God’s Name which is the real wealth.

data.name: ਜਿਨੀ ਸਚੁ ਵਣੰਜਿਆ ਗੁਰ ਪੂਰੇ ਸਾਬਾਸਿ ॥
data.english: Those, who have collected the treasure of God’s Name are approved by the perfect Guru.

data.name: ਨਾਨਕ ਵਸਤੁ ਪਛਾਣਸੀ ਸਚੁ ਸਉਦਾ ਜਿਸੁ ਪਾਸਿ ॥੪॥੧੧॥
data.english: O’ Nanak, God will recognize that person who has this true wealth of Naam.

data.name: ਸਿਰੀਰਾਗੁ ਮਹਲੁ ੧ ॥
data.english: Siree Raag, by the First Guru:

data.name: ਧਾਤੁ ਮਿਲੈ ਫੁਨਿ ਧਾਤੁ ਕਉ ਸਿਫਤੀ ਸਿਫਤਿ ਸਮਾਇ ॥
data.english: Just as metal merges with metal, when melted, similarly, those who sing the Praises of God are absorbed into the Praiseworthy God.

data.name: ਲਾਲੁ ਗੁਲਾਲੁ ਗਹਬਰਾ ਸਚਾ ਰੰਗੁ ਚੜਾਉ ॥
data.english: And they are deeply imbued with the love for God.

data.name: ਸਚੁ ਮਿਲੈ ਸੰਤੋਖੀਆ ਹਰਿ ਜਪਿ ਏਕੈ ਭਾਇ ॥੧॥
data.english: Those contented souls who remember God with single-minded love, realize God.

data.name: ਭਾਈ ਰੇ ਸੰਤ ਜਨਾ ਕੀ ਰੇਣੁ ॥
data.english: O, my friends, humbly listen and follow the teachings of the Saints.

data.name: ਸੰਤ ਸਭਾ ਗੁਰੁ ਪਾਈਐ ਮੁਕਤਿ ਪਦਾਰਥੁ ਧੇਣੁ ॥੧॥ ਰਹਾਉ ॥
data.english: It is only in the holy congregation that we find the Guru, who (like the wish fulfilling cow Kamdhen), leads us to liberation by saving us from vices.

data.name: ਊਚਉ ਥਾਨੁ ਸੁਹਾਵਣਾ ਊਪਰਿ ਮਹਲੁ ਮੁਰਾਰਿ ॥
data.english: Upon that Highest Plane of Sublime Beauty, stands God’s court. (to reach a state of divine wisdom, one has to rise above the material motivations of Maya)

data.name: ਸਚੁ ਕਰਣੀ ਦੇ ਪਾਈਐ ਦਰੁ ਘਰੁ ਮਹਲੁ ਪਿਆਰਿ ॥
data.english: It is through true loving conduct that we find the door to His mansion (the divine state).

data.name: ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਮਨੁ ਸਮਝਾਈਐ ਆਤਮ ਰਾਮੁ ਬੀਚਾਰਿ ॥੨॥
data.english: It is through the Guru’s teachings that we instruct our mind to contemplate on the omnipresent Godwith love and devotion.

data.name: ਤ੍ਰਿਬਿਧਿ ਕਰਮ ਕਮਾਈਅਹਿ ਆਸ ਅੰਦੇਸਾ ਹੋਇ ॥
data.english: Hope and anxiety are produced by the actions committed under the influence of the three traits of Maya ie vice, virtue and power

data.name: ਕਿਉ ਗੁਰ ਬਿਨੁ ਤ੍ਰਿਕੁਟੀ ਛੁਟਸੀ ਸਹਜਿ ਮਿਲਿਐ ਸੁਖੁ ਹੋਇ ॥
data.english: Without the Guru’s teaching, this worry does not go away. It is only when we imperceptibly meet God that we live in peace.

data.name: ਨਿਜ ਘਰਿ ਮਹਲੁ ਪਛਾਣੀਐ ਨਦਰਿ ਕਰੇ ਮਲੁ ਧੋਇ ॥੩॥
data.english: It is only through God’s grace that the dirt of vices from our mind is washed off, and through Guru’s teachings we realize God’s presence within ourselves.

data.name: ਬਿਨੁ ਗੁਰ ਮੈਲੁ ਨ ਉਤਰੈ ਬਿਨੁ ਹਰਿ ਕਿਉ ਘਰ ਵਾਸੁ ॥
data.english: Without the Guru’s teachings, this dirt of vices is not washed off. Without God’s grace, how can we realize Him within ourselves?

data.name: ਏਕੋ ਸਬਦੁ ਵੀਚਾਰੀਐ ਅਵਰ ਤਿਆਗੈ ਆਸ ॥
data.english: We should contemplates upon Divine Word and abandon all other hopes.

data.name: ਨਾਨਕ ਦੇਖਿ ਦਿਖਾਈਐ ਹਉ ਸਦ ਬਲਿਹਾਰੈ ਜਾਸੁ ॥੪॥੧੨॥
data.english: O Nanak, I dedicate myself forever to such a Guru, who has himself seen God, and also helps others to behold Him.

data.name: ਸਿਰੀਰਾਗੁ ਮਹਲਾ ੧ ॥
data.english: Siree Raag, by the First Guru:

data.name: ਧ੍ਰਿਗੁ ਜੀਵਣੁ ਦੋਹਾਗਣੀ ਮੁਠੀ ਦੂਜੈ ਭਾਇ ॥
data.english: Accursed is the life of an unfortunate soul-bride, who instead of being in love with her Master, is deluded by love of material objects.

data.name: ਕਲਰ ਕੇਰੀ ਕੰਧ ਜਿਉ ਅਹਿਨਿਸਿ ਕਿਰਿ ਢਹਿ ਪਾਇ ॥
data.english: Like a wall of sand, day and night, she crumbles, and eventually, she breaks down altogether.

data.name: ਬਿਨੁ ਸਬਦੈ ਸੁਖੁ ਨਾ ਥੀਐ ਪਿਰ ਬਿਨੁ ਦੂਖੁ ਨ ਜਾਇ ॥੧॥
data.english: Without following the Guru’s teachings, there is no peace in her life. Without realizing God, her suffering does not end.

data.name: ਮੁੰਧੇ ਪਿਰ ਬਿਨੁ ਕਿਆ ਸੀਗਾਰੁ ॥
data.english: O’ foolish soul bride, without the groom, there is no use of your adornments.

data.name: ਦਰਿ ਘਰਿ ਢੋਈ ਨ ਲਹੈ ਦਰਗਹ ਝੂਠੁ ਖੁਆਰੁ ॥੧॥ ਰਹਾਉ ॥
data.english: You will not find any shelter in God’s court, because falsehood is disgraced there.

data.name: ਆਪਿ ਸੁਜਾਣੁ ਨ ਭੁਲਈ ਸਚਾ ਵਡ ਕਿਰਸਾਣੁ ॥
data.english: God is like a wise farmer who never makes mistakes.

data.name: ਪਹਿਲਾ ਧਰਤੀ ਸਾਧਿ ਕੈ ਸਚੁ ਨਾਮੁ ਦੇ ਦਾਣੁ ॥
data.english: (Just as a farmer first prepares the ground to make it suitable for sowing seeds so that he gets a good crop) God similarly first prepares the heart of a person by inculcating in it divine virtues and then gives the gift (plants the seed) of Naam.

data.name: ਨਉ ਨਿਧਿ ਉਪਜੈ ਨਾਮੁ ਏਕੁ ਕਰਮਿ ਪਵੈ ਨੀਸਾਣੁ ॥੨॥
data.english: Then there grows the crop of Naam, valuable like the nine treasures. And this blessed person receives the mark of God’s grace.

data.name: ਗੁਰ ਕਉ ਜਾਣਿ ਨ ਜਾਣਈ ਕਿਆ ਤਿਸੁ ਚਜੁ ਅਚਾਰੁ ॥
data.english: The person who knowingly does not understand or follow the Guru’s teachings has no sense of proper conduct in life.

data.name: ਅੰਧੁਲੈ ਨਾਮੁ ਵਿਸਾਰਿਆ ਮਨਮੁਖਿ ਅੰਧ ਗੁਬਾਰੁ ॥
data.english: That Manmukh (self-willed) is spiritually blind and he has forgotten God’s Name. He lives in complete darkness of spiritual ignorance.

data.name: ਆਵਣੁ ਜਾਣੁ ਨ ਚੁਕਈ ਮਰਿ ਜਨਮੈ ਹੋਇ ਖੁਆਰੁ ॥੩॥
data.english: His coming and going does not end: he keeps suffering in rounds of births and deaths.

data.name: ਚੰਦਨੁ ਮੋਲਿ ਅਣਾਇਆ ਕੁੰਗੂ ਮਾਂਗ ਸੰਧੂਰੁ ॥
data.english: To please her Master the soul- bride may adorn herself with all sorts of cosmetics,

data.name: ਚੋਆ ਚੰਦਨੁ ਬਹੁ ਘਣਾ ਪਾਨਾ ਨਾਲਿ ਕਪੂਰੁ ॥
data.english: She uses mouth fresheners, and applies scent and perfume to her body,

data.name: ਜੇ ਧਨ ਕੰਤਿ ਨ ਭਾਵਈ ਤ ਸਭਿ ਅਡੰਬਰ ਕੂੜੁ ॥੪॥
data.english: but if this soul- bride is not pleasing to her Master (God), then all these trappings are useless. (God can not be pleased by religious garbs and rituals)

data.name: ਸਭਿ ਰਸ ਭੋਗਣ ਬਾਦਿ ਹਹਿ ਸਭਿ ਸੀਗਾਰ ਵਿਕਾਰ ॥
data.english: Her enjoyment of all pleasures is futile, and all her decorations are useless.

data.name: ਜਬ ਲਗੁ ਸਬਦਿ ਨ ਭੇਦੀਐ ਕਿਉ ਸੋਹੈ ਗੁਰਦੁਆਰਿ ॥
data.english: Until she has been imbued with the Guru’s word, how can she get honored at God’s court?

data.name: ਨਾਨਕ ਧੰਨੁ ਸੁਹਾਗਣੀ ਜਿਨ ਸਹ ਨਾਲਿ ਪਿਆਰੁ ॥੫॥੧੩॥
data.english: O Nanak, blessed is that fortunate soul-bride, who is in love with her Master.

data.name: ਸਿਰੀਰਾਗੁ ਮਹਲਾ ੧ ॥
data.english: In Siree Raag, by the First Guru:

data.name: ਸੁੰਞੀ ਦੇਹ ਡਰਾਵਣੀ ਜਾ ਜੀਉ ਵਿਚਹੁ ਜਾਇ ॥
data.english: When the soul departs, the body looks deserted and dreadful.

data.name: ਭਾਹਿ ਬਲੰਦੀ ਵਿਝਵੀ ਧੂਉ ਨ ਨਿਕਸਿਓ ਕਾਇ ॥
data.english: The burning fire of life is extinguished, and the smoke of the breath no longer emerges.

data.name: ਪੰਚੇ ਰੁੰਨੇ ਦੁਖਿ ਭਰੇ ਬਿਨਸੇ ਦੂਜੈ ਭਾਇ ॥੧॥
data.english: The five sense organs cry in grief for having been wasted through the love of things other than God.

data.name: ਮੂੜੇ ਰਾਮੁ ਜਪਹੁ ਗੁਣ ਸਾਰਿ ॥
data.english: O’ fool: remember God and His virtues with love and devotion.

data.name: ਹਉਮੈ ਮਮਤਾ ਮੋਹਣੀ ਸਭ ਮੁਠੀ ਅਹੰਕਾਰਿ ॥੧॥ ਰਹਾਉ ॥
data.english: Egotism and possessiveness are very enticing; egotistical pride has deceived everyone.

data.name: ਜਿਨੀ ਨਾਮੁ ਵਿਸਾਰਿਆ ਦੂਜੀ ਕਾਰੈ ਲਗਿ ॥
data.english: They who become engrossed in worldly pursuits have forgotten God,

data.name: ਦੁਬਿਧਾ ਲਾਗੇ ਪਚਿ ਮੁਏ ਅੰਤਰਿ ਤ੍ਰਿਸਨਾ ਅਗਿ ॥
data.english: -attached to worldly things, and consumed by the fire of their desires, they are spiritually dead.

data.name: ਗੁਰਿ ਰਾਖੇ ਸੇ ਉਬਰੇ ਹੋਰਿ ਮੁਠੀ ਧੰਧੈ ਠਗਿ ॥੨॥
data.english: Those who are protected by the Guru are saved; all others are cheated and plundered by deceitful worldly affairs.

data.name: ਮੁਈ ਪਰੀਤਿ ਪਿਆਰੁ ਗਇਆ ਮੁਆ ਵੈਰੁ ਵਿਰੋਧੁ ॥
data.english: The one who follows Guru’s teachings, his worldly love vanishes along with all attachments, enmity and hatred,

data.name: ਧੰਧਾ ਥਕਾ ਹਉ ਮੁਈ ਮਮਤਾ ਮਾਇਆ ਕ੍ਰੋਧੁ ॥
data.english: all his worldly pursuits are over and his egotism, emotional attachment and anger ends.

data.name: ਕਰਮਿ ਮਿਲੈ ਸਚੁ ਪਾਈਐ ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਸਦਾ ਨਿਰੋਧੁ ॥੩॥
data.english: The one who follows Guru’s teachings, always controls his senses and realizes God through His grace.

data.name: ਸਚੀ ਕਾਰੈ ਸਚੁ ਮਿਲੈ ਗੁਰਮਤਿ ਪਲੈ ਪਾਇ ॥
data.english: By following Guru’s teachings and meditating on God’s Name, one realizes God.

data.name: ਸੋ ਨਰੁ ਜੰਮੈ ਨਾ ਮਰੈ ਨਾ ਆਵੈ ਨਾ ਜਾਇ ॥
data.english: Then, such a person is not subjected to cycles of birth and death.

data.name: ਨਾਨਕ ਦਰਿ ਪਰਧਾਨੁ ਸੋ ਦਰਗਹਿ ਪੈਧਾ ਜਾਇ ॥੪॥੧੪॥
data.english: O’ Nanak, that person is recognized as a dignitary and is honored in God’s court.

data.name: ਸਿਰੀਰਾਗੁ ਮਹਲ ੧ ॥
data.english: Siree Raag, by the First Guru;

data.name: ਤਨੁ ਜਲਿ ਬਲਿ ਮਾਟੀ ਭਇਆ ਮਨੁ ਮਾਇਆ ਮੋਹਿ ਮਨੂਰੁ ॥
data.english: The body of a self conceited person is burnt to ashes in the fire of vices and his mind is rusted in the love of Maya. (worldly riches and power)

data.name: ਅਉਗਣ ਫਿਰਿ ਲਾਗੂ ਭਏ ਕੂਰਿ ਵਜਾਵੈ ਤੂਰੁ ॥
data.english: The vices haunt his mind like enemies. Yet still such a person, engrossed in falsehood, keeps blowing the bugle of love for worldly riches.

data.name: ਬਿਨੁ ਸਬਦੈ ਭਰਮਾਈਐ ਦੁਬਿਧਾ ਡੋਬੇ ਪੂਰੁ ॥੧॥
data.english: Without following the Guru’s teachings he is led astray and the love of worldly things destroys all his senses.

data.name: ਮਨ ਰੇ ਸਬਦਿ ਤਰਹੁ ਚਿਤੁ ਲਾਇ ॥
data.english: O’ my mind, follow the Guru’s teachings with full concentration and swim across the world-ocean of vices.

data.name: ਜਿਨਿ ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਨਾਮੁ ਨ ਬੂਝਿਆ ਮਰਿ ਜਨਮੈ ਆਵੈ ਜਾਇ ॥੧॥ ਰਹਾਉ ॥
data.english: The person who does not grasp the Guru’s Gift of Naam, he continues to suffer in cycles of birth and death.

data.name: ਤਨੁ ਸੂਚਾ ਸੋ ਆਖੀਐ ਜਿਸੁ ਮਹਿ ਸਾਚਾ ਨਾਉ ॥
data.english: That body is said to be pure, in which dwells the eternal Name of God.

data.name: ਭੈ ਸਚਿ ਰਾਤੀ ਦੇਹੁਰੀ ਜਿਹਵਾ ਸਚੁ ਸੁਆਉ ॥
data.english: One whose body is imbued with loving fear of God and whose purpose in life is to sing praises of God,

data.name: ਸਚੀ ਨਦਰਿ ਨਿਹਾਲੀਐ ਬਹੁੜਿ ਨ ਪਾਵੈ ਤਾਉ ॥੨॥
data.english: is blessed by God’s gracious glance. That person does not have to go through the suffering in the cycles of birth and death.

data.name: ਸਾਚੇ ਤੇ ਪਵਨਾ ਭਇਆ ਪਵਨੈ ਤੇ ਜਲੁ ਹੋਇ ॥
data.english: From the ever existing God came the air, and from the air came water.

data.name: ਜਲ ਤੇ ਤ੍ਰਿਭਵਣੁ ਸਾਜਿਆ ਘਟਿ ਘਟਿ ਜੋਤਿ ਸਮੋਇ ॥
data.english: From water, He created the three worlds (earth, sky and nether region); and His light pervades in each and every heart.

data.name: ਨਿਰਮਲੁ ਮੈਲਾ ਨਾ ਥੀਐ ਸਬਦਿ ਰਤੇ ਪਤਿ ਹੋਇ ॥੩॥
data.english: Person imbued with Guru’s word gets honor, he always remains immaculate and never become soiled with vices.

data.name: ਇਹੁ ਮਨੁ ਸਾਚਿ ਸੰਤੋਖਿਆ ਨਦਰਿ ਕਰੇ ਤਿਸੁ ਮਾਹਿ ॥
data.english: When his mind becomes contented by meditating on God’s Name with loving devotion, then His grace falls upon him.

data.name: ਪੰਚ ਭੂਤ ਸਚਿ ਭੈ ਰਤੇ ਜੋਤਿ ਸਚੀ ਮਨ ਮਾਹਿ ॥
data.english: His body made of five elements (ether, fire, air,water and earth ) remains imbued with revered fear of God and His light fills his mind.

data.name: ਨਾਨਕ ਅਉਗਣ ਵੀਸਰੇ ਗੁਰਿ ਰਾਖੇ ਪਤਿ ਤਾਹਿ ॥੪॥੧੫॥
data.english: O’ Nanak, he forsakes all his vices all his vices and the Guru saves his honor.

data.name: ਸਿਰੀਰਾਗੁ ਮਹਲਾ ੧ ॥
data.english: Siree Raag, by the First Guru:

data.name: ਨਾਨਕ ਬੇੜੀ ਸਚ ਕੀ ਤਰੀਐ ਗੁਰ ਵੀਚਾਰਿ ॥
data.english: O’ Nanak, by following Guru’s teachings, if we live truthfully we can swim across this worldly- ocean of vices.

data.name: ਇਕਿ ਆਵਹਿ ਇਕਿ ਜਾਵਹੀ ਪੂਰਿ ਭਰੇ ਅਹੰਕਾਰਿ ॥
data.english: Otherwise, multitude of egotistical are rotating in the cycles of birth and death.

data.name: ਮਨਹਠਿ ਮਤੀ ਬੂਡੀਐ ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਸਚੁ ਸੁ ਤਾਰਿ ॥੧॥
data.english: Person who follows the dictate of his mind drowns in worldly ocean of vices but one who follows Guru’s teachings, God helps him swims across.

data.name: ਗੁਰ ਬਿਨੁ ਕਿਉ ਤਰੀਐ ਸੁਖੁ ਹੋਇ ॥
data.english: Without the Guru’s guidance, how can anyone swim across the world-ocean of vices and find peace in life?

data.name: ਜਿਉ ਭਾਵੈ ਤਿਉ ਰਾਖੁ ਤੂ ਮੈ ਅਵਰੁ ਨ ਦੂਜਾ ਕੋਇ ॥੧॥ ਰਹਾਉ ॥
data.english: O’ God, save me in whatever way You please. Except You there is nobody else whom I can call mine.

data.name: ਆਗੈ ਦੇਖਉ ਡਉ ਜਲੈ ਪਾਛੈ ਹਰਿਓ ਅੰਗੂਰੁ ॥
data.english: World is like a forest in which people are dying like burning trees and new children are being born like new greens sprouting.

data.name: ਜਿਸ ਤੇ ਉਪਜੈ ਤਿਸ ਤੇ ਬਿਨਸੈ ਘਟਿ ਘਟਿ ਸਚੁ ਭਰਪੂਰਿ ॥
data.english: He, who creates them, is also their destroyer. The eternal God pervades each and every heart.

data.name: ਆਪੇ ਮੇਲਿ ਮਿਲਾਵਹੀ ਸਾਚੈ ਮਹਲਿ ਹਦੂਰਿ ॥੨॥
data.english: O God, You unite human beings with yourself and You keep them in Your presence at Your eternal abode.

data.name: ਸਾਹਿ ਸਾਹਿ ਤੁਝੁ ਸੰਮਲਾ ਕਦੇ ਨ ਵਿਸਾਰੇਉ ॥
data.english: O’ God, bless me that I may remember You with love and devotion with every breath and may never forget You.

data.name: ਜਿਉ ਜਿਉ ਸਾਹਬੁ ਮਨਿ ਵਸੈ ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਅੰਮ੍ਰਿਤੁ ਪੇਉ ॥
data.english: More The Master dwells within my mind, more the Nectar God’s Name I shall relish by the Guru’s grace.

data.name: ਮਨੁ ਤਨੁ ਤੇਰਾ ਤੂ ਧਣੀ ਗਰਬੁ ਨਿਵਾਰਿ ਸਮੇਉ ॥੩॥
data.english: Mind and body are Yours; You are my Master. Please rid me of my ego and let me merge with You.

data.name: ਜਿਨਿ ਏਹੁ ਜਗਤੁ ਉਪਾਇਆ ਤ੍ਰਿਭਵਣੁ ਕਰਿ ਆਕਾਰੁ ॥
data.english: He who has created this universe in the form of three worlds (earth, sky and nether region),

data.name: ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਚਾਨਣੁ ਜਾਣੀਐ ਮਨਮੁਖਿ ਮੁਗਧੁ ਗੁਬਾਰੁ ॥
data.english: can only be realized with the light of the Guru’s word, while the self-willed fools remain in the darkness of ignorance.

data.name: ਘਟਿ ਘਟਿ ਜੋਤਿ ਨਿਰੰਤਰੀ ਬੂਝੈ ਗੁਰਮਤਿ ਸਾਰੁ ॥੪॥
data.english: One who sees that Light within each and every heart understands the Essence of the Guru’s Teachings.

data.name: ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਜਿਨੀ ਜਾਣਿਆ ਤਿਨ ਕੀਚੈ ਸਾਬਾਸਿ ॥
data.english: Those Guru’s followers who have realized God are commended.

data.name: ਸਚੇ ਸੇਤੀ ਰਲਿ ਮਿਲੇ ਸਚੇ ਗੁਣ ਪਰਗਾਸਿ ॥
data.english: They meet and merge with the True One and the virtues of God manifest in them.

data.name: ਨਾਨਕ ਨਾਮਿ ਸੰਤੋਖੀਆ ਜੀਉ ਪਿੰਡੁ ਪ੍ਰਭ ਪਾਸਿ ॥੫॥੧੬॥
data.english: O Nanak, they are contented with the Naam, and they surrender their bodies and souls to God.

data.name: ਸਿਰੀਰਾਗੁ ਮਹਲਾ ੧ ॥
data.english: Siree Raag, by the First Guru:

data.name: ਸੁਣਿ ਮਨ ਮਿਤ੍ਰ ਪਿਆਰਿਆ ਮਿਲੁ ਵੇਲਾ ਹੈ ਏਹ ॥
data.english: Listen, O’ my mind , my dear friend; this is the time (human life ) to meet God.

data.name: ਜਬ ਲਗੁ ਜੋਬਨਿ ਸਾਸੁ ਹੈ ਤਬ ਲਗੁ ਇਹੁ ਤਨੁ ਦੇਹ ॥
data.english: As long as we are in youth and are breathing, our body is of some use.

data.name: ਬਿਨੁ ਗੁਣ ਕਾਮਿ ਨ ਆਵਈ ਢਹਿ ਢੇਰੀ ਤਨੁ ਖੇਹ ॥੧॥
data.english: Without virtue, it is useless; the body shall crumble into a pile of dust.

data.name: ਮੇਰੇ ਮਨ ਲੈ ਲਾਹਾ ਘਰਿ ਜਾਹਿ ॥
data.english: O’ my mind earn the profit of Naam, before you return to eternal home.

data.name: ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਨਾਮੁ ਸਲਾਹੀਐ ਹਉਮੈ ਨਿਵਰੀ ਭਾਹਿ ॥੧॥ ਰਹਾਉ ॥
data.english: Through the Guru’s teachings, praise God’s Name with love and devotion so that the fire of egotism is extinguished.

data.name: ਸੁਣਿ ਸੁਣਿ ਗੰਢਣੁ ਗੰਢੀਐ ਲਿਖਿ ਪੜਿ ਬੁਝਹਿ ਭਾਰੁ ॥
data.english: We may listen to all kinds of scriptures and connect these mythical stories with one another. we may read, write and interpret loads of such stories,

data.name: ਤ੍ਰਿਸਨਾ ਅਹਿਨਿਸਿ ਅਗਲੀ ਹਉਮੈ ਰੋਗੁ ਵਿਕਾਰੁ ॥
data.english: but still, our desires keep intensifying day and night, and we remain plagued by the disease of ego and evil passions.

data.name: ਓਹੁ ਵੇਪਰਵਾਹੁ ਅਤੋਲਵਾ ਗੁਰਮਤਿ ਕੀਮਤਿ ਸਾਰੁ ॥੨॥
data.english: The carefree God is beyond any measure and it is only through the Guru’s teachings that we can understand His real worth.

data.name: ਲਖ ਸਿਆਣਪ ਜੇ ਕਰੀ ਲਖ ਸਿਉ ਪ੍ਰੀਤਿ ਮਿਲਾਪੁ ॥
data.english: Even if someone has hundreds of thousands of clever thoughts, and the love and company of hundreds of thousands of people,

data.name: ਬਿਨੁ ਸੰਗਤਿ ਸਾਧ ਨ ਧ੍ਰਾਪੀਆ ਬਿਨੁ ਨਾਵੈ ਦੂਖ ਸੰਤਾਪੁ ॥
data.english: -still, without the holy company, spiritual thirst is not quenched. Without Naam we suffer miseries and woes.

data.name: ਹਰਿ ਜਪਿ ਜੀਅਰੇ ਛੁਟੀਐ ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਚੀਨੈ ਆਪੁ ॥੩॥
data.english: O’ my soul, let us understand ourselves through the Guru’s teaching and save ourselves from the worldly desires by remembering God with love and devotion.

data.name: ਤਨੁ ਮਨੁ ਗੁਰ ਪਹਿ ਵੇਚਿਆ ਮਨੁ ਦੀਆ ਸਿਰੁ ਨਾਲਿ ॥
data.english: I have completely surrendered myself to the Guru’s teachings,

data.name: ਤ੍ਰਿਭਵਣੁ ਖੋਜਿ ਢੰਢੋਲਿਆ ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਖੋਜਿ ਨਿਹਾਲਿ ॥
data.english: as a result, by the Guru’s Grace, I have realized the God within, whom I had been searching everywhere.

data.name: ਸਤਗੁਰਿ ਮੇਲਿ ਮਿਲਾਇਆ ਨਾਨਕ ਸੋ ਪ੍ਰਭੁ ਨਾਲਿ ॥੪॥੧੭॥
data.english: O’ Nanak, God is now always with me. The true Guru has brought about this union with Him.

data.name: ਸਿਰੀਰਾਗੁ ਮਹਲਾ ੧ ॥
data.english: Siree Raag, by the First Guru:

data.name: ਮਰਣੈ ਕੀ ਚਿੰਤਾ ਨਹੀ ਜੀਵਣ ਕੀ ਨਹੀ ਆਸ ॥
data.english: I am not worried about death, Nor do I crave for life.

data.name: ਤੂ ਸਰਬ ਜੀਆ ਪ੍ਰਤਿਪਾਲਹੀ ਲੇਖੈ ਸਾਸ ਗਿਰਾਸ ॥
data.english: You are the Cherisher of all beings; You keep the account of our breaths and morsels of food.

data.name: ਅੰਤਰਿ ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਤੂ ਵਸਹਿ ਜਿਉ ਭਾਵੈ ਤਿਉ ਨਿਰਜਾਸਿ ॥੧॥
data.english: You, Yourself dwell within the heart of the Guru’s follower, You decide the fate of a person, as it pleases You.

data.name: ਜੀਅਰੇ ਰਾਮ ਜਪਤ ਮਨੁ ਮਾਨੁ ॥
data.english: O’ my dear soul,by meditating on God’s Name my mind has obtained satisfaction

data.name: ਅੰਤਰਿ ਲਾਗੀ ਜਲਿ ਬੁਝੀ ਪਾਇਆ ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਗਿਆਨੁ ॥੧॥ ਰਹਾਉ ॥
data.english: By the Guru’s grace I have obtained such a divine knowledge that the fire of desire burning within me has been extinguished.

data.name: ਅੰਤਰ ਕੀ ਗਤਿ ਜਾਣੀਐ ਗੁਰ ਮਿਲੀਐ ਸੰਕ ਉਤਾਰਿ ॥
data.english: By surrendering to the Guru with full devotion and without skepticism, we can understand the state of our innerself.

data.name: ਮੁਇਆ ਜਿਤੁ ਘਰਿ ਜਾਈਐ ਤਿਤੁ ਜੀਵਦਿਆ ਮਰੁ ਮਾਰਿ ॥
data.english: The place or state which we want to reach after death, we should try to reach that state while living, by conquering our mind.

data.name: ਅਨਹਦ ਸਬਦਿ ਸੁਹਾਵਣੇ ਪਾਈਐ ਗੁਰ ਵੀਚਾਰਿ ॥੨॥
data.english: We can enjoy the pleasing unstruck divine music through the teachings of the Guru.

data.name: ਅਨਹਦ ਬਾਣੀ ਪਾਈਐ ਤਹ ਹਉਮੈ ਹੋਇ ਬਿਨਾਸੁ ॥
data.english: When we are blessed with this state of enjoying the divine word (Gurbani), then the inner ego is totally destroyed.

data.name: ਸਤਗੁਰੁ ਸੇਵੇ ਆਪਣਾ ਹਉ ਸਦ ਕੁਰਬਾਣੈ ਤਾਸੁ ॥
data.english: I dedicate my life for those who truly follow the teachings of their Guru.

data.name: ਖੜਿ ਦਰਗਹ ਪੈਨਾਈਐ ਮੁਖਿ ਹਰਿ ਨਾਮ ਨਿਵਾਸੁ ॥੩॥
data.english: They always recite the praises of God and are honored in God’s court.

data.name: ਜਹ ਦੇਖਾ ਤਹ ਰਵਿ ਰਹੇ ਸਿਵ ਸਕਤੀ ਕਾ ਮੇਲੁ ॥
data.english: Wherever I see I find humans indulging in Maya (worldly illusions)

data.name: ਤ੍ਰਿਹੁ ਗੁਣ ਬੰਧੀ ਦੇਹੁਰੀ ਜੋ ਆਇਆ ਜਗਿ ਸੋ ਖੇਲੁ ॥
data.english: The three traits of Maya hold the human body in bondage; whoever comes into the world is subject to their play.

data.name: ਵਿਜੋਗੀ ਦੁਖਿ ਵਿਛੁੜੇ ਮਨਮੁਖਿ ਲਹਹਿ ਨ ਮੇਲੁ ॥੪॥
data.english: The self-willed (Manmukh) do not attain union with God, they remain alienated from Him and remain in misery.

data.name: ਮਨੁ ਬੈਰਾਗੀ ਘਰਿ ਵਸੈ ਸਚ ਭੈ ਰਾਤਾ ਹੋਇ ॥
data.english: When the mind imbued with loving fear of God becomes detached from worldly affairs and comes to dwell within (stops wandering),

data.name: ਗਿਆਨ ਮਹਾਰਸੁ ਭੋਗਵੈ ਬਾਹੁੜਿ ਭੂਖ ਨ ਹੋਇ ॥
data.english: then it enjoys the essence of supreme spiritual wisdom; it shall never feel hunger for worldly things again.

data.name: ਨਾਨਕ ਇਹੁ ਮਨੁ ਮਾਰਿ ਮਿਲੁ ਭੀ ਫਿਰਿ ਦੁਖੁ ਨ ਹੋਇ ॥੫॥੧੮॥
data.english: O’ Nanak, subdue your ego and unite with God, so that you shall never suffer in pain (of separation from God) anymore.

data.name: ਸਿਰੀਰਾਗੁ ਮਹਲਾ ੧ ॥
data.english: Siree Raag, by the First Guru:

data.name: ਏਹੁ ਮਨੋ ਮੂਰਖੁ ਲੋਭੀਆ ਲੋਭੇ ਲਗਾ ਲੋੁਭਾਨੁ ॥
data.english: O’ my foolish and greedy mind, you are attached and engrossed in greed.

data.name: ਸਬਦਿ ਨ ਭੀਜੈ ਸਾਕਤਾ ਦੁਰਮਤਿ ਆਵਨੁ ਜਾਨੁ ॥
data.english: The faithless (sakat) is not swayed by the divine word, and his evil mind suffers in the cycle of birth and death.

data.name: ਸਾਧੂ ਸਤਗੁਰੁ ਜੇ ਮਿਲੈ ਤਾ ਪਾਈਐ ਗੁਣੀ ਨਿਧਾਨੁ ॥੧॥
data.english: But if he meets the True Guru, then he realizes God, the treasure of virtues.

data.name: ਮਨ ਰੇ ਹਉਮੈ ਛੋਡਿ ਗੁਮਾਨੁ ॥
data.english: O my mind, renounce your egotistical pride.

data.name: ਹਰਿ ਗੁਰੁ ਸਰਵਰੁ ਸੇਵਿ ਤੂ ਪਾਵਹਿ ਦਰਗਹ ਮਾਨੁ ॥੧॥ ਰਹਾਉ ॥
data.english: Follow the teachings of the Guru, who is the image of God, the pool of immortality, so that you may receive honor in God’s court.

data.name: ਰਾਮ ਨਾਮੁ ਜਪਿ ਦਿਨਸੁ ਰਾਤਿ ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਹਰਿ ਧਨੁ ਜਾਨੁ ॥
data.english: O’ my mind, remember God day and night with love and devotion, and through Guru’s grace realize the spiritual value of the wealth of Naam.

data.name: ਸਭਿ ਸੁਖ ਹਰਿ ਰਸ ਭੋਗਣੇ ਸੰਤ ਸਭਾ ਮਿਲਿ ਗਿਆਨੁ ॥
data.english: In the holy company, acquire spiritual wisdom and you will enjoy all comforts and the divine pleasures.

data.name: ਨਿਤਿ ਅਹਿਨਿਸਿ ਹਰਿ ਪ੍ਰਭੁ ਸੇਵਿਆ ਸਤਗੁਰਿ ਦੀਆ ਨਾਮੁ ॥੨॥
data.english: He, whom the true Guru has blessed with the gift of Naam, remembers God with love and devotion day and night.

data.name: ਕੂਕਰ ਕੂੜੁ ਕਮਾਈਐ ਗੁਰ ਨਿੰਦਾ ਪਚੈ ਪਚਾਨੁ ॥
data.english: The one who practices falsehood is like a dog. Such a person even slanders the Guru and suffers utter disgrace.

data.name: ਭਰਮੇ ਭੂਲਾ ਦੁਖੁ ਘਣੋ ਜਮੁ ਮਾਰਿ ਕਰੈ ਖੁਲਹਾਨੁ ॥
data.english: Doubts lead him astray, he suffers in great agony and the demon of death deals with him mercilessly .

data.name: ਮਨਮੁਖਿ ਸੁਖੁ ਨ ਪਾਈਐ ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਸੁਖੁ ਸੁਭਾਨੁ ॥੩॥
data.english: In this way, the self-conceited (Manmukh) find no peace, while the Guru’s followers are always wondrously joyful.

data.name: ਐਥੈ ਧੰਧੁ ਪਿਟਾਈਐ ਸਚੁ ਲਿਖਤੁ ਪਰਵਾਨੁ ॥
data.english: In this world, people are engrossed in false pursuits, but in the world hereafter, only the account of your true actions is accepted.

data.name: ਹਰਿ ਸਜਣੁ ਗੁਰੁ ਸੇਵਦਾ ਗੁਰ ਕਰਣੀ ਪਰਧਾਨੁ ॥
data.english: Therefore, serve the Guru (follow the Guru’s teachings), the intimate friend of God. The deeds done under the Guru’s command are supreme.

data.name: ਨਾਨਕ ਨਾਮੁ ਨ ਵੀਸਰੈ ਕਰਮਿ ਸਚੈ ਨੀਸਾਣੁ ॥੪॥੧੯॥
data.english: O’ Nanak, by God’s Grace, the one who receives His stamp of approval, he never forgets God’s Name.

data.name: ਸਿਰੀਰਾਗੁ ਮਹਲਾ ੧ ॥
data.english: Siree Raag, by the First Guru:

data.name: ਇਕੁ ਤਿਲੁ ਪਿਆਰਾ ਵੀਸਰੈ ਰੋਗੁ ਵਡਾ ਮਨ ਮਾਹਿ ॥
data.english: Forgetting the Beloved God, even for a moment, they feel as if their mind is suffering from some serious malady.

data.name: ਕਿਉ ਦਰਗਹ ਪਤਿ ਪਾਈਐ ਜਾ ਹਰਿ ਨ ਵਸੈ ਮਨ ਮਾਹਿ ॥
data.english: How can honor be attained in His Court, if God does not dwell in the mind?

data.name: ਗੁਰਿ ਮਿਲਿਐ ਸੁਖੁ ਪਾਈਐ ਅਗਨਿ ਮਰੈ ਗੁਣ ਮਾਹਿ ॥੧॥
data.english: Therefore Meeting with the Guru, peace is found. The fire of worldly desires is extinguished by singing His Glorious Praises.

data.name: ਮਨ ਰੇ ਅਹਿਨਿਸਿ ਹਰਿ ਗੁਣ ਸਾਰਿ ॥
data.english: O mind, enshrine the Praises of God, day and night.

data.name: ਜਿਨ ਖਿਨੁ ਪਲੁ ਨਾਮੁ ਨ ਵੀਸਰੈ ਤੇ ਜਨ ਵਿਰਲੇ ਸੰਸਾਰਿ ॥੧॥ ਰਹਾਉ ॥
data.english: Very rare are those in this world who do not forsake the Naam even for a moment.

data.name: ਜੋਤੀ ਜੋਤਿ ਮਿਲਾਈਐ ਸੁਰਤੀ ਸੁਰਤਿ ਸੰਜੋਗੁ ॥
data.english: If we merge our soul with the Supreme Soul, and our mind with the Higher mind,

data.name: ਹਿੰਸਾ ਹਉਮੈ ਗਤੁ ਗਏ ਨਾਹੀ ਸਹਸਾ ਸੋਗੁ ॥
data.english: then one’s cruel and violent instincts and egotism depart, and skepticism and sorrow are taken away.

data.name: ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਜਿਸੁ ਹਰਿ ਮਨਿ ਵਸੈ ਤਿਸੁ ਮੇਲੇ ਗੁਰੁ ਸੰਜੋਗੁ ॥੨॥
data.english: One who follows the Guru’s teaching and enshrines God in his mind, Guru blesses him the chance of union with God.

data.name: ਕਾਇਆ ਕਾਮਣਿ ਜੇ ਕਰੀ ਭੋਗੇ ਭੋਗਣਹਾਰੁ ॥
data.english: If I surrender myself to God, I will experiences the similar bliss of union with God; like the young bride feels when she surrenders herself to her Master-God.

data.name: ਤਿਸੁ ਸਿਉ ਨੇਹੁ ਨ ਕੀਜਈ ਜੋ ਦੀਸੈ ਚਲਣਹਾਰੁ ॥
data.english: Such soul does not fall in love with the body which is definitely transient,

data.name: ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਰਵਹਿ ਸੋਹਾਗਣੀ ਸੋ ਪ੍ਰਭੁ ਸੇਜ ਭਤਾਰੁ ॥੩॥
data.english: but is guided by the Guru, and enjoy the pleasure of union with God, Who dwells in her heart.

data.name: ਚਾਰੇ ਅਗਨਿ ਨਿਵਾਰਿ ਮਰੁ ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਹਰਿ ਜਲੁ ਪਾਇ ॥
data.english: By following the Guru’s teachings, puts out all the four fires within your mind by pouring the water of God’s Name and remain detached from Maya.
